You will join the new Generative AI team in the Digital Service Platform at Vanderlande, where you'll shape the future of logistics by harnessing the power of AI. Your mission will be to architect and develop a scalable, agentic AI product suite designed to optimize service interactions, enhancing both the efficiency and profitability of Vanderlande's service business. Initially, you'll lead the architecture and development of a RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) agent, focusing on ADAPTO and predictive maintenance. You will use managed services (from Azure and Databricks) to quickly deliver a solution that can be validated and tested with key users and customers. The scope will soon expand to include agents focused on providing analysis of local operational data, generated from ADAPTO.
       You will leverage our existing data management platform, insights product and other services from Databricks and Azure to quickly deliver a solution that can be validated and tested with key users and customers. Further down the line, the focus will shift towards building a multi-agent system which will leverage global operational and corporate data and documents to provide simple conclusions on ADAPTO service tickets. This solution should be able to eventually scale towards providing proactive issue identification and resolution recommendations.
       Responsibilities:
          + Collaborate with a cross-functional team of experts to define, design, architect and build a generative AI framework that can be expanded and scaled towards an agentic AI solution.
          + Build backend services supporting a generative AI solution, initially focusing on RAG.
          + Collaborate with Data scientists and front-end engineers in developing effective contracts, APIs and services.
          + Design and implement microservices architecture leveraging Azure cloud and the Databricks platform.
          + Develop and maintain infrastructure as code (IaC) using Terraform.
          + Use Jira to track and manage development tasks and project progress.
          + Ensure that the developed software meets high quality standards by implementing unit, component, and integration tests. Qualifications

Als full stack DevSecOps engineer bij het AI Safety & Security Lab speel je een cruciale rol in het vormgeven van het nationale en Europese toezicht op complexe AI binnen de RDI. Je bevindt je in de unieke positie om de veiligheids- en beveiligingsrisico's van generatieve AI te onderzoeken, beleidsadvies te geven en bij te dragen aan de maatschappelijke verantwoordelijkheid van de RDI in haar rol als toezichthouder op digitale infrastructuur en AI. Binnen het lab ben je verantwoordelijk voor:
     * Ontwikkeling van framework voor het onderzoek naar multi-agent general purpose AI-systemen.
     * Het opzetten en configureren van een testomgeving om generatieve AI-modellen te evalueren aan de hand van cybersecurity-benchmarks.
     * Het ontwikkelen van een werkwijze op basis van coding standards en workflow-automatisering voor reproduceerbare, betrouwbare en onderhoudbare infrastructure-as-code.
     * Kennisoverdracht naar de junior onderzoekers en engineers.
     * Up-to-date blijven bij de meest recente wetenschappelijke ontwikkelingen op het gebied van cybersecurity en AI.

   Achtergrond opdracht

   Binnen de RDI zijn we verantwoordelijk voor een veilig verbonden Nederland, waar AI op tal van onderwerpen een steeds grotere rol speelt. Recent is binnen de RDI het AI Safety & Security Lab gestart. Met jouw opdracht faciliteer je een omgeving die het team dat hieraan werkt in staat stelt om de grenzen van generatieve AI te verkennen en draag je bij aan een onderzoeksomgeving die niet alleen innovatief maar ook veilig en betrouwbaar is.

* Bouwen, implementeren en verbeteren van AI standaard oplossingen zoals ML/Deep learning/LLM/RAG oplossingen in nieuwe en bestaande applicaties (app, webservices, etc.).
     * Bouwen van model trainings scripts en data pipelines.
     * Verzamelen, opschonen en evalueren van data en verbindingen maken met data bronnen.

   Het kunnen toepassen van verschillende vormen van Machine Learning in de contexten van:
     * Beeldherkenning
     * Natural Language Processing
     * Spraakherkenning
     * Spraakgeneratie
     * Recommending Systems
     * Nieuwe en andere vormen van ML en het inbouwen hiervan in bestaande applicaties.

     * Het gebruiken van actuele frameworks zoals TensorFlow en Pytorch in Python 3.
     * Het gebruiken van diverse mobiele AI frameworks, zoals CreateML, etc.

* De vraag naar machine learning modellen binnen de Rijksoverheid neemt langzamerhand toe. Om toekomstbestendig te zijn heeft DICTU het AI-CC opgericht om machine learning opdrachten te kunnen opvangen. Het is hierbij van cruciaal belang dat er een senior ontwikkelaar/machine learning engineer bij betrokken is voor de ontwikkeling, implementatie en onderhoud van machine learning modellen.
     * Er is vertaling nodig van complexe Machine Learning naar bruikbare applicaties. ML-modellen zijn zelf niet zo heel bruikbaar als er geen applicatie omheen zit.
     * Er is iemand nodig die diep genoeg in de theorie zit om ML-modellen te kunnen maken en gebruiken en diep genoeg in applicatieontwikkeling om dit in een daadwerkelijke applicatie te bouwen.
     * ML is een heel ander vak dan normaal software engineering. Een 'normale' software engineer kun je dus niet inzetten om machine learning modellen en machine learning applicaties te maken.
     * Je denkt mee met opdrachtgevers over het implementeren van machine learning modellen.

* Het kunnen verzamelen, opschonen en evalueren van data en verbindingen maken met data bronnen
     * Het kunnen gebruiken van actuele frameworks zoals TensorFlow en Pytorch in Python 3.
     * Het gebruiken van diverse mobiele AI frameworks, zoals CreateML etc. etc. Je hebt kennis van AI-gerelateerde aspecten zoals ethiek, uitlegbaarheid en transparantie in de context van AI. Je bent in staat om deze aspecten mee te nemen in AI-toepassingen.
     * Je hebt affiniteit met informatiebeveiliging. Bereidheid tot het geven van presentaties, samen met de interne architect

       Business Analyst - Test Automation Engineer
       Are you passionate about improving cross-border payments and processes? Do you have experience in functional testing and test automation? Then we are looking for you!
       Tribe Account & Payment Factory
       The Tribe Account & Payment Factory is responsible for Payment and Current Account processing and related services. In the Area of Transaction Processing, we deliver fast, reliable, and efficient transaction processing 24/7. To ensure that our services are always available, we are also renewing the payment factory, simplifying our payment landscape, decommissioning legacy systems, and migrating to the new tech stack. High service availability is key, and for a short impression of our Tribe, have a look at this video .
       Your Role
       Within the Area Transaction Processing, the Cross-Border Payments squad is looking for a Business Analyst with a focus on test and test automation. You will strive to continuously improve cross-border payments and processes, ensuring the continuity of this critical payment chain. The Cross-Border team works closely with a team of specialists from our vendor, as it is a vendor-bought application (a rule-based payment engine) on-premises., As the Test Expert within our squad, you will ensure that the Test Strategy aligns with the goals of the bank and the team. You will be actively involved in functionally testing the application and aligning/executing tests with other parties in the critical product chain. Additionally, you will work on setting up and maintaining a testing framework.
          + Functional Testing: Perform functional testing activities and maintain test tooling, testing environments, and test sets.
          + Application Monitoring: Continuity of a critical application in the payment landscape. Monitor the application and analyze & solve production issues (e.g., ad hoc requests from colleagues, business, and other applications in the chain, analyzing logging, making queries, etc.).
          + Product Backlog: Create Product Backlog Items and deliver input for the Product Owner and Tech Lead.
          + Change Processes: Provide operational requirements, safeguard operability, maintainability, robustness, and performance.
       Your Talents

Vacaturetitel: Senior Quality Assurance Automation Engineer, IgniteTech (Remote) - $100,000/year USD
Functieomschrijving:
Are you ready to revolutionize software quality assurance? At IgniteTech, we're not just testing software-we're redefining the entire QA paradigm. We're seeking a Senior Quality Assurance Automation Engineer who can harness the power of AI to crush bugs before they're born and accelerate release cycles beyond what traditional methods can achieve.

   Imagine a world where 60% of software bugs aren't discovered post-release, and the industry doesn't lose $2 trillion annually to quality defects. That's the future we're building at IgniteTech, and we need your expertise to make it a reality. We're integrating cutting-edge GenAI tools into every facet of our QA process, and we're looking for a visionary who can lead this charge.

   This isn't your grandfather's QA role. If you're content with manual testing or writing the same automation scripts day in and day out, look elsewhere. We're after someone who can architect AI-driven frameworks, deploy predictive analytics, and shape the future of software quality. Ready to be at the forefront of the QA revolution? Your keyboard awaits.

   What you will be doing

     * Pioneer AI-powered test automation frameworks that generate comprehensive test cases, scripts, and data with unprecedented efficiency
     * Leverage GenAI tools to conduct deep analysis of testing outcomes, uncover hidden defect patterns, and drive continuous improvement
     * Design and implement AI-driven simulations of user scenarios, stress conditions, and edge cases to preemptively identify and neutralize potential issues

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Manually executing repetitive test cases that could be automated
     * Writing basic automation scripts without leveraging AI capabilities
     * Waiting for bugs to be reported by users or other teams
     * Focusing solely on functional testing without considering performance, security, or user experience, Drive the integration of AI and automation tools to dramatically accelerate product releases while significantly reducing defect rates, revolutionizing our approach to software quality assurance.

Vacaturetitel: Intermediate Backend Engineer, AI Powered: Duo Workflow (Python)
Functieomschrijving:
Gitlab Intermediate Backend Engineer, AI Powered: Duo Workflow (Python) in Netherlands

   Intermediate Backend Engineer, AI Powered: Duo Workflow (Python)

   Remote

   GitLab is an open core software company that develops the most comprehensive AI-powered DevSecOps Platform (https://about.gitlab.com/solutions/devops-platform) , used by more than 100,000 organizations. Our mission (https://about.gitlab.com/company/mission) is to enable everyone to contribute to and co-create the software that powers our world. When everyone can contribute, consumers become contributors, significantly accelerating the rate of human progress. This mission is integral to our culture, influencing how we hire, build products, and lead our industry. We make this possible at GitLab by running our operations (https://about.gitlab.com/handbook/using-gitlab-at-gitlab) on our product and staying aligned with our values (https://about.gitlab.com/handbook/values) . Learn more about Life at GitLab (https://vimeo.com/gitlab/gettoknowgitlab) .

   An overview of this role

   Are you confident that AI is going to change our daily work as developers? Do you want to play an active role in shaping that future? The Duo Workflow Group at Gitlab is creating the future of AI driven development (https://about.gitlab.com/blog/2024/06/27/meet-gitlab-duo-workflow-the-future-of-ai-driven-development/) at GitLab. At this moment we're building an AI-Powered coding agent to speed up routine tasks, to improve your work, or to learn different approaches or technologies. At the same time we're building the underlying platform to power AI driven workflows across GitLab.

   As our new Backend Engineer, you'll build out our core service written that hosts and coordinates our AI agents. You'll be involved in making sure the service follows up-to-date best practices for Python web development and orchestrating the communication between different services via gRPC as well as contributing to the core AI functionality. As a Python engineer through and through you'll spread your knowledge across a company where the main language is Ruby.

   Some examples of our projects:
     * Duo Workflow Architecture (https://handbook.gitlab.com/handbook/engineering/architecture/design-documents/duo_workflow/)
     * Componentizing Duo Workflow Graph (https://gitlab.com/gitlab-org/duo-workflow/duo-workflow-executor)

   What You'll Do
     * Write high-quality, efficient, and maintainable code while adhering to best practices and contributing to code reviews
     * Build a highly scalable web platform based on Python and gRPC that can be deployed in different environments.
     * Design and develop interactions with the latest LLMs.
     * Contribute to a testing infrastructure that allows us to verify agentic AI behaviours.
     * Embrace continuous learning and stay connected with industry best practices, tools, and technologies around AI to drive improvements in our software.
     * Advocate for improvements to product quality, security, and performance
     * Collaborate with more Senior Engineers on the architectural plans and technical designs ensuring scalability, performance, maintainability and measurability of our Duo Workflow platform.
     * Participate in Tier 2 or Tier 3 weekday, weekend, and/or occasional night on-call rotations (https://handbook.gitlab.com/handbook/engineering/development/processes/infra-dev-escalation/process/) to assist troubleshooting product operations, security operations, and urgent engineering issues., The Duo Workflow group (https://handbook.gitlab.com/handbook/engineering/development/data-science/ai-powered/duo-workflow/) is a team distributed across 3 continents but unified by the desire to shape the future of software engineering. We're hard at work creating a product and the infrastructure that changes development processes, building the tools of tomorrow.

   We're partnering with teams both within the AI space as well as all over GitLab to ensure that Duo Workflow can become the backbone of many AI features at GitLab.

   How GitLab will support you
     * Benefits to support your health, finances, and well-being (https://about.gitlab.com/handbook/total-rewards/benefits/general-and-entity-benefits/)
     * All remote (https://about.gitlab.com/company/culture/all-remote/guide/) , asynchronous (https://about.gitlab.com/company/culture/all-remote/asynchronous/) work environment
     * Flexible Paid Time Off (https://handbook.gitlab.com/handbook/people-group/paid-time-off/)
     * Team Member Resource Groups
     * Equity Compensation & Employee Stock Purchase Plan (https://handbook.gitlab.com/handbook/total-rewards/stock-options/)
     * Growth and Development Fund (https://handbook.gitlab.com/handbook/people-group/learning-and-development/growth-and-development/)
     * Parental leave (https://about.gitlab.com/handbook/total-rewards/benefits/general-and-entity-benefits/#parental-leave)
     * Home office (https://handbook.gitlab.com/handbook/finance/expenses/#equipment) support

   Please note that we welcome interest from candidates with varying levels of experience; many successful candidates do not meet every single requirement. Additionally, studies have shown that people from underrepresented groups (https://about.gitlab.com/company/culture/inclusion/#examples-of-select-underrepresented-groups) are less likely to apply to a job unless they meet every single qualification. If you're excited about this role, please apply and allow our recruiters to assess your application.

   Remote-Global

   Country Hiring Guidelines: GitLab hires new team members in countries around the world. All of our roles are remote, however some roles may carry specific location-based eligibility requirements. Our Talent Acquisition team can help answer any questions about location after starting the recruiting process.

   Privacy Policy: Please review our Recruitment Privacy Policy. (https://handbook.gitlab.com/handbook/hiring/candidate-faq/recruitment-privacy-policy/) Your privacy is important to us.

   GitLab is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. GitLab's policies and practices relating to recruitment, employment, career development and advancement, promotion, and retirement are based solely on merit, regardless of race, color, religion, ancestry, sex (including pregnancy, lactation, sexual orientation, gender identity, or gender expression), national origin, age, citizenship, marital status, mental or physical disability, genetic information (including family medical history), discharge status from the military, protected veteran status (which includes disabled veterans, recently separated veterans, active duty wartime or campaign badge veterans, and Armed Forces service medal veterans), or any other basis protected by law. GitLab will not tolerate discrimination or harassment based on any of these characteristics. See also GitLab's EEO Policy
   (https://about.gitlab.com/handbook/people-policies/inc-usa/#equal-employment-opportunity-policy) and EEO is the Law (https://about.gitlab.com/handbook/labor-and-employment-notices/#eeoc-us-equal-employment-opportunity-commission-notices) . If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation (https://about.gitlab.com/handbook/people-policies/inc-usa/#reasonable-accommodation) , please let us know during the recruiting process (https://about.gitlab.com/handbook/hiring/interviewing/#adjustments-to-our-interview-process) .

       We are looking for curious and empathetic individuals who are committed to developing themselves and learning new skills. We hire people based on an evaluation of their potential and support them throughout their time in Amsterdam. Come join us!
       The Team
       Within ING, there is ING Analytics (INGA) - a major driving force in its digital transformation of the bank.
       By creating measurable value for ING and its customers through world-class analytics products and services, INGA helps ING to become a leader in data-driven decision - making. Among others, INGA delivers call & speech analytics, generative AI in risk summarization, insights into portfolio performance, advanced ESG data insights (commercial purposes), data analytics platforms (cloud and on-premises), and many more.
       A working day in the life of a Data Engineer
       A typical day for a data engineer starts with coffee, catching up with colleagues, and drafting a plan for the coming day. After the standup, you will start exploring the data to solve business problems, building and maintaining the production-ready infrastructure, and building the data pipelines that clean, transform, and aggregate data from disparate sources. Being an advocate for best practices in data engineering is important while working on such tasks.
       After lunch, you organized a knowledge-sharing session to explain data security, compliance, and privacy standards to the rest of the data engineering team. Finally, to wrap up the day, you collaborated with the data science and analysts' teams to develop data models and pipelines for research, reporting, and machine learning.
       Roles and responsibilities

We are looking for a Data Engineer to join us in Amsterdam. I n this role, you will be responsible for designing, building, and optimizing complex data pipelines to process transactional and ot her data . Y ou will collaborate closely w ith data scientists and analysts in developing and maintaining data solutions and INGA's data architecture to support the next generation of products and data initiatives.
   We are looking for curious and empathetic individuals who are committed to developing themselves and learning new skills. We hire people based on an evaluation of their potential and support them throughout their time in Amsterdam. Come join us!

Our biggest expectation is that you'll stay curious. Keep learning. Take on responsibility. In return, we'll back you to develop into an even more awesome version of yourself.

We are looking for a Data Engineer and Tech Lead to join us in Amsterdam. As an engineer, you will be responsible for designing, building, and optimizing complex data pipelines to process transactional and other data. You will collaborate closely with data scientists and analysts in developing and maintaining data solutions and INGA's data architecture to support the next generation of products and data initiatives. As a tech lead, collaborate with product manager on the product roadmap, translate requirements into feasible technical solutions, ensure that the team follows (engineering) best practices, lead tech & architectural decisions, and establish the team's culture and way-of-working.

   We are looking for curious and empathetic individuals who are committed to developing themselves and learning new skills. We hire people based on an evaluation of their potential and support them throughout their time in Amsterdam. Come join us!

Als AI Engineer bij ilionx maak je AI praktisch én schaalbaar. Je werkt aan innovatieve oplossingen met een bewezen waarde voor onze klanten. Denk aan het automatiseren van besluitvorming met machine learning, het ontwikkelen van generatieve AI-oplossingen met LLM's of het integreren van beeld- en taalmodellen in bedrijfsprocessen.

Je schakelt moeiteloos tussen techniek en toepassing. Samen met data engineers, data scientists en cloudspecialisten bouw je aan oplossingen die niet in de la belanden, maar daadwerkelijk draaien in productieomgevingen. Je werkt met Azure AI, OpenAI, ML Studio en Databricks, en je weet hoe je AI inricht als onderdeel van een schaalbare data-architectuur.

Je werkt zowel zelfstandig als in teamverband aan unieke projecten, waarbij je jouw kennis van generatieve AI inzet om bedrijfsprocessen te verbeteren. In samenwerking met onze klanten ontwikkel en implementeer je oplossingen en strategieën die aansluiten op hun specifieke uitdagingen en doelstellingen. Met jouw ervaring draag je bij aan de vertaalslag van strategische doelen naar praktische, duurzame resultaten.

   Een pré is als je daarnaast technische vaardigheden hebt of wilt ontwikkelen om AI-toepassingen nog beter op klantvraagstukken toe te snijden.

* Workshops & Inspirerend Advies: Je geeft workshops waarin je bedrijven laat zien hoe generatieve AI hun bedrijfsdoelen kan ondersteunen.
     * Ontwikkelen van AI-strategieën: Je analyseert klantbehoeften en ontwikkelt strategische roadmaps gericht op generatieve AI, waarbij verantwoord en ethisch gebruik centraal staat.
     * Projectmanagement en Implementatie: Je leidt de implementatie van AI-oplossingen en zorgt voor een naadloze integratie in bestaande systemen. Hierbij begeleid je klanten stap voor stap bij het gebruik van deze technologie.
     * Langdurige Klantrelaties: Na implementatie blijf je betrokken om klanten te ondersteunen in het gebruik van generatieve AI en te informeren over nieuwe ontwikkelingen binnen het veld.

Als AI/ML Engineer bij Inpact ben je onderdeel van een ambitieus Feature Team dat gespecialiseerd is in het bouwen van innovatieve AI-oplossingen voor de verzekeringssector. Samen met collega-experts werk je aan geavanceerde technologieën zoals Natural Language Processing (NLP), Machine Learning (ML) en Deep Learning (DL). Dagelijks werkt het feature team aan Inpact.AI, om verzekeringsprofessionals te helpen om snel en effectief grote hoeveelheden data te verwerken, waaronder polissen, claims, rapporten, e-mails, PDF's, afbeeldingen en andere vormen van digitale informatie.

   In jouw rol ontwerp, ontwikkel en implementeer je ook nieuwe baanbrekende AI-modellen en oplossingen-zoals Large Language Models (LLM's) in combinatie met Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG). Je werkt nauw samen met jouw team aan het optimaliseren van prestaties, verhogen van schaalbaarheid en het realiseren van tastbare resultaten die impact hebben.

Gewoon goed werk is hier heel normaal
       Zie jij het werken aan de beste insurtech software van Nederland als de normaalste zaak van de wereld? Mooi, wij ook!
       Als AI/ML Engineer bij Inpact ben je onderdeel van een ambitieus Feature Team dat gespecialiseerd is in het bouwen van innovatieve AI-oplossingen voor de verzekeringssector. Samen met collega-experts werk je aan geavanceerde technologieën zoals Natural Language Processing (NLP), Machine Learning (ML) en Deep Learning (DL). Dagelijks werkt het feature team aan Inpact.AI, om verzekeringsprofessionals te helpen om snel en effectief grote hoeveelheden data te verwerken, waaronder polissen, claims, rapporten, e-mails, PDF's, afbeeldingen en andere vormen van digitale informatie.
       In jouw rol ontwerp, ontwikkel en implementeer je ook nieuwe baanbrekende AI-modellen en oplossingen-zoals Large Language Models (LLM's) in combinatie met Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG). Je werkt nauw samen met jouw team aan het optimaliseren van prestaties, verhogen van schaalbaarheid en het realiseren van tastbare resultaten die impact hebben.
       Een normale dag bij Inpact
       Bij Inpact helpen we verzekeraars innoveren, zodat zij tijd en focus overhouden voor het échte werk. Als AI/ML Engineer bouw je mee aan de toekomst van verzekeren. Zonder poespas, mét resultaat. Ja, we zijn ambitieus. Maar hier geen overmatig werken of competitie over functietitels. Grote ego's laten we buiten, grootse plannen verwelkomen we met open armen. Daarom nemen we ook aan op ambitie, in plaats van op ervaring. Ons team bestaat uit een hechte club van 100 nuchtere collega's (waarvan zeker 70 tech-specialisten) met een passie voor technologie, AI en Data Science. We doen niet aan gedoe, we doen vooral heel normaal terwijl we complexe data omzetten naar waardevolle inzichten voor verzekeraars.
       Zo bouw jij mee aan de toekomst van verzekeren

Als Data Engineer / AI Engineer ben je verantwoordelijk voor het ontwikkelen, beheren en verbeteren van onze data- en AI-infrastructuur. Je werkt nauw samen met ons data science team, de IT-afdeling en verschillende business units om schaalbare oplossingen te leveren.

   Je bent onder meer verantwoordelijk voor:
     * Data pipelines: Ontwerpen, bouwen en onderhouden van data pipelines op ons Snowflake platform, die onze Tableau-rapportages voeden via een semantische laag.
     * Generatieve AI: Overdracht en doorontwikkeling van projecten zoals de GenAI Suite en de Klus Coach (een generatieve AI-assistent voor klanten).
     * Data Science ondersteuning: Beheer van Dataiku-projecten en ondersteuning van data science-initiatieven.
     * Linux serverbeheer: Verantwoordelijkheid voor het onderhouden van een Linux-omgeving die cruciaal is voor onze AI-infrastructuur.

We are seeking a End-to-end Engineer to design, build, and deploy cutting-edge solutions for a client in the financial sector.

   As a End-to-end Engineer, you will collaborate with internal teams and clients to develop innovative solutions. You will be responsible for end-to-end solution delivery, from design to deployment, ensuring they meet high standards of quality and cost-effectiveness.

   Your Responsibilities:
     * Work directly with stakeholders to understand processes and system requirements.
     * Design and implement responsible and cost-effective GenAI solutions.
     * Develop reusable components from the solutions you create.
     * Collaborate with team members through pair-programming to tackle critical challenges.

   Design, build, test, deploy, and run GenAI-based solutions that are robust and maintainable.
     * Continuously automate processes and workflows to enhance productivity and scalability.
     * Share knowledge and collaborate with peers and stakeholders to improve solutions and practices across the board.

* Machine learning research pipeline development
     * Model research and enhancements
     * Financial data research and development
     * Model evaluation and visualization

Ontwikkelen, implementeren en onderhouden van schaalbare en veilige back-end oplossingen met behulp van ASP.NET Core en Python.
   - Ontwerpen en bouwen van RESTful API's voor integratie met verschillende front-end systemen.
   - Samenwerken met andere ontwikkelaars en architecten om oplossingen te ontwerpen volgens SOLID- en MVC-principes.
   - Werken met Azure voor deployment, resource management en schaalbaarheid.
   - Bijdragen aan CI/CD-processen met GitHub Actions en versiebeheer met GitHub.
   - Ondersteunen van cross-functionele teams bij het integreren van back-end diensten in een microservice architectuur.

Ben jij een enthousiaste en gedreven Back-End Developer die graag werkt met de nieuwste technologieën? Heb je ervaring met API-ontwikkeling, ASP.NET Core, en Python, en wil je bijdragen aan uitdagende projecten in een innovatieve omgeving? Bij MvR Digital Workforce zoeken we een Medior Back-End Developer om ons team te versterken.

* Ontwikkelen, implementeren en onderhouden van schaalbare en veilige back-end oplossingen met behulp van ASP.NET Core en Python.
     * Ontwerpen en bouwen van RESTful API's voor integratie met verschillende front-end systemen.
     * Samenwerken met andere ontwikkelaars en architecten om oplossingen te ontwerpen volgens SOLID- en MVC-principes.
     * Werken met Azure voor deployment, resource management en schaalbaarheid.
     * Bijdragen aan CI/CD-processen met GitHub Actions en versiebeheer met GitHub.
     * Ondersteunen van cross-functionele teams bij het integreren van back-end diensten in een microservice architectuur.

Volg jij een HBO/WO-studie in een data AI- gerelateerde richting en wil je meewerken aan innovatieve oplossingen binnen een sportieve werkomgeving? Als AI Engineer werkstudent maak je deel uit van een AI-innovatie team en draag je direct bij aan vernieuwing in de sportsector. Klaar om jouw kennis in te zetten en mee te bouwen aan een sportiever Nederland? Neem dan contact met ons op!

    Het bedrijf

    *De sportorganisatie is een overkoepelende organisatie voor de georganiseerde sport in Nederland en heeft als missie om Nederland tegen 2032 het sportiefste land ter wereld te maken. Dit doen ze door het ondersteunen van sportbonden, het begeleiden van topsportprogramma's, het uitvoeren van sportonderzoek en het versterken van de maatschappelijke waarde van sport. Samen met diverse partners zet de organisatie zich in om de impact van sport te vergroten.In deze functie kom je te werken op de afdeling Informatie Management. Deze afdeling speelt een cruciale rol in het ondersteunen van diverse afdelingen, waaronder Topsport (inclusief TeamNL), Breedtesport en het Centrum Veilige Sport Nederland. Hier worden innovatieve oplossingen ontwikkeld en diensten geleverd om de ambities van de organisatie te realiseren. *

Als AI Engineer werkstudent kom je te werken binnen de afdeling Informatie Management, waar je onderdeel wordt van het nieuw op te richten AI-innovatie team. Dit team heeft als doel om AI-toepassingen te ontwikkelen en uiteindelijk te implementeren, zodat deze aan het einde van het jaar breed binnen de organisatie worden gebruikt. Hiermee willen ze de productiviteit en kwaliteit van de werkorganisatie naar een hoger niveau tillen en een nieuwe standaard zetten in de sportsector.In eerste instantie zullen je werkzaamheden een sterk innovatief karakter hebben. Je zult problemen en verbeteringen identificeren om vervolgens de juiste AI tools te kiezen als onderdeel van de oplossing. Dit betekent puzzelen, experimenteren en vernieuwend bezig zijn om oplossingen te creëren die direct impact hebben op de werknemers en processen binnen het bedrijf. Verder houd je je bezig met het

* Creating and maintaining assets and components with java, Mendix and other technologies to leverage usage and/or integrate with external (cloud) platforms.
     * Closely collaborating with customers and partners to create innovative products that bring cloud-and external platform capabilities into Mendix web applications.
     * Working on an Enterprise App development platform and we're in it for the long haul. Thousands of developers and millions of end users across the globe rely on your work and each commit can make a lot of impact.
     * Diving into all sorts of technologies to integrate our platform with external systems. While our current focus is on Mendix with Java, we also utilize REST APIs, Python, and cloud technologies, and are open to adopting any new technology necessary to achieve our goals.

Purpose of the job:* Key role in driving the success of Data Engineering from ideation to the delivery of industry-leading products and solutions. * A go-to expert for troubleshooting and resolving performance and reliability issues in data workflows.
     * Opslaan, End-to-end responsibility for building data pipelines (preferably Azure; Databricks experience is a significant advantage).

   Balance common sense with state-of-the-art technology to achieve results in a dynamic, complex and international business environment.

   Act as the technical lead for projects across various departments, including derivatives trading, supply chain, risk management, finance, and trade.

   Coach junior IT colleagues on development standards, CI/CD processes, and code documentation.

   Ensure robust implementation of data governance frameworks, including access controls, data lineage, and compliance with regulations.Result area:

   Manage strategic architecture choices, security, resource efficiency (cost and optimization), and technology exploration to scale data operations within the company.

   Implement architecture and technology solutions that enable data-driven decision-making across departments.

   Support a high-performing IT team through coaching and knowledge-sharing, ensuring adherence to development and engineering standards.

Vacaturetitel: Senior Staff, Forward Deployed AI Engineer
Functieomschrijving:
Such transformations are very time intensive and often risky. Tooling based on generative AI promises to accelerate these transformations in a way never seen before. Field Engineering is responsible for exploring the possibilities of Generative AI technologies and providing invaluable feedback to MongoDB's R&D teams to drive future capabilities of MongoDB and the MongoDB ecosystem.

   Application Modernization Field Engineers will work alongside project teams that are executing Application Modernisation projects with customers. The successful candidate will be responsible for evaluation, build, and applying tools in modernization projects, facilitating the usage of such tools and processes across the different project teams, identifying opportunities for tooling deployment, selecting potential 3rd party tools, contributing to the development of tooling prototypes and helping to shape the product roadmap., * Contribute to customer application modernization initiatives at any or all phases of the application lifecycle: assessment and analysis; planning and design; data modeling; application code conversion, development, test and build; integration and release configuration, production operations, application optimisation, and best practices adoption
     * Test drive MongoDB migration products to deliver on customer use cases and drive adoption of the product. Deliver concise feedback to the rest of the development organisation
     * Work closely with Product and Engineering teams to influence the direction of the MongoDB product roadmap
     * Personally execute well-defined, outcome-focused projects, POC, MVP and everything in between. POCs including developing or extending existing tools when necessary and appropriate for customer success, with an eye towards reusability and eventual integration with our products. These are often on premises at client locations
     * Maintain a broad and deep technical understanding of the product line and the underlying technologies and protocols
     * Work as part of a wider delivery team comprising consulting engineers from MongoDB Professional Services, project managers, and account teams
     * Assist sales teams in evaluating opportunities with prospects and customers
     * Willingness to work on site with customers for 7 days per month and to travel to Australia two weeks per year to collaborate with the Product development team

   Success Measures

   The Senior Application Modernization Engineer will be successful in this role when they can execute the following strategic tasks/responsibilities:
     * Become an expert level user of MongoDB, and our tools current migration products
     * Develop a playbook for customer application modernization engagements, in collaboration with other MongoDB Engineers, Product Management and Engineering
     * Communicate complex technical proposals simply and convincingly to a wide range of audiences
     * Provide unique insight into customer needs, product requirements and strategic opportunities by contributing experience from the field
     * Gain the reputation as a trusted advisor with our field teams and customers
     * Contribute to the success of customer application migration initiatives that they support

The Firefox team is a community of engineers who care deeply about delivering the fastest, friendliest, most usable browser possible. We are responsible for making the things you see in the browser work securely, quickly, and well! We are looking for a Staff Machine Learning Engineer to help us develop and grow new Generative AI driven products and tools. You will play a key role in enabling safe and healthy machine learning and Generative AI driven experiences in Firefox., A Staff Engineer is the next level from a Senior Engineer. At Mozilla this role can vary but typically a Staff Engineer is a domain expert who leads others within a single team to tackle multi-month projects. Tasks that may be initially ambiguous or require significant planning and require them to influence or direct the work of several engineers. They sequence deliverables and manage risks in their team's projects, provide feedback on our strategy and goals affecting the team, and turn our strategy into action for their team members. Staff Engineers mentor others by stewarding some responsibilities to more junior and senior engineers so they can take on new ones. They collaborate with management on building team consensus and providing direction. Staff Engineers identify gaps and opportunities for improvement to enable a culture of inclusion and allyship, at all levels of the organization.

   What You'll Do

   Lead the design, development, and integration of Generative AI solutions in Firefox, collaborating cross functionally with product management, full stack engineering and design.
   Build infrastructure for training and inference of LLMs and small language and vision models for use cases on the web and mobile Firefox product experiences.
   Implement robust validation and testing procedures to ensure the developed models' generalizability and reliability
   Continuously monitor and optimize deployed models for performance and efficiency

Vacaturetitel: Big Data Engineer for AI Training
Functieomschrijving:
Outlier helps the world's most innovative companies improve their AI models by providing human feedback. Are you an experienced software engineer who would like to lend your coding expertise to train AI models?
       We partner with organizations to train AI large language models, helping cutting-edge generative AI models write better code. Projects typically include discrete, highly variable problems that involve engaging with these models as they learn to code. There is no requirement for previous AI experience.
       About the opportunity:
          + Outlier is looking for talented coders to help train generative artificial intelligence models
          + This freelance opportunity is remote and hours are flexible, so you can work whenever is best for you
       You may contribute your expertise by
          + Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models
          + Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models

Outlier helpt 's werelds meest innovatieve bedrijven bij het verbeteren van hun AI-modellen door menselijke feedback te leveren. Ben jij een ervaren software-engineer die zijn of haar expertise in codering wil inzetten om AI-modellen te trainen?
       Wij werken samen met organisaties om grote taalkundige AI-modellen te trainen en helpen geavanceerde generatieve AI-modellen betere code te schrijven. De projecten bevatten meestal afgebakende, zeer gevarieerde problemen die interactie vereisen met deze modellen terwijl ze leren coderen. Er is geen eerdere ervaring met AI vereist.

Outlier is op zoek naar getalenteerde programmeurs om te helpen bij het trainen van generatieve AI-modellen.
       Deze freelance-opdracht kan volledig op afstand worden uitgevoerd en biedt flexibele werkuren, zodat je kunt werken wanneer het jou het beste uitkomt.
       Jouw mogelijke bijdragen:
          + Het maken en beantwoorden van vragen met betrekking tot informatica om AI-modellen te helpen trainen.
          + Het evalueren en rangschikken van code die door AI-modellen wordt gegenereerd.

   Jouw mogelijke bijdragen:
     * Het maken en beantwoorden van vragen met betrekking tot informatica om AI-modellen te helpen trainen.
     * Het evalueren en rangschikken van code die door AI-modellen wordt gegenereerd.

Outlier helps the world's most innovative companies improve their AI models by providing human feedback. Are you an experienced software engineer who would like to lend your coding expertise to train AI models?
       We partner with organizations to train AI large language models, helping cutting-edge generative AI models write better code. Projects typically include discrete, highly variable problems that involve engaging with these models as they learn to code. There is no requirement for previous AI experience.
       About the opportunity:
          + Outlier is looking for talented coders to help train generative artificial intelligence models
          + This freelance opportunity is remote and hours are flexible, so you can work whenever is best for you
       You may contribute your expertise by
          + Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models
          + Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models

   Deze freelance-opdracht kan volledig op afstand worden uitgevoerd en biedt flexibele werkuren, zodat je kunt werken wanneer het jou het beste uitkomt.

Outlier is op zoek naar getalenteerde programmeurs om te helpen bij het trainen van generatieve AI-modellen.

   Deze freelance-opdracht kan volledig op afstand worden uitgevoerd en biedt flexibele werkuren, zodat je kunt werken wanneer het jou het beste uitkomt.
