Vacaturetitel: Senior Software Engineer, DevSecOps Release Mgmt, R&D Digital Products
Functieomschrijving:
Your Role : We are looking for an innovation-centric Senior Software Engineer, DevSecOps Release Management ( R&D ) to join our IT R&D (Research & Development) Team who is passionate about leading the O rganizational T ransformation in developing DevSecOps tooling, practices, and culture for Genmab's Research and Development Department . You will contribute to R&D-wide DevSecOps requirements and ensure adoption of same, including observability, scalability, availability, security, cost performance. The Senior Software Engineer will also be responsible for DevSecOps technical expertise in Product-oriented-delivery teams, and ensuring that the PODs are executed on time , working with a team of architects and developers . The Senior Software Engineer will support R esearch , Discovery and D evelopment activities and leverage DevSecOps tool kits such as GitLab SaaS v ersion control software, Terraform, Cloud Formation, to ensure smooth and secure delivery of R&D
   Digital Products, build and deploy scalable and resilient applications. The Senior Software Engineer, DevSecOps Release Management will be instrumental in maintaining robust CI/CD pipelines, enhancing security practices, optimizing cloud resource managemen t , driving operational efficiency and success for the R&D Organization.

   This position will be based out of our Princeton, NJ , Copenhagen, DK or Utrecht, NL and onsite 60% .

   Your Responsibility :
     * Develop and maintain CI/CD pipelines using GitLab to streamline testing, deployment, and monitoring of applications and their associated infrastructure for software applications and systems used by the R&D Organization for R&D functions such as Research Informatics, SDMS (Scientific Data Management System), Lab Management Systems, Lab and Data Integrations, Research Data products, Pathology, Imaging, Pharmacology, Development Operations etc.
     * Lead Dev Sec Ops design and execution for IT R&D applications, working with DevSecOps CoE and Infrastructure/Operations team using the likes of GitLab, Kubernetes, AWS Cloud Formation, AWS Systems Manager, AWS Config, etc.
     * Architect and manage infrastructure as code, utilizing tools like Terraform, Ansible, or similar, to provision and manage resources across cloud environments.

     * Implement and manage CI/CD pipelines , containerization with modular architecture using microservices, infrastructure provisioning and management, ensuring rapid and reliable application deployment.
     * Optimize cloud resource utilization by designing and implementing efficient automation scripts , monitoring resources , and proactively addressing resource-related issues.
     * Establish and enforce Dev Sec Ops best practices, including version control, code review, automated testing, and deployment strategies for continuous integration, continuous delivery, and automated testing.
     * Collaborate with Security and Compliance teams to ensure teams are adhering to industry best practices and regulatory requirements. Create and maintain automated security testing tools to identify vulnerabilities and security risks , collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure security practices align with industry standards.
     * E xecute vulnerability assessment, threat modeling, compliance standards, security automation, secure coding practices, adhering to best practices for GxP, GDPR and other regulatory compliance.
     * Monitor and analyze DevSecOps pipelines and practices, identifying areas for improvement, optimization, and automation to enhance launch/failback consistency and accuracy.
     * Identify opportunities to use AI tools in DevSecOps related tasks such as Application Security and monitoring, testing (unit, integration, SAST, DAST), integrating security in DevSecOps pipeline, monitoring vulnerabilities, reporting security issues for driving productivity and efficiency.
     * Collaborate with multidisciplinary teams including colleagues from Data & Analytics, Data Science & AI and Infrastructure Platform Engineering teams, Technical Product Owners, Technical Delivery leads, developers, data engineers, visualization engineers, data scientists, AI/ML e ngineers, b ioinformaticians, understand R&D domain-specific requirements and translate them into DevSecOps technical delivery.
     * Embrace the Agile framework and Product-oriented-delivery , the iterative and incremental approach for solving technical problems to deliver IT R&D Digital products .
     * Contribute to documentation, knowledge sharing within the engineering tea m and clearly communicate the function of release automation specifications , and procedures .
     * Keep up to date with emerging data technologies, trends, and best practices, and make recommendations for their adoption within the Organization's DevSecOps ecosystem.
     * Play a pivotal role in enabling infrastructure automation for application deployment, continuous improvement , and optimization of infrastructure, monitor and manage the cloud resources and coordinate/collaborate across teams within IT to empower our scientists and researchers in R&D.

The Privacy Engineering team is looking for a Fullstack Developer to deliver the next generation of our Privacy by Design process, which will focus on automating privacy compliance tasks.The Privacy Engineering function is part of the Product Trust team that works on addressing Privacy, Security, and OSS from the earliest stages of the product development lifecycle. As a member of this team, you will become the subject matter expert for privacy but can also expand into the license compliance and security domains. You will work with a global team to build infrastructure, automation tooling, drive improvement to compliance, and inform best practices for development teams., The privacy engineering team is looking to expand the team's skillset into full-stack development, with the goal of optimizing and automating the privacy compliance process with new tools:
     * Automation of privacy management : Design and develop tools and infrastructure to help privacy specialists, developers, product owners, product managers, account executives achieve privacy compliance. Design and develop tools to facilitate compliance verification and auditing.
     * Privacy by Design : Optimize how different stakeholders interface with the privacy by design process, . by automating manual tasks, in alignment with the broader Product Trust processes. Shape company-wide processes to integrate privacy by design principles and 'shift privacy left' in the product development lifecycle.
     * Privacy Scanners: develop privacy risk estimation scanner both analyzing data and code such as automatic detection of directly and indirectly identifiable information. Build infrastructure and tools to collect privacy-related metadata. Analyze metadata to produce insights for executives and decision makers.
     * Privacy Architecture and Privacy-aware Product Design: Support product designers and architect implementing privacy by design principles such as data minimization or implementing privacy enhancing techniques. Bridge team and compliance needs by defining appropriate privacy mitigations in collaboration with the Privacy Office.

The Create: Code Creations team builds AI-powered tools that suggest intelligent code to developers, enhancing their efficiency, and enabling outstanding software. We are expanding our generative AI capabilities to build APIs integrating large language models (LLMs). This team balances backend engineering, prompt engineering, and creative approaches to new challenges.

   As an Intermediate Engineer, your journey involves immersing yourself in our innovative codebase, contributing high-quality code, and actively participating in collaborative code reviews. Embrace the opportunity to work alongside experienced team members, honing your skills and contributing to a culture of continuous learning. Take on challenges by investigating and resolving technical issues, demonstrating your problem-solving prowess. Engage in feature development, collaborating with cross-functional teams to bring ideas to life. Your role is pivotal in shaping the future of our product, ensuring it meets the highest standards of quality and innovation. As you grow in your technical journey, you'll play a key role in mentoring junior team members and contributing to the collective knowledge through documentation. Join us at GitLab, where your skills and passion for development will make a lasting impact on our collaborative and forward-thinking team!

   Some examples of our projects:
     * Building an AI-powered Code Suggestion feature (https://gitlab.com/groups/gitlab-org/-/epics/10854)
     * New service to scan repositories for context to make suggestions better (https://gitlab.com/groups/gitlab-org/-/epics/11733)
     * Improving Duo Chat by adding features to explain code and write tests (https://gitlab.com/groups/gitlab-org/-/epics/11734)

   What you'll do
     * Develop features and improvements to the GitLab product in a secure, well-tested, and performant way.
     * Collaborate with Product Management and other stakeholders within Engineering (Frontend, UX, etc.) to maintain a high bar for quality in a fast-paced, iterative environment.
     * Advocate for improvements to product quality, security, and performance.
     * Solve technical problems of moderate scope and complexity.
     * Craft code that meets our internal standards for style, maintainability, and best practices for a high-scale web environment. Maintain and advocate for these standards through code review.
     * Recognize impediments to our efficiency as a team ("technical debt"), propose and implement solutions.
     * Represent GitLab and its values in public communication around specific projects and community contributions.
     * Ship small features and improvements with minimal guidance and support from other team members. Collaborate with the team on larger projects.
     * Participate in Tier 2 or Tier 3 weekday and weekend and occasional night on-call rotations to assist troubleshooting product operations, security operations, and urgent engineering issues, The team at GitLab is dedicated to fostering a collaborative and innovative development environment. They actively contribute to creating high-quality code, emphasizing best practices and continuous improvement. For a detailed insight into their processes and workflows, you can explore the team's handbook pages here (https://about.gitlab.com/handbook/engineering/development/dev/create/code-creation/) . This resource provides a comprehensive guide to their approach in code creation, including coding standards, code review processes, and collaborative development practices. Joining this team means being part of a culture that values excellence, open communication, and the ongoing evolution of development methodologies

   How GitLab will support you
     * Benefits to support your health, finances, and well-being (https://about.gitlab.com/handbook/total-rewards/benefits/general-and-entity-benefits/)
     * All remote (https://about.gitlab.com/company/culture/all-remote/guide/) , asynchronous (https://about.gitlab.com/company/culture/all-remote/asynchronous/) work environment
     * Flexible Paid Time Off (https://about.gitlab.com/handbook/paid-time-off/)
     * Team Member Resource Groups
     * Equity Compensation & Employee Stock Purchase Plan (https://about.gitlab.com/handbook/stock-options/)
     * Growth and development budget (https://about.gitlab.com/handbook/total-rewards/benefits/general-and-entity-benefits/#growth-and-development-benefit)
     * Parental leave (https://about.gitlab.com/handbook/total-rewards/benefits/general-and-entity-benefits/#parental-leave)
     * Home office (https://about.gitlab.com/handbook/finance/procurement/office-equipment-supplies/) support

   Please note that we welcome interest from candidates with varying levels of experience; many successful candidates do not meet every single requirement. Additionally, studies have shown that people from underrepresented groups (https://about.gitlab.com/company/culture/inclusion/#examples-of-select-underrepresented-groups) are less likely to apply to a job unless they meet every single qualification. If you're excited about this role, please apply and allow our recruiters to assess your application.

   Country Hiring Guidelines: GitLab hires new team members in countries around the world. All of our roles are remote, however some roles may carry specific location-based eligibility requirements. Our Talent Acquisition team can help answer any questions about location after starting the recruiting process.

   Privacy Policy: Please review our Recruitment Privacy Policy. (https://about.gitlab.com/handbook/hiring/candidate/faq/recruitment-privacy-policy/) Your privacy is important to us.

We are part of the Security and Privacy Engineering organization in Google Devices and Services and our goal is to embed and support robust security and privacy practices throughout the product life cycle, ensuring the trustworthiness of the devices, apps, software services, and platforms that Devices and Services teams develop and maintain. This includes popular brands such as Pixel, Nest, and Fitbit.

   Our product security team is composed of defensive and offensive security engineers that prevent, detect, and mitigate vulnerabilities across a variety of product lines and services. We collaborate with multiple product development teams on system design, hardening, code analysis, security testing, and other security assurance functions with the goal of minimizing the risk of abuse and increasing the cost of vulnerability exploitation. In addition to our work with other Google groups, we are connected to the security community through our vulnerability rewards programs and conferences.

   As an Offensive Security Engineer, you will join our offensive security program for Made-by-Google devices that are powered by Android, GenAI features, and other technologies. The program's scope is broad and covers system software, SoC, wireless communications, Trusted Execution Environments (TEE), and other subsystems. You will focus on device software security and will contribute to individuals as well as collaborative projects, including security research and red-team exercises, with the goal of discovering and proving product deficiencies at the implementation and design levels. You'll also evaluate the security of fundamental building blocks (first-party and third-party) on existing products and new products., * Define and drive offensive security projects involving new device features and critical product subsystems.
     * Conduct security research in areas of high security risk, which may involve testing, design analysis, and other activities.
     * Find and experimentally demonstrate the exploitability of vulnerabilities.
     * Identify novel attack vectors and techniques, and present them to internal and external audiences.
     * Contribute to the planning and execution of red-team engagements, propose solutions to security issues, and contribute to the design of mechanisms to mitigate or eliminate the risks.

As an Offensive Security Engineer, you will join our offensive security program for Made-by-Google devices that are powered by Android, GenAI features, and other technologies. The program's scope is broad and covers system software, SoC, wireless communications, Trusted Execution Environments (TEE), and other subsystems. You will focus on device software security and will contribute to individual as well as collaborative projects, including security research and red-team exercises, with the goal of discovering and proving product deficiencies at the implementation and design levels. You will also evaluate the security of fundamental building blocks (first-party and third-party) on existing products and new products., * Define and drive offensive security projects involving new device features and critical product subsystems.
     * Conduct security research in areas of high security risk, which may involve testing, system analysis, code review/analysis, and other activities.
     * Contribute to the planning and execution of red-team engagements, propose solutions to security issues and contribute to the design of mechanisms to mitigate or eliminate the risks
     * Find and experimentally demonstrate the exploitability of vulnerabilities.
     * Identify novel attack vectors and techniques and present them to internal and external audiences.

Vacaturetitel: Offensive Security Engineer, Device Wireless Connectivity
Functieomschrijving:
We are part of the Security and Privacy Engineering organization in Google Devices and Services and our goal is to embed and support robust security and privacy practices throughout the product life cycle, ensuring the trustworthiness of the devices, apps, software services, and platforms that our product area develops and maintains. This includes popular brands such as Pixel, Nest, Fitbit, and Chromecast.

   Our product security team is composed of defensive and offensive security engineers that prevent, detect, and mitigate vulnerabilities across a variety of product lines and services. We collaborate with product development teams on system design, hardening, code analysis, security testing, and other security assurance functions with the goal of minimizing the risk of abuse and increasing the cost of vulnerability exploitation. In addition to our work with other Google groups, we are connected to the security community through our vulnerability rewards programs and conferences.

   As an Offensive Security Engineer, you will join our offensive security program for Made-by-Google devices that are powered by Android, GenAI features, and other technologies. The program's scope is broad and covers system software, SoC, wireless communications, Trusted Execution Environments (TEE), and other subsystems. You will focus on device wireless connectivity security and will contribute to individual as well as collaborative projects, including security research and red-team exercises, with the goal of discovering and proving product deficiencies at the implementation and design levels. You'll also evaluate the security of fundamental building blocks in hardware, firmware, and software (first-party and third-party) that power existing and new connected devices like phones, tablets, devices, cameras, content streamers, and other smart home products.
     * Define and drive offensive security projects on connected devices including their wireless components, features, and associated subsystems.
     * Conduct security research in areas of high security risk and contribute to the planning and execution of red-team engagements.
     * Find and experimentally demonstrate the exploitability of attack vectors and vulnerabilities on the device wireless communication stack.
     * Propose solutions to security issues and contribute to the design of mechanisms to mitigate or eliminate the risks.
     * Identify and drive projects to automate the team's offensive security work.

Vacaturetitel: Technical Writer, Privacy Sandbox Developer Relations
Functieomschrijving:
* Ervaring met het onderhouden en monitoren van servers.
     * Je bent bekend met data center of netwerk beheer omgevingen.
     * Je bent sterk in het samenwerken met teams in problemen op te lossen.

About the job

   Het 'Hardware Operations' team beheert, repareert en bouwt de fysieke infrastructuur achter Google's Search technologie. Als Data Center Technician Apprentice (stagiair) zal je verantwoordelijk zijn voor het bouwen en onderhouden van Google's geavanceerde data center server en netwerk infrastructuur. Je zal werken aan de fysieke plaatsing van datacenter gerelateerde technologie en je zal hecht samenwerken met iedereen die verantwoordelijk is voor de infrastructuur.

   Tijdens je tijd in deze rol zal je geïntroduceerd worden tot de wijdere technologische wereld van Google. Je zal de kans krijgen om jezelf te ontwikkelen binnen Hardware Operations of om meer te leren over software ontwikkeling, netwerkbeheer of project management.

   Let op dat het hier gaat om een stage voor het praktijk onderdeel van een MBO ICT opleiding. Google is een erkend leerbedrijf onder de regels van het SBB.

   Google is, en zal altijd, een ontwikkelbedrijf zijn. We nemen mensen aan met een brede set van technische vaardigheden en die bereid zijn om te werken aan de grootste technologische uitdagingen die impact hebben op miljoenen, mogelijk miljarden, gebruikers. Bij Google werken ontwikkelaars niet alleen aan revoluties voor Search maar ook de schaalvergroting van data opslag, grote applicaties en compleet nieuwe platformen voor ontwikkelaars over de hele wereld. Van Google Ads tot Google Chrome, van Android tot YouTube, Social naar Local, Google ontwikkelaars werken aan veranderingen van de wereld, één technologische prestatie na de andere., * Het installeren van servers, switches, routers en andere netwerkapparatuur.
     * Het helpen met het testen en troubleshooten van server en netwerk apparatuur/onderdelen.
     * Configureren en troubleshooten van Linux besturingssysteem problemen.
     * Het oplossen van problemen met defecte apparatuur met weinig tot geen hulp., To all recruitment agencies: Google does not accept agency resumes. Please do not forward resumes to our jobs alias, Google employees, or any other organization location. Google is not responsible for any fees related to unsolicited resumes.

The Privacy Engineering team is looking for a Fullstack Developer to deliver the next generation of our Privacy by Design process, which will focus on automating privacy compliance tasks.The Privacy Engineering function is part of the Product Trust team that works on addressing Privacy, Security, and OSS from the earliest stages of the product development lifecycle. As a member of this team, you will become the subject matter expert for privacy but can also expand into the license compliance and security domains. You will work with a global team to build infrastructure, automation tooling, drive improvement to compliance, and inform best practices for development teams.

   Role:

   The privacy engineering team is looking to expand the team's skillset into full-stack development, with the goal of optimizing and automating the privacy compliance process with new tools:

     * Automation of privacy management: Design and develop tools and infrastructure to help privacy specialists, developers, product owners, product managers, account executives achieve privacy compliance. Design and develop tools to facilitate compliance verification and auditing.
     * Privacy by Design: Optimize how different stakeholders interface with the privacy by design process, e.g. by automating manual tasks, in alignment with the broader Product Trust processes. Shape company-wide processes to integrate privacy by design principles and 'shift privacy left' in the product development lifecycle.
     * Privacy Scanners: develop privacy risk estimation scanner both analyzing data and code such as automatic detection of directly and indirectly identifiable information. Build infrastructure and tools to collect privacy-related metadata. Analyze metadata to produce insights for executives and decision makers.
     * Privacy Architecture and Privacy-aware Product Design: Support product designers and architect implementing privacy by design principles such as data minimization or implementing privacy enhancing techniques. Bridge team and compliance needs by defining appropriate privacy mitigations in collaboration with the Privacy Office.

We are thrilled to announce an exciting opportunity for a Full Stack Developer to join our team at KPN, a leading internet provider. As a Full Stack Developer, you will be responsible for the innovation and development of our cutting-edge Digital Assistant.

   Our team is dedicated to creating conversational experiences through web/app and voice channels based on the latest conversational technology within the KPN ecosystem. Our digital assistant provides an intuitive natural language-based experience to millions of KPN's customers and users in the consumer and business domains. We are constantly innovating new use cases and services that impact the lives of our customers.

   As a Full Stack Developer, you will work with a team of experts to develop and maintain:
     * The conversational engine, a Python (Asyncio) backend that handles the connection with the digital assistant platform and for routing live chats and callbacks.
     * You will also be responsible for developing a React/Redux based front-end chat UI that communicates with the conversational engine, which lives on our website (kpn.com) and the mijnkpn apps.
     * Additionally, you will work on a FastAPI based BFF that provides endpoints for the conversational platform to enrich the conversation with customer, product information and integration for specific use cases.

   In addition to these tracks, you will also assist our sister teams with generating technical components within the conversational platform that they can use within their conversational content.

   What else?

   Our current focus is on adding integrations with KPN systems to improve the digital self-service capabilities of the digital assistant, strengthening the pivotal bridge function to our customer service department with new channels, and making the digital assistant voice-enabled. And last but not least integration of exciting generative AI capabilities into our digital assistant.

   As a Full Stack Developer at KPN, you will play a leading role in shaping the direction of our technical development. You will be encouraged to make architectural decisions and convince others of your views. Our passionate team focuses on continuously optimizing quality and speed through automation.

Na een heerlijke kop koffie (of thee) die je in gebarentaal bij onze 'gebarista' (slechthorende barista) hebt besteld, start je jouw dag met een meeting met onze Delivery Lead en Lead Developer. Jullie kijken samen hoe een probleem uit het bedrijf opgelost kan worden met taalmodellen; iets waar de eindklant direct een bedrijfsproces mee kan verbeteren en echt resultaat oplevert voor in onze operatie. Wat zijn de wensen, en kan er direct nog meer waarde gecreëerd worden?
   Lunchen doe je in het bedrijfsrestaurant op de 18e verdieping, zo geniet je van je eigen of verse lunch en van het uitzicht over heel Rotterdam. Of je loopt even de stad in voor een wandeling. Na de lunch ga je aan de slag met het technisch uitwerken van pilots of opschalingen met Azure OpenAI. Of je maakt een PoC van een ander taalmodel waarmee je in korte tijd toetst of de oplossing financieel, technisch en functioneel haalbaar is voor Stedin.
   Als afsluiter heb je nog een meeting met een architect en afdeling security. Hier heb je het over de toepasbaarheid van de gemaakte oplossing en hoe die terecht moet komen in het Stedin IT landschap; wat zijn de kaders, is de gemaakte MVP veilig en kunnen we dit in de toekomst beter standaardiseren? Aan het eind van je werkdag sta je in een paar stappen op station Blaak, zo ben je lekker snel weer thuis.

Vacaturetitel: Software Engineer Lead - Machine Learning Engineer
Functieomschrijving:
As a Machine Learning Engineer, you will lead the development and implementation of advanced data engineering solutions to support the deployment and optimization of AI models. Your role will involve leveraging your extensive experience to design robust, scalable, and innovative data architectures that align with the unique requirements of Artificial Intelligence applications., * The Machine Learning Engineer will be responsible for architectural design and planning, advanced data pipelines, model integration and optimization, scalability, performance and research and innovation supporting production AI systems.
     * Build and maintain data engineering solutions on cloud platforms using hyperscaler services.
     * Design, develop, and maintain data pipelines to efficiently collect, process, and load data from various sources into data storage systems (e.g., data warehouses, data lakes).
     * Strong understanding of fundamental data science concepts in NLP, including selection and understanding of embedding models.
     * Develop and maintain data models and schema designs to support efficient data storage and retrieval.
     * Use hyperscaler technologies to support data needs for expansion of Machine Learning/Data Science capabilities including generative AI.
     * Implement data validation and data cleansing processes to ensure data quality and consistency.
     * Design, develop, and implement scalable data pipelines and ETL/ELT processes using Python, PySpark and API integrations.
     * Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand data requirements and integrate data into various applications and analytics platforms.
     * Optimize data systems for scalability and performance, anticipating and addressing potential bottlenecks.

     * Leading a team of Python developers and ML engineers
     * Assigning tasks and ensuring they are completed on time
     * Providing guidance and support to team members
     * Conducting code reviews to maintain code quality

The Generative Models team is part of the AI Product Line at HubSpot and partners closely with the Generative AI Platform team to deliver the next generation of internally trained and fine-tuned Large Language Models., * Design and develop machine learning models and tooling for pre-training and/or fine-tuning open source large language models.

For our client in Amsterdam, we are looking for a Cloud Engineer (Terraform, Azure Devops)

   Your mission will be to ensure the improvement of our products with a team and supporting all countries in reaching their targets by providing smart advanced analytics solutions, to strengthen the clients leadership in digitalization & support our 40 million customers.

   We work in a fun and creative environment, and we're dedicated to bringing out the best in both our relations and our projects, ranging from enhancing our virtual assistants in production via innovative NLP techniques such as Generative AI and Large Language Models to building speech analytics use cases across all the countries our client operates in.

   The opportunity: As a cloud solution engineer, you will be partnering with Data Analysts and Customer Journey Experts (CJE) to design and implement Google Cloud Native infrastructure for the use of leading-edge conversational AI products, such as a compliant generative AI chatbot. As a Cloud Engineer, you understand business needs, can architect GCP cloud solutions, understand data needs, and can inform on using the right cloud solutions to operationalize the conversational platform and thus increase our clients contact center agents' efficiencies. You can with the GCP APIs and code pipelines to support the team's needs. You can productize and operationalize (GCP) cloud-native applications for production environments.

   You Will Be Responsible For
     * Implementation and productionalization of cloud solutions using Generative AI and LLM technologies.
     * Advice on which Google Cloud Platform products to use.
     * Making cloud designs and technical decisions for conversational systems projects at clients Analytics.
     * Creating data pipelines that interact with DialogFlow.
     * Implementing GCP native ML architectures.
     * Contributing to strengthening the cloud capability within the team.
     * Implementing Looker Dashboards, BigQuery datasets/views, and working with Vertex AI Search and Conversation API.
     * Writing code to interact with GCP API's.
     * Automation of team bottlenecks., * You will work on a project that is considered to be innovative for ING.
     * A challenging working environment, that can be considered to have the characteristics of a startup within the safety of a large company.
     * International working environment; TECH/Group Services is bank wide provider of IT solutions, hence AI solutions you work on will often be used globally.
     * A culture where generating new ideas is are highly appreciated.
     * We work in an agile way.
     * 36/40 hours.

Our R&D team develops microbial production strains and engineer enzymes for applications in the areas of food & beverages, home & personal care, animal feed, paper & textile processing, and more. We implement all steps in the process, from business idea and the use of generative AI to sample genetic diversity, to assay design, high-throughput screening, full-scale testing and manufacture at our production plants.

   We are looking for an experienced engineer at the interfaces of software development, lab automation and biology. As part of our team, you will create software that automates everything that can be automated and ensures that generated data is structured and accessible.

   In our team, machine learning staff, molecular biologists, biochemists, and automation hardware engineers work side-by-side. Improvements are deployed with minimal delay, and you can expect to have large impact on the value of our products.

   As Life Science Software Engineer, you will help to create the stack that implements our domain logic, and how it communicates with storage backends as well as instruments, liquid handlers and fermenters. You have freedom to find preferred 3rd party technologies as well as deciding on the components that you prefer us to develop internally.

   The Leiden R&D team is highly skilled and operates with a start-up mentality and a sharp focus on continuous improvement., * Design data models to support experimental protocols and write software that automates the generation of robot instructions as well as analysis and visualization of biological sequence-, and screening-data.
     * Maintain workflows and be pro-active in adjusting and improving them as experimental techniques evolve.
     * Identify and onboard 3rd party services and tools to offload responsibilities and let us focus on differentiating activities.
     * Create software that allows us to seamlessly integrate our Laboratory Information Management System (Benchling) and ML Ops.
     * Document, communicate and teach colleagues best-practices.

* Configuring reusable template elements, called AI Controllers in several tools, most notably in ComfyUI
     * Using various image manipulation tools (both AI and traditional) to create the elements needed for controlling the AI (depth-maps, retouched elements, segmenters, refiners, various models and LoRas)
     * Support on and managing the training of customized models and LoRas
     * Ensure AI is used in a controlled way to generate high visual quality final usable outputs for our clients

ING Analytics is a new unit responsible for realizing this vision for ING, differentiating ING as a leader in data-driven organization, within the banking sector and beyond. The team consists of several Global Analytics Centre of Excellences around the bank's key capabilities (such as Pricing, Risk Management, Financial Crime, Customer Intelligence, and People Analytics.) as well as strong coordination areas around data management, technology, customer journey, UX, as well as external partnerships., Specifically, you will help creating innovative-scalable-data driven solutions in the space of Customer Dialogue Analytics. You proactively work with teams to implement these solutions across the organization. You will work collaboratively with an extended group of stakeholders, including global and local Retail Contact Center teams.

Join us as Intelligent Automation Engineer Intern at our international headquarters in Utrecht, starting in September 2024. In this internship, you will gain insider knowledge about how automation/robotic engineering influences JDE Peet's landscape and business structure, and you will also have the unique experience of coordinating with multiple important stakeholders within our international headquarters.

   Your key activities will be:
     * Monitor robots on daily basis
     * Collaborate with business leaders and obtain clear requirements
     * Draft Process Definition documents
     * Fix issues in robots (using UiPath codeing, AI and Machine learning, GenAI and Natural language processing)
     * Work with AMS team to develop and deploy automations

   Supported by a commendable 4.5 Glassdoor rating and 94% intern recommendation score, we pledge to provide you with a unique learning journey as part of our GIS IT Robotics team, where you'll gain valuable insights into the process of creating and maintaining robots/automations and how this plays an important role in global and international business structures.

   What's in it for you?
     * A monthly internship allowance of €525 (full-time)
     * Travel compensation if you don't have a free public transport card
     * Paid holidays for each internship term
     * Two weeks of remote working anywhere in Europe (EEA)
     * The chance to learn from the best Automation professionals out there!, * Commitment: You are ready to dedicate at least 6 months to this internship, preferably from the 2nd of September to February.
     * Availability: You can join the internship for 3 days per week, including three days in-office and one or two days remotely, ensuring an ideal balance between collaboration and independence.

   As we hope to have piqued your interest, please ensure you also meet the eligibility criteria and academic requirements:
     * Your internship should be included in your study curriculum and directly contribute to your academic results.
     * Your educational institution is willing to sign a collaboration agreement with JDE Peet's and when joining our Research departments, also sign an NDA agreement for internships.
     * You are either an EU(EEA) student residing in the Netherlands during the internship or a Non-EU(EEA) student enrolled and living in the Netherlands during the internship.

Vacaturetitel: Full Stack ontwikkelaar met Cloud kennis -Utrecht
Functieomschrijving:
* Je krijgt de unieke kans om betrokken te zijn bij het ontwikkelen van Generative AI binnen NS!
     * Je levert een belangrijke bijdrage leveren aan de strategische doelen van het bedrijf.
     * Je werkt met state-of-the-art tools en technologieën op het gebied van AI.
     * Je hebt directe impact op de organisatie en haar data gedreven besluitvorming.
     * En je komt terecht in een stimulerende en innovatieve werkomgeving met ruimte voor persoonlijke groei!

Dit ga je doen als Full Stack ontwikkelaar met Cloud kennis

   Afdeling Data Innovatie & Analyse is op zoek naar een ervaren ontwikkelaar die ons wil helpen met Generative AI. Samen met het team implementeer je geavanceerde Generative AI applicaties. Je focus zal liggen op Cloud omgeving, maar je moet niet bang zijn om ook aan de backend /front-end omgeving te werken.

   Samen met andere ambitieuze full-stack, data engineering, UX en front-end professionals werk je in een gemotiveerd team om Generative AI binnen NS te introduceren. Belangrijke aspecten hierbij zijn privacy en security. Hoe zorgen we ervoor dat NS-medewerkers de technologie veilig en verantwoord kunnen gebruiken? Het team werkt volgens een Agile/DevOps werkwijze. Je schakelt veel met IT collega's, biedt oplossingen en zorgt voor verbetering.

* Inrichten van de Cloud omgeving voor de Generative AI toepassingen.
     * Afstemmen met Cloud experts die NS breed verantwoordelijk zijn voor de Cloud omgevingen.
     * Ontwikkelen van de backend en front-end voor de Generative AI toepassingen.
     * Opleiden en coachen van teamleden op het gebied van software ontwikkeling en Cloud omgevingen.

* Een achtergrondonderzoek, met o.a. VOG (Verklaring omtrent Gedrag), maakt deel uit van de sollicitatieprocedure. Denk hierbij ook aan het tekenen van een integriteitsverklaring en geheimhoudingsverklaring.
     * We vinden het belangrijk dat iedereen die bij ons werkt zich thuis voelt. Dit zie je in alles wat we doen, en dus ook in ons aannamebeleid. Lees hier meer.
     * Met deze vacature willen wij zelf onze nieuwe collega werven. Dit is dan ook géén oproep voor acquisitie. Deze functie kan niet op interim basis worden vervuld. Bekijk daarvoor onze inhuur pagina.

Within the Data Office, we have a team responsible for building impactful AI solutions. With these AI solutions, we help our business unit Schade & Inkomen to digitize important processes. An example of this is the digitization of our Claims processes. Your main goal is to deploy/roll out the AI solutions of your colleagues/the AI solution made together with your colleagues in a scalable and secure way., In the past year, we have set up various applications using LLMs and we are now looking for an experienced Machine Learning Engineer to further scale these applications and help build new AI solutions. You provide a clear vision of the required Cloud architecture and manage it for our AI solutions. With your solution-oriented and proactive mindset, you help the team scale and make the best AI solution for business problems production-worthy. We work agile with colleagues from the business on projects that are often sprint-transcending.

   In concrete terms, you bring AI solutions to production so that your solutions really create value for our company of tomorrow. Exploring and applying new technology plays an important role. In addition, you actively contribute to innovation within NN. During our monthly innovation day, you investigate with your colleagues which new techniques are applicable within our company., The team you work with on a daily basis consists of a group of data scientists, a small group of software and machine learning professionals, and a program manager who oversees our activities. You will, of course, work closely with the team's data scientist, and together with these colleagues, we work with great enthusiasm and dedication every day to optimize and innovate customer service, processes, and quality.

   In addition, you are a member of the "Engineering" guild, where about 400 engineers meet each other. Here, you exchange knowledge and experiences with peers. We believe that every engineer can learn something from their peers, and vice versa. This way, you accelerate your career and deliver maximum value with our AI solutions.

   Onze kantoren zijn 100% circulair gerenoveerd. Zero waste, maar zonder concessies te doen aan het ontwerp.

   Onze in-house 'event space' is hét creatieve centrum voor het delen van kennis.

   Bij NN werken we hybride. Samen met jouw team bepaal jij waar en wanneer je werkt.

   'Ýou Matter', dat is onze merkbelofte.

   Het kantoor is een ontmoetingsplek, met ruimte om te brainstormen en samen te werken.

   Ons hoofdkantoor ter gelegenheid van het event: 'Den Haag Stad Escher' in 2023.

   Wij delen dit graag met elkaar.

   Wij geloven in de kracht van kunst en zijn trotse partner van het Mauritshuis.

Wil je deel uitmaken van een snel veranderende, innovatieve omgeving en fungeren als de spil in het team dat werkt aan cutting-edge producten met een focus op generative AI? Dan hebben wij een toffe rol voor jou als Software Developer bij ons nieuwe team!

   We zoeken een ontwikkelaar om toe te treden tot ons nieuwe team. Dit team werkt aan een product dat gebruikmaakt van generative AI-technologie om zorgverleners te ondersteunen bij logistieke processen.

   Je voornaamste uitdaging is om samen met het team deze nieuwe technologieën om te zetten in een gebruiksvriendelijk en effectief product. Je zult samenwerken met onze UX designer/researcher, front-end developer en andere teamleden om snel prototypes te ontwikkelen. Daarbij zul je soms bereid moeten zijn om voor een snelle, testbare oplevering een minder elegante of schaalbare oplossing te accepteren. Op basis van gebruikerstests verbeteren we deze prototypes vervolgens iteratief. We zoeken iemand met ervaring in backend en API ontwikkeling die graag een stap verder gaat. We zoeken naar nieuwsgierigheid, probleemoplossend vermogen en de bereidheid om nieuwe technologieën te leren en te implementeren.

   Afhankelijk van je ervaring is een combinatie met een meer leidinggevende rol binnen het nieuwe team ook een mogelijkheid.

Jouw team

   Jouw team is een multidisciplinair product team dat binnen de Data Science groep valt. Het team bestaat uit een UX-designer/researcher en software developers met verschillende specialisaties. Je zult from scratch een nieuw product gaan bouwen waarbij het team zelf verantwoordelijk is om met een iteratief, explorerend proces erachter te komen hoe je nieuwe technologieën als generative AI en conversational agents kunt inzetten om zorgmedewerkers te ondersteunen bij logistieke vraagstukken. Op de lange termijn zullen de ervaringen en inzichten die we met dit product opdoen de basis vormen voor de toepassing van deze geavanceerde technologieën in al onze producten. Je kunt jouw kennis ook breder binnen de Data Science groep inzetten en daarmee kun je naast het exploratieve werk ook bijdragen aan het verbeteren of uitbreiden van bestaande oplossingen.

NVIDIA is looking for a talented Performance Research Engineer to join our Performance group.

   The ideal candidate will profile and analyze AI workloads on large GPUs and CPUs scale clusters for distributed Deep Learning LLM training focusing at the collectives communication and networking.

   You will work and interact with many types of HW and platforms such as HCAs, Switches, CPUs, GPUs, and Systems.

   You will experience with and develop performance analysis tools and methodologies to dive deeply into the details, understand performance expectation, limitations, and bottlenecks.

   What you'll be doing:
     * Experience and research AI workloads and DL models specifically tailored for large-scale deep learning LLM training on NVIDIA supercomputers with a focus on High-performance networking.
     * Benchmarking, Profiling, and Analyzing the performance to find bottlenecks and identify areas of improvement and optimizations, with a strong emphasis on networking aspects.
     * Implement performance analysis tools.
     * Collaborating with many teams from HW to SW to provide performance analysis insights.
     * Define performance test planning , set performance expectations for new technologies and solutions, and work to reach the performance targets limits.

* Partner with a geographically distributed organization spanning Networking SW, HW, Customers to define, design and optimize DPU Compiler SW at NVIDIA.
     * Invent and improve middle-end and back-end compiler optimizations in Clang/LLVM targeting NVIDIA DPU
     * Implement complex back-end passes (register allocation, scheduling and others) for high performance custom processors that meet hard real time performance requirements
     * Drive new compiler features that improve programmability of NVIDIA DPUs and contribute to definition of DPU programming model.
     * Participate in complete HW / SW co-design cycle from pre-silicon to launch to customer support.
     * Be part of a team that is at the centre of AI, HPC and data centre technologies.

In de rol van Generative AI software engineer ben je verantwoordelijk voor het e2e implementeren van POCs / applicaties en oplossingen voor interne & externe stakeholders binnen het domein van (digital) advertising.

* Generative AI module - module voor het resizen, in & outpainten van advertentie banners voor adverteerders via integratie met generative AI services
     * Ontwikkelen sales/adops chatbot obv email database
     * Opzetten speech-to-text followed by text-to-text proces voor het classificeren van audio/video streams
     * Creatie van advertising prospectie lijsten obv bestaande klantenoverzicht
     * Creatie van een optimale media planning tool obv historische voorstellen
     * Highlights en next best actions definiëren obv campagne rapportering
     * Vergelijken van verschillende externe gen AI services (text, image, audio, video) in functie van een objectief
     * Evalueren en opzetten van een RAG versus fine tuned LLM

   Taken

   Je versterkt ons scrum team bestaande uit Product Owner, Scrum Master & 8 developers.
     * je neemt deel aan standups, refinements, retro's & demo's (2-weekly sprint)
     * you build it, you run it mentaliteit (development & devops, infra-as-code, CICD, …)
     * samen met de PO, project managers en stakeholders ontwikkel je generative AI POCs / modules, zowel standalone projecten als modules binnen bestaande applicaties.
     * je interageert met stakeholders om de scope goed uit te spitten en kritische vragen te stellen
     * je bouwt reliable & robuuste interfaces voor andere DPG teams om mee te integreren, je integreert generative AI APIs op kostenefficiënte en schaalbare wijze
     * je bouwt snelle POCs om bepaalde externe tools te evalueren naar business value
     * je neemt ownership & accountability voor bepaalde applicaties / modules / processen / ..

* Je bent zelfstandig en kan zonder veel problemen een webapplicatie opzetten binnen een AWS omgeving

* Support development and deployment of machine learning models ensuring reliability and performance.
     * Design, develop, and maintain MLOps pipelines to automate the model training, validation, deployment, and monitoring.
     * Ensure proper data management, data versioning, and reproducibility throughout the machine learning lifecycle.
     * Implement infrastructure automation processes to streamline the deployment and management of services and hardware resources.
     * Continuously improve and optimize the performance of implemented solutions through monitoring, evaluation, and iterative enhancements.
     * Design and develop CI/CD workflows and automated testing frameworks for machine learning and related projects.
     * Implement and optimize libraries and tools using Python/C++/other languages and relevant libraries/frameworks (e.g., PyTorch, TensorFlow, numpy, scikit-learn, etc).

As a senior full-stack developer, you will help PostNL make great strides in data science and generative AI. You take the lead in developing innovative solutions, collaborating with experts and promoting technology in the data science community. You are the expert on software development in the team making you the liaison for of the PostNL engineering community where we share "best practices" and innovations in our business.

   This is why you choose PostNL as your job title
   Visible Work: With this team, you will be the first to test and work with new tools and techniques from the market so that PostNL's Data Science community can create even more innovative solutions...
   Challenge: This new team aims to act as an innovation hub for data science and as a benchmark for all decentralised teams and drive progress in new technologies such as generative IA. The team also acts as a supportive leader in the data science chapter
   Good atmosphere: You will work with colleagues who dare to seize opportunities and push each other forward.
   Freedom: You will work from home and at a flex spot in our bustling, state-of-the-art office in the historic Stationspost building (next to Holland Spoor station).
   Responsibility: You largely fill in your role and working hours yourself.
   Development opportunities: You will have plenty of opportunities to follow training programmes and grow into other positions or departments.

   This is your role:

   As a senior full-stack developer, you will help create innovative solutions and functionality on Data Science platforms. You will take on the engineering part for the team, optimising code efficiency and exploring new, fast solutions. In doing so, you will help drive innovation in technologies and foster a culture of continuous improvement; Automate security controls and build robust CI/CD pipelines, championing efficiency and reliability; Explore new AWS services and optimise product performance through experimentation and testing;

   Guide and teach colleagues, actively sharing your software engineering knowledge; Provide expertise in building and maintaining a code library,focusing on best practices and innovation; Collaborate on the development of AWS SDK solutions, pushing the boundaries of what is possible.

   Your colleagues
   You will join the Analytics Innovation team, a recently established team within PostNL that focuses on technological innovations in data science and algorithms to further advance our business. Our team consists of a manager, a principal, senior and medior data scientist, and a junior data engineer. Within our team, we value a good working atmosphere, where we have fun, deliver value quickly, iterate quickly and work closely with each other and with other (innovation) teams. Our team is part of the Data Foundation business unit and consists of around 65 colleagues, most of whom specialise as data engineers or platform engineers., Some final post ...
     * Rather have a cup of coffee or tea with us first to find out more about the job or PostNL? You can! Call or email the recruiter. Then we'll schedule an appointment right away.
     * During the application we will do a background check. We will ask you for a Certificate of Good Conduct (VOG). We will also check your references and possibly do a customisation test.
     * We are looking for new colleagues who want to work with us to build the PostNL of the future. We therefore return mail from recruitment agencies.
     * For this position, you can choose between a Macbook or Windows engineer laptop

As a senior full-stack developer, you will help PostNL make great strides in data science and generative AI. You take the lead in developing innovative solutions, collaborating with experts and promoting technology in the data science community and engineering community.

   Secundaire arbeidsvoorwaarden:
   Evenementen voor werknemers, Flexibel rooster, Product korting, Kantine, Betaalde vakantie, Betaald ziekteverlof, Professionele ontwikkeling, Pensioen / Pensioenplan , Reis kosten vergoeding, Reis kosten vergoeding voor OV, Vakantiedagen, Werken vanuit huis

   Over het bedrijf:
   PostNL

   Werken bij PostNL. Breng het samen!
   Wij zijn PostNL. En samen met jou blijven we de favoriete bezorger van Nederland. Dagelijks maken we 1,2 miljoen mensen blij met het bezorgen van bijzondere momenten. Dat kunnen we alleen dankzij jou en ons team mogelijk maken.

   Van onze mensen op kantoor die zich bezighouden met slimme applicaties tot het vertrouwde gezicht aan de voordeur. Bij PostNL draag je op je eigen manier je steentje bij om de verwachtingen van onze klanten te blijven overtreffen. De toekomst van bezorging is volop in ontwikkeling en er is altijd ruimte voor verbetering. Daarom kijken we elke dag hoe we ons werk steeds beter, slimmer en simpeler kunnen maken. Voor bestellend Nederland maar vooral voor elkaar. Een uitdaging die we alleen dankzij jou en je toekomstige collega's aan kunnen gaan.

   Werken in operatie:

   De vrolijke lach bij het bezorgmoment of de energieke sorteerder achter de schermen. Jij maakt het mogelijk dat een bezorgmoment een bijzonder moment wordt. Een belangrijk en waardevol beroep. Want alleen dankzij jouw inzet kunnen we door heel Nederland aanwezig zijn op de momenten dat de mensen ons nodig hebben. Dat doe je niet alleen. Samen met al onze collega's zorgen we dat jij je werk nog beter kan doen.

   Werken op kantoor:

   Nieuwe ideeën voor slimmere apps, initiatieven om te verduurzamen of de drijvende kracht achter ons hele team. Jij bent degene die alle uitdagingen om de favoriete bezorger van Nederland te blijven met beiden handen aanpakt. Zowel voor onze klanten als voor onze mensen binnen PostNL. Met je eigen initiatieven en verfrissende ideeën krijg je bij ons het vertrouwen om direct impact te maken.

   Bedrijfsgrootte:
   Meer dan 10000 werknemers

   Branche:
   Transport / Opslag / Distributie

   Oprichtingsjaar:
   0

   Website:
   https://www.postnl.nl/over-postnl/werkenbij

Your mission will be to ensure the improvement of our products with a team and supporting all countries in reaching their targets by providing smart advanced analytics solutions, to strengthen the clients

   leadership in digitalization & support our 40 million customers.

   We work in a fun and creative environment, and we're dedicated to bringing out the best in both our

   relations and our projects, ranging from enhancing our virtual assistants in production via innovative

   NLP techniques such as Generative AI and Large Language Models to building speech analytics use

   cases across all the countries our client operates in.

   The opportunity

   As a cloud solution engineer, you will be partnering with Data Analysts and Customer Journey Experts

   (CJE) to design and implement Google Cloud Native infrastructure for the use of leading-edge

   conversational AI products, such as a compliant generative AI chatbot. As a Cloud Engineer, you

   understand business needs, can architect GCP cloud solutions, understand data needs, and can inform

   on using the right cloud solutions to operationalize the conversational platform and thus increase our clients contact center agents' efficiencies. You can with the GCP APIs and code pipelines to support the team's needs. You can productize and operationalize (GCP) cloud-native applications for production, You Will Be Responsible For
     * Implementation and productionalization of cloud solutions using Generative AI and LLM

   technologies.
     * Advice on which Google Cloud Platform products to use.
     * Making cloud designs and technical decisions for conversational systems projects at clients

   Analytics.
     * Creating data pipelines that interact with DialogFlow.
     * Implementing GCP native ML architectures.
     * Contributing to strengthening the cloud capability within the team.
     * Implementing Looker Dashboards, BigQuery datasets/views, and working with Vertex AI

You won't just contribute to building our AI engine; you'll also be an integral part of the smooth deployment, scalability, and maintenance of our machine learning solutions. By collaborating closely with medical experts and our dev/ops engineers, you'll bring substantial domain knowledge into vectorial representations and bridge the gap between model development and production.

   You will:
     * Craft, implement, and fine-tune machine learning algorithms, focusing on Retrieval-Augmented Generation and LLM.
     * Partner closely with medical specialists to translate their expertise into our AI engine.
     * Ensure seamless deployment, monitoring, and scalability of our ML models in production environments.
     * Champion robust ML-Ops practices, including continuous integration, continuous delivery, and automated testing for ML systems.
     * Collaborate with our tech team to construct a resilient, scalable infrastructure for our ML solutions.
     * Monitor model performance, ensuring real-time diagnostics and speedy troubleshooting.
     * Stay in the loop with the latest trends in AI, ML, and ML-Ops to continually push our boundaries.

Als AI Engineer bij Refreshworks.ai speel je een cruciale rol in de ontwikkeling en implementatie van cutting-edge AI-oplossingen:
     * Ontwikkeling van AI-modellen: ontwerp, ontwikkel, en implementeer geavanceerde voorspellende modellen en algoritmes. Je werkt aan diverse uitdagingen zoals computer vision, regressie- en classificatieproblemen, optimalisatie en natural language processing (NLP).
     * Experimenten en Proof-of-Concepts: Ontwikkel experimenten om de technische haalbaarheid van verschillende modellen aan te tonen en om ze onderling te vergelijken.
     * Cross-functionele samenwerking: werk samen met diverse afdelingen om AI-oplossingen naadloos te integreren binnen onze bedrijfsprocessen.
     * Kennisdeling en presentatie: deel je bevindingen en aanbevelingen met zowel technische teams als niet-technische stakeholders. Blijf up-to-date met de laatste trends in data science en AI, en deel deze kennis binnen het bedrijf.

Rochdale zet zich in voor sterke buurten, waar inwoners meer kansen hebben. We bouwen, verduurzamen en maken kwetsbare buurten sterker. Jij kunt hier een mooie bijdrage aan leveren vanuit jouw rol als data engineer. Je bent verantwoordelijk voor de ETL-processen waardoor de organisatie elke dag de beschikking heeft over actuele informatie. Je bent op de hoogte van de laatste technologische ontwikkelingen, zoals op het gebied van

   GenAI en bent in staat deze te vertalen naar bruikbare toepassingen voor onze (eind)gebruikers. Daarnaast focus jij je op onze Lakehouse constructie in de Microsoft Azure omgeving en zorgt voor de doorontwikkeling ervan. Python en SQL zijn bekende termen voor jou en ook het toepassen van CI/CD methodologieën zijn jou niet onbekend.

   De afdeling waar je komt te werken is het Data Competence Center (DCC) binnen de afdeling Digitalisering & Informatievoorziening en bestaat uit twee data-specialisten en een datamanager. Het DCC maakt gebruik van de modernste Microsoft Azure tooling waaronder PowerBI, Azure DevOps, Data Lake en Synapse Analytics. Het DCC werkt volgens de scrum methodiek en ontwikkelt met behulp van DevOps. De afdeling Digitalisering & Informatievoorziening heeft zich de afgelopen jaren meer en meer ontwikkeld naar een regie-organisatie, die enerzijds de (veranderende) behoefte vanuit de business ophaalt en ordent en anderzijds de dienstverlening door externe IT-dienstverleners regisseert, zodat deze aansluit op de behoefte van de business. Wij zoeken een collega die warm loopt als engineer voor het neerzetten, onderhouden en verder optimaliseren van ons data-infrastructuur.

   Jouw werkdag
   Eerst een kop koffie halen op 5, waar de barista van de espressobar voor je klaar staat. Dan start de dag met een standup met het DCC-team. De uitdagingen voor het team zijn groot: hoe gaan we in gesprek met onze collega's om duidelijk te krijgen welke behoefte aan (stuur)informatie er is en hoe kunnen we dit vormgeven met onze data en technieken. Met als perspectief uiteraard hoe deze stuurinformatie bijdraagt aan onze strategische doelen en het verschil gaat maken voor de collega's en onze huurders. Jij als data engineer adviseert over nieuwe technologische toepassingen en ontwikkelingen en neemt het team mee in het optimaliseren van de bestaande technieken en processen. Naast adviseren ga je ook aan de slag met het daadwerkelijk uitwerken en implementeren van deze nieuwe initiatieven en ontwikkelingen.

   Als data engineer ben je gesprekspartner voor het team DCC en de D&I afdeling, je doet analyses en komt met voorstellen. Samenwerken met collega's en meedoen in projecten is vanzelfsprekend. Je brengt hier je kennis en expertise over technologische mogelijkheden in. Ook is er tijd nodig om de data-architectuur en -structuur op orde te brengen en houden. We conformeren ons aan standaarden en we bewaken de datakwaliteit; kortom binnen het DCC werken we 'netjes'.

Het DCC maakt gebruik van de modernste Microsoft Azure tooling waaronder PowerBI, Azure DevOps, Data Lake en Synapse Analytics. Het DCC werkt volgens de scrum methodiek en ontwikkelt met behulp van DevOps. De afdeling Digitalisering & Informatievoorziening heeft zich de afgelopen jaren meer en meer ontwikkeld naar een regie-organisatie, die enerzijds de (veranderende) behoefte vanuit de business ophaalt en ordent en anderzijds de dienstverlening door externe IT-dienstverleners regisseert, zodat deze aansluit op de behoefte van de business. Wij zoeken een collega die warm loopt als engineer voor het neerzetten, onderhouden en verder optimaliseren van ons data-infrastructuur.

   Jouw werkdag
   Eerst een kop koffie halen op 5, waar de barista van de espressobar voor je klaar staat. Dan start de dag met een standup met het DCC-team. De uitdagingen voor het team zijn groot: hoe gaan we in gesprek met onze collega's om duidelijk te krijgen welke behoefte aan (stuur)informatie er is en hoe kunnen we dit vormgeven met onze data en technieken. Met als perspectief uiteraard hoe deze stuurinformatie bijdraagt aan onze strategische doelen en het verschil gaat maken voor de collega's en onze huurders. Jij als data engineer adviseert over nieuwe technologische toepassingen en ontwikkelingen en neemt het team mee in het optimaliseren van de bestaande technieken en processen. Naast adviseren ga je ook aan de slag met het daadwerkelijk uitwerken en implementeren van deze nieuwe initiatieven en ontwikkelingen.

   Als data engineer ben je gesprekspartner voor het team DCC en de D&I afdeling, je doet analyses en komt met voorstellen. Samenwerken met collega's en meedoen in projecten is vanzelfsprekend. Je brengt hier je kennis en expertise over technologische mogelijkheden in. Ook is er tijd nodig om de data-architectuur en -structuur op orde te brengen en houden. We conformeren ons aan standaarden en we bewaken de datakwaliteit; kortom binnen het DCC werken we 'netjes'.

The AI Team is part of a larger Methodology & Analytics Team that helps create new innovative solutions for our analysts worldwide. We are looking for someone to join our AI Team and help us develop innovative cloud applications for market research clients. If you identify yourself as an AI Engineer, Machine Learning Engineer or Data Scientist and you like the idea of building cloud applications that leverage AI, then this job might be for you!

   As an AI Engineer, you will play a crucial role in the growing and dynamic team. Specifically, you will:

   Research & Develop
     * Develop deep learning powered AI, especially LLM applications tailored for market research clients
     * Support the development of interactive dashboards
     * Work with LLM providers, such as OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, etc.
     * Work with various cloud services, particularly AWS (EC2, ECS, Lambda, etc.).
     * Collaborate closely with AI specialists, cloud experts and stakeholders to deliver robust, scalable solutions.

   Guide & Lead
     * Continuously learn more about business applications and propose innovative AI solutions to address business challenges. Taking the initiative is expected.
     * Stay up to date with the latest AI and LLM developments.
     * Help us develop internal trainings on AI/ML.

Als Front-End Engineer werk je mee aan het de ontwikkelen van onze SAAS producten Apollo en Juno . Je bent leergierig, front-end enthousiast en hebt affiniteit met de UI/UX, (front-end) software engineering. Je vindt het tof om mooie, bruikbare en betekenisvolle software te ontwikkelen. We zoeken iemand die net start (junior) of die al enkele jaren ervaring heeft (medior), maar in beide gevallen het leuk vindt om met een team te werken aan maatschappelijke opgaven waarbij jij een bijdrage gaat leveren aan de look & feel en gebruikersinteractie van onze softwareproducten .

   Junior

   Als Junior heb je verhoogde interesse in software technologie, met in het bijzonder front-end technologieën. HTML/CSS is peanuts uiteraard maar het echte werk zit in de javascript libraries. Je hebt kennis en de eerste stapjes gezet met front-end frameworks zoals Vue of React en bent bekend met frameworks zoals Bootstrap en Tailwind. Je schrikt niet van utility-first en een .jsonjson bestand is goed te lezen. Je hebt wellicht zelf al eens een REST API aangeroepen met een asynchrone functie.

   Wij maken gebruik van de Azure Cloud met Python back-end en Vue / Vuetify front-end en maken je wegwijs in onze manier van werken. We verwachten niet dat je op dag 1 al direct onze applicaties kan ontwikkelen, maar wel dat je leergierig bent en onder begeleiding van onze Senior Front-End Engineer en development team je de kennis eigen maakt. Je onderzoekt ook nieuwe technologieën en werkt actief mee aan de ontwikkeling en het onderhoud van onze producten. We helpen je groeien in de Front-End vanuit een praktische context.

   Medior

   Als Medior heb je natuurlijk al de nodige stappen gezet in de Front-End (bij voorkeur met Vue) en de achterliggende services om goed werkende en prettig ogende software te ontwikkelen. Als Medior Front-End Engineer ontwerp je ook mee als dat in je capaciteiten valt: het is niet alleen uitvoerende taak maar het biedt ook de mogelijkheid om mee te denken en te ontwerpen om de mooiste en best werkende software te maken. Enige kennis van back-end software engineering is meegenomen om de afstemming met de rest van het team soepel te laten verlopen. Je hebt de nodige kennis opgedaan van responsive design, utility-first, en bent goed op de hoogte van ontwikkelingen in de Front-End Engineering wereld en kunt meedenken met het vertalen naar onze problematiek. Als Medior kun je altijd leunen op ons Senior Front-End Engineer en Development team, maar ontwikkel je ook eigen opvattingen over hoe het beter, slimmer, handiger, veiliger schaalbaarder kan.

* Onze SAAS producten Apollo of Juno doorontwikkelen voor veel verschillende klanten (Overheid / B2B)
     * Ontwerpen en optimaliseren van designs
     * Een front-end-visie mede ontwikkelen voor ons Stratum Analytics Platform met ons development team om onze datagedreven product-ambities te realiseren en betekenisvolle software te maken.
     * Nauwe samenwerking met de rest van het development team om development en operations goed aan te laten sluiten.

At Soda, we are looking for a dynamic Data Scientist/Machine Learning Engineer who thrives on being at the forefront of innovative data quality tooling to join and act as a founding member of the Product Research Team. Our ideal candidate is an individual who with a solid data science background, has experience in being embedded in software engineering practices while retaining a great amount of product thinking and creative problem-solving. You have a passion for developing cutting-edge solutions that streamline the work of anyone working with data to improve data quality. You will play a crucial role in conducting product research, developing proof of concepts (POCs) for groundbreaking solutions, and working closely with our main engineering team to make these innovations come to life., * Design and implement full-stack solutions for time-series anomaly detection, generative AI solutions, tabular data classification, and alert prioritization.
     * Lead the charge in exploring and defining the future of data quality tooling at Soda, focusing on automating mundane tasks to allow for more significant problem-solving opportunities.
     * Collaborate closely with software engineers and other team members to create seamless, efficient processes and solutions.
     * Contribute to the product development lifecycle from conception to deployment, ensuring that solutions are scalable, efficient, and meet user needs., + Your ability to innovate and solve complex problems in these areas is key.
     * Technology Proficiency: Familiarity with our tech stack is important. We use:
          + Snowflake Database,
          + Python,
          + FastAPI,
          + OpenAI APIs,
          + Sklearn,
          + Streamlit,
          + Facebook Prophet,
          + Decision Trees (including Random Forests),
          + Pytest. Experience with most of these tools will help you hit the ground running.
     * Problem Solving: At your core, you're a problem solver. You excel at understanding user needs and technical challenges, brainstorming solutions, and learning new methods as necessary. You're comfortable admitting when you don't have all the answers but are confident in your ability to find them.
     * You love remote work: If you've worked remotely and loved it, you'll fit right in. Our team operates fully remotely with regular meetings in person (offsites every 6 months, and occasional local hangouts), so being effective and engaged in this environment is crucial.
     * Close Collaboration with Software Engineers: Whether you've been an integral part of a full-stack engineering team or have a solid understanding of cross-disciplinary collaboration, your ability to work alongside front-end, back-end, and platform engineers is vital.
     * Open to Learning: You're not just focused on data science. You're eager to dive into general software engineering projects and expand your skill set beyond AI and modeling.
     * Coding and CI/CD: Solid experience with code versioning, continuous integration, and continuous deployment tools, like Git, Github Actions, and Pytest, is expected. You know your way around code reviews and value maintaining high-quality codebases.
     * Community and Open-Source Minded: One of our products being Open-Source, you'll be interested to engage with and care for the community around the products we offer as part of that channel.
     * Customer Obsessed: You are not afraid to and show an interest in communicating directly with customers to understand their needs on new and current products (with the help of a product manager). You're also more than willing to provide direct support to customers on products which fall under your scope of expertise.

Als getalenteerde Lead Machine Learning engineer ben je verantwoordelijk voor het ontwikkelen van geavanceerde Machine Learning oplossingen bij klanten. Voor het implementeren van een end-to-end machine learning project volgens MLOps principes draai jij je hand niet om.

   Daarnaast speel je een cruciale rol in het adviseren van klanten en het ondersteunen van pre-sales activiteiten. Dit doe je om de behoefte van de klant effectief te begrijpen en hen passende oplossingen te bieden. Zo creeer jij maximale impact.

   Dit ga jij doen!

     * Leiden van AI-projecten en teams om innovatieve oplossingen te ontwikkelen.
     * Adviseren van klanten over de beste Data Science en Machine Learning strategieën voor hun specifieke behoeften.
     * Het implementeren van end-to-end Machine Learning pipelines.
     * Deelnemen aan pre-sales activiteiten, waaronder het identificeren van kansen, het begrijpen van klantvereisten en het presenteren van oplossingen.
     * Opbouwen en onderhouden van sterke klantrelaties door effectieve communicatie, samenwerking en thought leadership.
     * Actief bijdragen aan de groei van het AI-team en kennisdeling binnen de organisatie.
