Are you a finance savvy project manager with a strong drive to foster customer relations and promote collaboration across various departments to achieve impact for our international customers? Do you thrive in a dynamic environment within a team that embraces a growth mindset? If so, we warmly invite you to join our team as Financial Project Manager.

   In this role, you will play a crucial part in our customer service delivery. You will closely collaborate with multiple internal departments and our external key accounts to develop and implement customer satisfaction, financial results and swift lead times that support our ambitious growth strategy. Join us as we embark on a journey to define the future of operational finance in the digital era.

   About SpendLab
   SpendLab empowers over 200 organizations annually to reclaim overpaid payments through comprehensive accounts payable recovery audits. Our data-driven approach leverages cutting-edge technologies like AI, ML, and LLM to meticulously scrutinize outgoing cash flows and identify instances of incorrectly processed VAT within financial administrations. We delve into the invoice and payment streams of large private and public entities, pinpointing inaccuracies and unlocking substantial recoveries on a no-cure, no-pay basis. Our impressive client portfolio attests to our rapid growth and unwavering commitment to excellence. Additionally, we are actively transforming our business into a product software company that not only facilitates recovery but also proactively safeguards our clients' liquidity and instils the peace of mind of having their AP process under the tightest control.

Taken

   What we expect from you:
    1. Operational finance knowledge (preferably accounts payable processes):

     * Understanding of processes around the accounts payables processes. Among invoice processing, approval workflows, payment processes, reconciliation and vendor management.
     * Willingness to specialize in the specific niche of SpendLab to differentiate yourself and become an expert in your field.
     * Leading the development and implementation of long-term financial strategies aligned with the company's overarching business goals.
     * Assisting in the preparation and delivery of accurate and timely financial reports, encompassing monthly, quarterly, and annual statements.
     * Conducting thorough financial analysis to identify critical trends, opportunities, and risks across all business units.

   2. Customer satisfaction:
     * Manage scope and changes, effectively manage project scope to prevent scope creep and ensure that the project stays on track.
     * Setting clear expectations, clearly communicate what the customer can expect throughout the project lifecycle to avoid misunderstanding.
     * Understand customer needs and clear communication, maintain open and transparent communication with the customer throughout the project and take the time to thoroughly understand the customer's requirements, goals, and expectations.
     * Adress issues promptly, demonstrate accountability and a commitment to delivering value to the customer.
     * Realize financial impact and insights that are valuable for our customers.

   3. Project management:
     * Project planning, developing a project plan that outlines tasks, milestones, dependencies, resources, and timelines.
     * Quality management, ensuring that project deliverables meet quality standards.
     * Risk management, mitigating risks related to working with customer data and project deliverables.
     * Stakeholder management, engaging and managing stakeholders on various levels.

   4. Team player:
     * Closure and evaluation, closing out the project effectively involves verifying that all deliverables have been completed.
     * Collaborative attitude, valuing the contributions of team members and actively seeking opportunities to collaborate on tasks and project.
     * Effective communication, communicates clearly and respectfully with team members, actively listening to others' perspectives, and expressing their ideas and feedback constructively.
     * Flexible and adaptive, willing to adjust their approach and priorities as needed to support the team's goals and respond to changing circumstances.
     * Conflict resolution skills, seeking win-win solutions and maintaining positive relationships.
     * Focused and determined to get the job done.

Na een heerlijke kop koffie (of thee) start je jouw dag met een meeting met onze Delivery Lead en Lead Developer. Jullie kijken samen hoe een probleem uit het bedrijf opgelost kan worden met taalmodellen; iets waar de eindklant direct een bedrijfsproces mee kan verbeteren en echt resultaat oplevert voor in onze operatie. Wat zijn de wensen, en kan er direct nog meer waarde gecreëerd worden?
   Lunchen doe je in het bedrijfsrestaurant op de 18e verdieping, zo geniet je van je eigen of verse lunch en van het uitzicht over heel Rotterdam. Of je loopt even de stad in voor een wandeling. Na de lunch ga je aan de slag met het technisch uitwerken van pilots of opschalingen met Azure OpenAI. Of je maakt een PoC van een ander taalmodel waarmee je in korte tijd toetst of de oplossing financieel, technisch en functioneel haalbaar is voor Stedin.
   Als afsluiter heb je nog een meeting met een Architect en afdeling Security. Hier heb je het over de toepasbaarheid van de gemaakte oplossing en hoe die terecht moet komen in het Stedin IT landschap; wat zijn de kaders, is de gemaakte MVP veilig en kunnen we dit in de toekomst beter standaardiseren? Aan het eind van je werkdag sta je in een paar stappen op station Blaak, zo ben je lekker snel weer thuis.

   Als onderdeel van een kleine squad ben jij een verantwoordelijk persoon die veelzijdige taken op zich kan nemen en zelfstandig uit kunt werken. LLM technologie is nog nieuw maar jij doorziet goed voor welk probleem welke oplossing geschikt is. Naast een dosis creativiteit zorg jij ook dat gemaakte oplossingen veilig zijn en klanten echt geholpen zijn met de eindoplossing. Als we zaken beter anders aanpakken of andere technologie moeten gebruiken om tot meer succes te komen kan je ons hier ook van overtuigen vanuit je technische basis. Je bent niet bang nieuwe ideeën uit te proberen in een PoC, maar bent ook sterk in langdurig goed werkende software af te leveren in productie, terwijl je steeds scherp blijft op het doel en de randvoorwaarden. Ook blijf je up-to-date met vernieuwingen op LLM gebied in de markt.

Volgens ons Stedin@Work concept werk je 50% thuis en 50% op kantoor, wel zo flexibel. Wij zorgen voor jouw thuiswerkfaciliteiten, een thuiswerkvergoeding en reizen naar kantoor doe je met je OV vrij-abonnement waarmee je ook buiten werk onbeperkt kan reizen!

+ We beoordelen je CV om te zien of er een match is.
          + We controleren of je voldoet aan de eisen en wensen.
          + We onderzoeken op basis van data of je gewenste tarief concurrerend is.
       Omdat het proces verloopt via een aanbesteding is het belangrijk dat je een goede kans maakt om de opdracht te winnen. Bij een match starten we het offertetraject, bij twijfel laten we dit binnen 1 werkdag weten.
    2. 2
       Introductie bij de opdrachtgever
       De procedure verloopt via een aanbesteding. De eerste introductie doen wij daarom op papier.
          + We werken samen een offerte uit waarin we toelichten waarom jouw profiel aansluit op de gestelde eisen en wensen.
          + We verzamelen de benodigde stukken indien gevraagd zoals referenties, diploma's, motivatiebrief, VOG etc...
          + Op basis van data bepalen we een kansrijk uurtarief voor de offerte. Jij hebt zelf natuurlijk het laatste woord in het biedingstarief.
    3. 3 Aan de slag
       Wij houden van eerlijk en transparant zaken doen.

* Support data analysts in creating high-quality datasets using best practices in DBT, BigQuery, and Looker.
     * Spearhead the creation and maintenance of a central LookML data model, the cornerstone of our vision to empower every business user with a personalized data analyst through Generative AI.
     * Collaborate with other IT teams to enhance real-time data using supported ingestion patterns.
     * Drive continuous and iterative improvement of our data platform.
     * Empower colleagues to embrace a more data-driven approach by enabling them to work effectively on the platform.

* Participate in the design and development of features and services, resolving technical problems as they arise
     * Take ownership of the entire development process, from design to production, ensuring quality, automation tests, and efficient deployment
     * Oversee the maintenance and improvement of existing functionality, ensuring code quality and alignment with business needs
     * Encourage and facilitate the generation of innovative engineering ideas and solutions within the team
     * Solution design for customer integrations and communication with the customer's technical team
     * Managing onboarding implementation projects for enterprise and large customers
     * Tracking and communicating project status, issues, decisions, and action items to internal and external key stakeholders as needed
     * Team performance management and PDP (Professional Development Plan) for team members
     * Scrum ceremonies facilitation

Vacaturetitel: Data Center Site Reliability Engineer, Sr Staff
Functieomschrijving:
We are seeking Sr. Staff Level Data Center Site Reliability Engineer with a strong network engineering background and substantial experience in data center designs, infrastructure, and platform engineering support. The ideal candidate should possess in-depth knowledge of data power, advanced cooling technologies, and colocation space capacity planning and management. The individual must have proven experience in driving data center deployments and executing business growth strategies. A strong background in automation and security is highly desirable. In this role, the engineer will help define and drive business-level strategies, take the lead in driving data center design changes, and innovate for improved scaling, performance, efficiency, and support optimization., * Design, implement, and maintain data center infrastructure, ensuring optimal system reliability and performance.
     * Utilize network engineering expertise to optimize data center designs.
     * Manage data center power, advanced cooling technologies, and colocation space capacity planning and management.
     * Lead data center deployments and execute business growth strategies.
     * Implement automation strategies to streamline operations and reduce manual intervention.
     * Enhance system security, implementing best practices to safeguard data and infrastructure.
     * Monitor system performance and availability, implementing proactive measures to prevent downtime.
     * Establish and publish useful KPIs and reports for performance and service metrics.
     * Respond promptly to system incidents, leading recovery efforts and root cause analysis.
     * Help define and drive business-level strategies.
     * Take the lead in driving data center design changes and innovation for improved operations scaling, performance, efficiency, and support optimization.
     * Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand and meet business requirements.
     * Establish processes for conducting regular system audits to ensure compliance with established standards and regulations.
     * Coordinate, schedule, and lead all aspects of maintenance performed by vendors.
     * Build cross-functional relationships and can influence policies and procedures to improve regional/global data center operations.
     * Collaborate with partners and vendors to help resolve complex technical issues that affect Synopsys computing infrastructure.
     * Mentor and guide junior team members, fostering a culture of continuous learning and improvement.

You will join a team of 40+ Researchers and Engineers within the R&D Department working on cutting edge challenges in the Generative AI space, with a focus on creating highly realistic, emotional and life-like Synthetic humans through text-to-video. Within the team you'll have the opportunity to work with different research teams and squads across multiple areas led by our Director of Science, Prof. Vittorio Ferrari, and directly impact our solutions that are used worldwide by over 55,000 businesses.

   If you have seen the full ML lifecycle from ideation through implementation, testing and release, and you have a passion for large data, large model training and building solutions with clean code, this is your chance. This is an opportunity to work for a company that is impacting businesses at a rapid pace across the globe.

   What will you be doing?

   In this position, you'll have the opportunity to join different research squads solving challenging problems in building a foundational model to represent humans in video. You will be responsible for designing and implementing high quality solutions for deployment. This would include:
   * Research and develop solutions for audio / video data generation of humans in video
   * Design methods and tools for data processing to create pre-training and fine-tuning data-sets
   * Investigate and propose new tools and infrastructure to accelerate the development of state-of-the-art models
   * Design and run experiments to evaluate model outcomes for model training on our large scale compute cluster (petabyte scale data, multi-node, multi-GPU model training)
   * Deliver production-ready solutions for deployment in our data and model training pipelines
   * Take ownership of the engineering developments necessary to ship new AI models into product
   * Communicate and collaborate across London, Amsterdam, Munich and Zurich research offices

+ Deploy machine learning models into production systems for real-time applications.
          + Collaborate with software engineers to integrate models into existing infrastructure.

     * Performance Monitoring and Optimization:
          + Monitor model performance in production and implement improvements as needed.
          + Conduct A/B testing and validation to ensure model accuracy and reliability.

     * Cross-functional Collaboration:
          + Work closely with cross-functional teams to understand business requirements and translate them into technical solutions.
          + Communicate complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders effectively.

Typetone's AI technology already yields significant efficiency returns for our customers. However, large language models are a new type of intelligence, and the art of instructing them in a way that delivers the best results is still in its infancy - it's a hybrid between programming, instructing, and teaching. You will figure out the best methods of prompting our AI to accomplish a wide range of tasks, but even more important: custom train models to our customer's needs.

   Given that the field of prompt-engineering is arguably less than 2 years old, this is a brand new position in which you learn invaluable lessons in an industry that is changing the world! If you have existing projects that demonstrate prompt engineering or custom modelling on LLMs or image generation models, we'd love to see them. If you haven't done much in the way of prompt engineering yet, you can best demonstrate your prompt engineering skills by spending some time experimenting with ChatGPT models or GPT3.5 custom models and showing that you've managed to get complex behaviours from a series of well crafted prompts.

   Representative Projects
     * Discover, test, and document best practices for a wide range of tasks relevant to our customers.
     * Build a set of tutorials and interactive tools that teach the art of prompt engineering to our customers.
     * Helping in modelling the tone of voice of our customers in their custom trained models.

IBM Data & AI DevOps team is responsible for creating automated processes to develop, test, deploy, and maintain software systems across the whole software development lifecycle. Whether you are working on projects internally or for a client, continuous integration and continuous deployment is critical to the success of IBM and our clients worldwide. At IBM, you will use the latest software development tools, techniques and approaches and work with leading minds in the industry to build solutions you can be proud of. IBM Data & AI Development team is looking for enthusiastic and talented DevOps engineer to join us. Our services belong to IBM Knowledge Catalog product portfolio, tightly integrated with IBM Cloud Pak for Data where customers can access a suite of leading data and AI capabilities in a unified experience., As a DevOps engineer you will be responsible for design, development, maintenance and support of the IBM
   Knowledge Catalog services through the full systems development lifecycle on both SaaS and Hybrid Cloud
   platforms . You will work in an agile, collaborative environment, adhering to industry best practices for quality,
   performance, scalability, resiliency and security. You are curious to learn as demonstrated by your up-to-date
   technical knowledge and demonstrated ongoing learning. You are a good team player, self-directed, with working
   knowledge of Agile methodologies and principles. We seek an applicant who will thrive in an open, dynamic,
   flexible, fun, spirited, collaborative environment; an individual who desires creative freedom and the opportunity to
   work in a high performing team.

   As a DevOps engineer, you will contribute to a thriving and growing DevOps Engineering team. You will
   work in a Kubernetes based micro services environment to support our bleeding edge cloud services. This
   will include custom solutions, as well as open source DevOps tools (build and deploy automation,
   monitoring and data gathering for our software delivery pipeline). You will also be contributing to our continuous improvement and continuous delivery while increasing maturity of DevOps and agile adoption
   practices.

Ben jij klaar voor de uitdaging waarbij je kunt werken aan een nog slimmere maatschappij? Ter uitbreiding van ons productmanagementteam zoeken wij per direct een onderwijskundig ontwikkelaar met ambitie. Wil jij verder groeien en jezelf ontwikkelen in een vakgebied dat constant in beweging is? Dan zijn wij op zoek naar jou!

   Dit zijn je werkzaamheden
   Hoe ziet je dag als onderwijskundig ontwikkelaar bij Vijfhart IT-Opleidingen eruit? Neem een willekeurige doordeweekse dag. Je start de ochtend fris met het bijwerken van het nieuwste lesmateriaal voor een GenAI-cursus die we binnenkort geven. Terwijl je de laatste hand legt aan een module over prompts, ontvang je feedback van een docent. Deze input gebruik je direct om het materiaal nog scherper te maken. Na een korte koffiepauze, waarin je even ontspant met collega's en een potje tafeltennis speelt, duik je een brainstormsessie in met een subject matter expert. Jullie bespreken manieren om complexe IT-concepten begrijpelijk te maken voor cursisten.

   De lunch breng je met collega's door in de kantine of, bij mooi weer, met een wandeling in het nabijgelegen park. Dit is een perfect moment om even te ontspannen en bij te praten met collega's van verschillende afdelingen. Na de lunch check je de laatste trends en ontwikkelingen in AI en IT om ervoor te zorgen dat jouw lesmateriaal up-to-date blijft. De middag besteed je aan het ontwerpen van interactieve oefeningen waarmee we onze cursisten uitdagen en ze verder helpen om de lesstof goed te begrijpen.

   Je sluit de dag af door de feedback van cursisten te evalueren. Zo zie je direct hoe jouw werk bijdraagt aan hun succes en aan het inventariseren van verbeteringen. Rond de klok van vijf weet je dat je iets waardevols hebt bijgedragen aan de missie van Vijfhart: het slimmer maken van werkend Nederland. Met een tevreden gevoel en vol nieuwe ideeën voor morgen, sluit je je laptop af. Vijfhart, dat klopt voor jou!

You will leverage your strong analytical and problem-solving skills, coupled with expert-level coding and refactoring experience, to drive innovation and efficiency within our engineering teams.

     * Implement best practices in code modularity, reusability, and maintainability, ensuring our AI services are future-proof and adaptable to evolving requirements.
     * Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams to integrate AI services into our broader product ecosystem, prioritizing ease of use and developer experience.
     * Continuously analyze and improve existing AI services for performance enhancements and to align with current industry standards.
     * Serve as a technical mentor to other engineers, promoting a culture of technical excellence and shared ownership of code quality.
     * Drive innovation by staying abreast of the latest advancements in AI technologies and programming practices, evaluating their potential application within our services.

     * Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate AI services into the wider product ecosystem, ensuring a smooth developer experience.

     * Support and mentor other engineers, contributing to a culture that values technical skill and code quality.

Rochdale zet zich in voor sterke buurten, waar inwoners meer kansen hebben. We bouwen, verduurzamen en maken kwetsbare buurten sterker. Jij kunt hier een mooie bijdrage aan leveren vanuit jouw rol als data engineer. Je bent verantwoordelijk voor de ETL-processen waardoor de organisatie elke dag de beschikking heeft over actuele informatie. Je bent op de hoogte van de laatste technologische ontwikkelingen, zoals op het gebied van

   GenAI en bent in staat deze te vertalen naar bruikbare toepassingen voor onze (eind)gebruikers. Daarnaast focus jij je op onze Lakehouse constructie in de Microsoft Azure omgeving en zorgt voor de doorontwikkeling ervan. Python en SQL zijn bekende termen voor jou en ook het toepassen van CI/CD methodologieën zijn jou niet onbekend.

   De afdeling waar je komt te werken is het Data Competence Center (DCC) binnen de afdeling Digitalisering & Informatievoorziening en bestaat uit twee data-specialisten en een datamanager. Het DCC maakt gebruik van de modernste Microsoft Azure tooling waaronder PowerBI, Azure DevOps, Data Lake en Synapse Analytics. Het DCC werkt volgens de scrum methodiek en ontwikkelt met behulp van DevOps. De afdeling Digitalisering & Informatievoorziening heeft zich de afgelopen jaren meer en meer ontwikkeld naar een regie-organisatie, die enerzijds de (veranderende) behoefte vanuit de business ophaalt en ordent en anderzijds de dienstverlening door externe IT-dienstverleners regisseert, zodat deze aansluit op de behoefte van de business. Wij zoeken een collega die warm loopt als engineer voor het neerzetten, onderhouden en verder optimaliseren van ons data-infrastructuur.

   Jouw werkdag
   Eerst een kop koffie halen op 5, waar de barista van de espressobar voor je klaar staat. Dan start de dag met een standup met het DCC-team. De uitdagingen voor het team zijn groot: hoe gaan we in gesprek met onze collega's om duidelijk te krijgen welke behoefte aan (stuur)informatie er is en hoe kunnen we dit vormgeven met onze data en technieken. Met als perspectief uiteraard hoe deze stuurinformatie bijdraagt aan onze strategische doelen en het verschil gaat maken voor de collega's en onze huurders. Jij als data engineer adviseert over nieuwe technologische toepassingen en ontwikkelingen en neemt het team mee in het optimaliseren van de bestaande technieken en processen. Naast adviseren ga je ook aan de slag met het daadwerkelijk uitwerken en implementeren van deze nieuwe initiatieven en ontwikkelingen.

   Als data engineer ben je gesprekspartner voor het team DCC en de D&I afdeling, je doet analyses en komt met voorstellen. Samenwerken met collega's en meedoen in projecten is vanzelfsprekend. Je brengt hier je kennis en expertise over technologische mogelijkheden in. Ook is er tijd nodig om de data-architectuur en -structuur op orde te brengen en houden. We conformeren ons aan standaarden en we bewaken de datakwaliteit; kortom binnen het DCC werken we 'netjes'.

Lever jouw bijdrage aan voldoende betaalbare woningen in sterke buurten, gericht op de toekomst. Solliciteer direct - en uiterlijk op 31 maart - via de rode sollicitatiebutton. We zien jouw motivatie en cv graag verschijnen. Kom maar op! Vragen? Chris Horst, manager Digitalisering & Informatievoorziening, geeft antwoord als je hem mailt op chorst@rochdale.nl. (Je sollicitatie graag indienen via de sollicitatiebutton, niet per mail)

ls Business Developer Digital binnen Florius/Moneyou werk je samen met je team aan digitale oplossingen voor (onafhankelijk) hypotheekadviseurs en klanten. Denk hierbij aan Florius.nl, mijnFlorius/mijnMoneyou en de extranetten voor adviseurs van ABN AMRO, Forius en Moneyou. Je team bestaat uit 1 of 2 Digital collega's en 5 a 8 developers vanuit IT. Samen werken jullie aan innovatieve toepassingen voor Florius, Moneyou en ABN AMRO (intermediaire distributie).

Je werk

   Binnen Florius/Moneyou wordt gewerkt met een overall backlog voor heel Florius/Moneyou, waarbij het werk door 1 van de circa 10 Deliveryteams wordt opgepakt. Het team is verantwoordelijk voor de verdere invulling en realisatie van het product. Je werkt mee aan de roadmaps voor MijnFlorius/MijnMoneyou, maar ook onderdelen van de extranetten of toepassingen zoals de chatbot, de Florius apps, digitaal ondertekenen, online identificeren, implementatie van Wallets, aansluiten van data-bronnen etc.. Het team houdt die verantwoordelijkheid ook na oplevering ("You build it, you run it"). Het team bepaalt zelf de eigen backlog in afstemming met de Lead Product Owner. Complexe vraagstukken (functionaliteit voor klanten en adviseurs zoals inloggen, extra aflossen via iDeal, indienen en wijzigingen van hypotheekverzoeken) vind je uitdagend om samen met je team op te lossen. Om je werk goed te doen, moet je je zelf regelmatig verdiepen in de materie, zodat de beste oplossing voor adviseur of klant
   kan worden gemaakt. Maar ook storingen komen direct bij het team terecht, dus moeten in worden gepast. Dit doe je in een moderne IT omgeving en waar nodig toets je vooraf de oplossingen bij klanten of adviseurs door middel van Usability onderzoek, zodat je zeker weet dat het een succes gaat worden.

Werkomgeving

   Florius/Moneyou kent circa 200 directe collega's en Digital 20 a 25. Naast Digital kent Florius een Customer Experience afdeling (MarCom), Channel Management (beleid), Advies & Service (klantcontact), Intermediaire Verkoop (relatiemanagement), Customer Due Diligence en Moneyou. Je zit dus midden in de hypotheken business en je werkt zeer intensief samen met de IT-collega's die de (veelal Digital) zaken realiseren. Je werkt dagelijks in het agile team en samen ben je van idee tot en met realisatie en gebruik verantwoordelijk. Denk hierbij aan de inzet onze digitale kanalen om klanten zelf allerlei zaken op hypothekengebied te laten uitvoeren, al dan niet samen met de hypotheekadviseur. Met je team breng je dit van "een idee" naar werkende functionaliteit waar klanten en adviseurs dagelijks gebruik van kunnen maken. Een deel van de werkzaamheden bevat het vertalen van wet- en regelgeving naar concrete stories die developers kunnen oppakken.
   Je werkt binnen ABN AMRO en dus alle mogelijkheden om je als professional te ontwikkelen en daarnaast binnen Florius/Moneyou met alle mogelijkheden om je ideeÃ«n te realiseren met je team.

Het succes van onze organisatie staat of valt met de kwaliteit van onze mensen en de ideeen die zij hebben. Echt verrassende inzichten en innovatieve oplossingen voor onze klanten ontstaan door een samenspel van culturen, kennis en ervaring. Daarom is diversiteit voor onze organisatie ontzettend belangrijk. Om ervoor te zorgen dat alle collega's binnen ABN AMRO hun kwaliteiten kunnen ontplooien, stimuleren we een inclusieve cultuur waarin iedereen zich betrokken en gewaardeerd voelt.

Disclaimer externe recruitmentbureaus

   Externe recruitmentbureaus dienen een overeenkomst met ABN AMRO BANK N.V. te hebben getekend, uitgegeven door een Talent Acquisition Specialist, om cv's te mogen indienen. Acquisitie wordt daarom niet op prijs gesteld.

Do you thrive at the intersection of data, technology, and business use and compliance?
   Does working in a complex environment energize you?
   Are you passionate about building intelligent processes that not only meet today's needs but anticipate tomorrow's challenges?
   Then come help us transform the data requirements process into a data-driven steering team., As a Data Engineer in the Requirements Interface and Oversight team, you will:
     * Design, develop and implement technical solutions to create a sustainable and scalable Central Requirements Repository.
     * Analyse diverse resources to understand the interface between business needs for data, regulatory aspects, and technical capabilities.
     * Integrate these disparate data sources to produce a comprehensive requirements repository that provides the end2end requirement lineage across the chain for insights discovery, analysis, and decision-making.
     * Evaluate the potential of different data fields to enhance our integration and data-driven steering capability.

     * Collaborate with multidisciplinary teams including but not limited to data domains, data product teams, sourcing teams, data management teams, CDO office, business units, policy teams, implementation and application teams, and technology functions.
     * Champion innovation to enhance governance, minimise rework and compliance risk, drive automation and optimise planning within our data domain.
     * Make an impact by being part of a pioneering team shaping the future of finance and risk requirements management and data driven steering.

   - Integrate these disparate data sources to produce a comprehensive requirements repository that provides the end2end requirement lineage across the chain for insights discovery, analysis, and decision-making.
   - Evaluate the potential of different data fields to enhance our integration and data-driven steering capability.
   - Assess the information flow to recognize patterns and data clusters to gather actionable insights.
   - Collaborate with multidisciplinary teams including but not limited to data domains, data product teams, sourcing teams, data management teams, CDO office, business units, policy teams, implementation and application teams, and technology functions.
   - Champion innovation to enhance governance, minimise rework and compliance risk, drive automation and optimise planning within our data domain.
   - Make an impact by being part of a pioneering team shaping the future of finance and risk requirements management and data driven steering.

Workenvironment

   The Finance & Risk Data Domain is part of Finance & Risk Business Grids (F&RBG) and plays an active role for all the Finance and Risk departments. We employ 250+ international professionals with different backgrounds who are driven to bring data management within Finance & Risk to a structurally higher level. Our aim is to generate reliable finance & risk data on time. We do this by improving the data itself, data systems and data processes. We work with an Agile operating model. Our Finance and Risk Data Domain consists of 5 departments where the atmosphere is dynamic, open, and informal.

* The gross monthly salary displayed above is based on a 36-hour work week, including vacation pay and benefit budget.

   * Five weeks of vacation per year. You have the option to purchase an additional four weeks per year.
   * Personal development Budget of € 1,000 per year, which you can accumulate up to € 3,000.
   * Possibility to work from home (in consultation with your team and depending on your position).
   * An annual public transport pass with free public transportation throughout the Netherlands.
   * An excellent pension scheme.

Interested?

   If you are ready to take the next step in your career and be part of something transformative, we'd love to hear from you!
   For more information contact Christél Rademan, Expert Lead Finance & Risk Data Domain Requirements, via email: christel.rademan@nl.abnamro.com.

Step into the role of Digital Business Developer at ABN AMRO's Personal Banking. Drive digital transformation by understanding client needs and crafting seamless online experiences. Take charge of strategic recommendations and elevate our app and web services. If creating customer-centric solutions excites you, this is your chance to make a difference!, As a Digital Business Developer, you will be part of a specialized team with other Business Developers. You will focus on improving the user experience of our clients in our digital channels (app & web). You achieve this by translating customer needs into value propositions and comprehensive end-to-end solutions. These solutions encompass the entire process from initial concept to final implementation, ensuring they are aligned with the latest developments in technology, digitalization, legislation, and regulations. Additionally, you consider the requirements and frameworks set by both internal and external stakeholders, including development teams and regulatory bodies., The Grid Digital Channels Personal Banking has about 400 professionals from over 25 nationalities. The spoken language is Dutch and English. We are responsible for Internet Banking, the ABN AMRO app and new digital initiatives. At this moment, we are working hybrid from home and some days at the Gustav Mahlerlaan in Amsterdam. We believe that a flexible approach with multidisciplinary teams focusing on speed, flexibility and efficiency will help in our digital transformation. You will work in a pool of Business Developers with a dedicated focus on one of the teams within the Grid. Here you will be part of a scrum team using an Agile way of working:
     * Being part of four multidisciplinary dev-ops teams.

     * An environment that simulates to embrace failures as a necessary step to learn quickly.
     * Working together as a dynamic multi-cultural team.

   We know one thing about the future of banking: it is all about being a personal bank in a digital age. Our digital channels play a key role: not only showing our customers their transactions, but also in helping them make the right decisions with personalized content. That is why we work hard at ABN AMRO to bring our services to the digital environment, offering customers the seamless digital experience they deserve., We are looking for a Digital Business Developer with an affinity for customer experience, who wants to bring our digital offering (app and web) to the next level!

Op zoek naar een organisatie met ambitieuze doelstellingen én waar jij vorm kunt geven aan onze robuuste data-infrastructuur om geavanceerde AI-modellen te vertalen naar relevante toepassingen?

Als AI Engineer / Product Developer bij ARAG werk je aan het ontwikkelen van een robuuste data-infrastructuur om geavanceerde AI-modellen te vertalen naar relevante toepassingen. Je speelt een cruciale rol in het bouwen van data pipelines en platforms die AI-modellen en AI-gedreven toepassingen voeden met schone, gestructureerde en relevante data. Daarnaast werk je nauw samen stakeholders om de ontwikkeling van AI-modellen te faciliteren en te optimaliseren.
       Je draagt bij aan het bouwen van AI-oplossingen voor de business, zoals automatisering, voorspellende modellen en intelligente systemen die onze datagestuurde beslissingen verbeteren. Een concreet project waar je direct op zal instappen is de ontwikkeling van onze eigen AI Legal Assistant. Hier bouwen we een toepassing die juristen helpen in het behandelen van claims.
       Als AI Engineer / Product Developer kom je ons vanuit je ervaring en persoonlijkheid versterken om deze ambitie waar te maken. Dat doe je door:
          + beschikbaar stellen van een datamodel en AI-modellen aan onze interne klanten;
          + ontwikkelen van toepassingen op basis van deze AI-modellen (en relevante technologieën);
          + sparring partner te zijn voor je mede teamleden als het gaat om technische uitdagingen en oplossingen, vooral op het gebied van AI-ontwikkeling.
       Meer lezen over onze reis en wat we aan het doen zijn? Lees "Efficiëntie verhogen en klant- en medewerkers ervaring van ARAG verbeteren met GenAI"

Academian is seeking an AI Subject Matter Expert (SME) to develop comprehensive, engaging course content on AI fundamentals, LLM architectures, AI project planning, and Generative AI applications. This role is crucial in creating educational resources that will equip learners with the knowledge to navigate and innovate within the rapidly evolving AI landscape. If you're passionate about AI and have hands-on experience with various AI and GenAI technologies, we invite you to join our team for this remote opportunity., AI Fundamentals and Course Content Development
     * Course Introduction: Develop modules on the basics of AI, Generative AI, and Large Language Models (LLM) architectures.
     * AI Techniques: Provide overviews of traditional AI approaches (ML, NLP, DL, RL) and contrast them with Generative AI techniques.
     * AI & GenAI Selection: Create criteria for AI vs. GenAI use in business applications, including when to use ML vs. LLM models.
     * LLM Architectures: Deliver content on Transformer, GAN, and other LLM architectures, including multimodal LLMs.

   LLM Architecture and Selection
     * LLM Analysis: Develop course material on different LLM architectures, such as Llama3 and Gemma 2, and tools like OpenAI & Anthropic Claude.
     * Evaluation and Deployment: Provide instruction on model evaluation, token counting, deployment options, and considerations of model size, speed, and cost.

   AI Project Planning and Implementation
     * AI Project Scoping: Design courses on identifying and quantifying AI project value and translating business objectives into technical plans.
     * Technology Selection: Teach methods for selecting appropriate technologies and models for specific business needs.

   Vector Database Design Patterns
     * Database Usage: Develop lessons on vector and graph databases for AI applications, with a focus on comparing VectorDB and GraphDB options.
     * Database Selection: Explore various database platforms, such as Singlestore, MongoDB, and Milvus, for AI app integration.

   LLM Alignment and Reinforcement Learning
     * LLM Tuning: Teach concepts of LLM alignment, including RLHF and feedback models, along with instruction tuning for LLMs.

   LLM Fine-Tuning and Efficiency Techniques
     * Fine-Tuning Strategies: Design modules on fine-tuning using libraries like Hugging Face, with techniques such as PEFT, QLORA, and AdaLORA.

   Prompt Engineering and RAG Architectures
     * RAG Pipelines: Provide instruction on architecting production-grade RAG pipelines on cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP).
     * Advanced Architectures: Explain when to use RAG vs. fine-tuning in AI applications.

   LLM Evaluation and Scaling
     * Performance Evaluation: Teach metrics and best practices for LLM evaluation, including BLEU, ROUGE, and MMLU.
     * Scaling and Deployment: Design modules on deploying and scaling LLMs on cloud platforms and optimizing inference with ML hardware accelerators.

   Security, Compliance, and UX
     * ML Guardrails: Develop content on implementing ML guardrails and compliance measures for LLM use, and collecting user feedback for continuous improvement.

   LLMOps, Monitoring, and Lifecycle Management
     * Operational Management: Provide instruction on MLOps, DevOps, and AIOps, including CI/CD, monitoring, and detecting model drift.

   AI Agents and Task Management
     * AI Agent Overview: Teach the basics of AI agents, Langgraph, and Autogen for multi-agent collaboration and task management.

   AI Ethics and Regulatory Compliance
     * Responsible AI: Design content on AI regulations and ethics, covering governance and responsible AI practices (e.g., EU AI Act).

As an Azure Engineer in Accenture Technology - Cloud First, you will play a pivotal role in driving our customers' cloud initiatives, leveraging Microsoft's Azure platform to design, build, migrate, and optimize scalable cloud solutions. Your expertise will be crucial in advancing our customers' cloud adoption strategies, ensuring security, and optimizing their infrastructure through effective use of Azure's vast toolset and frameworks. Join our team and contribute to shaping the future of our customers' cloud infrastructure, leveraging your expertise in Azure to drive innovation and excellence.
     * People You will collaborate with cross-functional teams, including developers, system administrators, and project managers, to ensure seamless integration and operation of cloud services for our customers. Your ability to communicate effectively and mentor junior team members will be essential in fostering a collaborative and efficient working environment.
     * Process You will lead the implementation of the Cloud Adoption Framework for our customers, ensuring their processes align with best practices for cloud governance, security, and compliance. Your role will involve refining and enhancing our customers' DevOps processes, facilitating continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines, and automating infrastructure management using Infrastructure as Code (IaC) tools like Bicep or Terraform.
     * Technology Your in-depth understanding of cloud architecture and Azure's capabilities will be instrumental in designing, building, migrating, and optimizing workloads for robust landing zones and other cloud infrastructure components for our customers. You will utilize Azure DevOps tools and services to streamline project workflows and ensure the reliability and scalability of our customers' cloud environments.
     * Task Day-to-day tasks will include designing and building Azure projects from the ground up for our customers, managing their cloud resources, and ensuring optimal performance and security. You will also be responsible for migrating and optimizing workloads to Azure, troubleshooting and resolving issues related to cloud infrastructure, continuously improving our customers' cloud operations, and staying updated with the latest Azure developments and best practices.

   With all our roles, there is some in-person time for collaboration, learning and building relationships with clients, peers, leaders, and communities. As an employer, we will be as flexible as possible to support your specific work/life needs.

Contactpersoon: Sandra Jokhan, Bram van der Linde
Functieomschrijving:
Je zorgt voor de ontwikkeling, integratie en uitrol van LLM agents die kennisdeling tussen teams versnellen en de automatisering van dagelijkse werkprocessen mogelijk maakt. Daarnaast ondersteun je andere teams met ons MLOps platform om ML modellen te creëren en deployen, waarbij je een scherp oog houdt op cloud en MLOps best practices. Bovendien speel je een actieve rol in het vergroten van de AI-vaardigheden van jezelf, jouw teamleden en collega's, door het volgen en delen van de laatste ontwikkelingen in het veld. Ten slotte draag jij samen met je team de operationele verantwoordelijkheid voor onze tools en diensten.

   Als team bieden wij twee producten aan: Voltix Assistant en Voltix MLOps platform. Het Voltix Assistant product gaat voorzien in een vlotte gestandaardiseerde uitrol van LLM agents voor allerlei interne use cases. De hoofdmoot van deze use cases zal focussen op het gemakkelijk vindbaar maken van de juiste kennis in onze grote organisatie. Met het Voltix MLOps platform helpen wij andere teams snel en juist op weg door middel van een gestandaardiseerde AWS cloud omgeving, zowel voor het ontwikkelen, testen en uitrollen van ML modellen, maar ook voor het uitvoeren van data-analyses. Wij maken dus zelf geen modellen, we zijn een platform team.

   Het energienet van de toekomst maken we voor iedereen, mét iedereen. En als AI Engineer werk jij hieraan mee. Zo ben jij bezig met het:
     * Vertalen van LLM-use cases naar technische oplossingen en standaardoplossingen voor meerdere use cases waar mogelijk.
     * Implementeren, uitrollen en beheren van LLM-agents, met een voorkeur voor bestaande frameworks en LLM-modellen.
     * Integreren van interne databronnen (zoals SharePoint en Confluence) als kennisbasis voor de LLM-agents.
     * Inbouwen van LLM-agents in eindgebruikertools, zoals Microsoft Teams.
     * Onderhouden van het MLOps-platform op AWS, voor veilige en gecontroleerde levering van ML-modellen door data science teams.

You will be responsible for the development, integration, and rollout of LLM agents that accelerate knowledge sharing between teams and enable the automation of daily work processes. Additionally, you will support other teams with our MLOps platform to create and deploy ML models, while keeping a keen eye on cloud and MLOps best practices. Furthermore, you will play an active role in enhancing the AI skills of yourself, your team members, and colleagues by following and sharing the latest developments in the field. Finally, together with your team, you will carry operational responsibility for our tools and services.

   As a team, we offer two products: the Voltix Assistant and the Voltix MLOps platform. The Voltix Assistant product will provide a smooth, standardized rollout of LLM agents for various internal use cases. The main focus of these use cases will be to make the right knowledge easily accessible within our large organization. With the Voltix MLOps platform, we help other teams get started quickly and accurately through a standardized AWS cloud environment, both for developing, testing, and deploying ML models, as well as for conducting data analyses. We do not create models ourselves; we are a platform team.

   We are creating the energy grid of the future, for everyone, with everyone. And as AI Engineer, you can play your part in this. Your role will involve:
     * Translating LLM use cases into technical solutions and standardized solutions for multiple use cases where possible.
     * Implementing, rolling out, and managing LLM agents, with a preference for existing frameworks and LLM models.
     * Integrating internal data sources (such as SharePoint and Confluence) as a knowledge base for the LLM agents.
     * Embedding LLM agents into end-user tools, such as Microsoft Teams.
     * Maintaining the MLOps platform on AWS for secure and controlled delivery of ML models by data science teams.

   You complete our network

   Did you know that Alliander is made up of different companies? Together with Liander, Qirion, Qterra, Dep, Firan and Entrnce, we develop and manage the energy grid for millions of people in the Netherlands. And in the light of the current energy transition, that is no easy task. We are realising this transition with a large group of talented professionals. Thanks to them, we have every confidence that we will be able to safeguard the Netherlands' energy future. Together with you, we will make this happen.

This is essential, as AI also plays a crucial role in addressing the challenges of a sustainable energy transition. As a Staff AI Compiler Engineer, you will be at the forefront of Axelera AI's Neural Network compiler development. You'll be responsible for driving the technical direction, solving complex, open-ended problems, and setting priorities for high-impact projects. Your work will shape Axelera AI's software systems and extend beyond your immediate team, with a focus on delivering scalable, flexible solutions to advance our AI platform., * Lead the design, architecture, and hands-on development of Axelera AI's Neural Network compiler and SDK.

     * Drive innovation by designing compiler optimizations, focusing on hardware-aware transformations for In-Memory Computing.

     * Execute and technically guide complex projects to ensure our compiler supports workloads beyond classical CNNs (e.g. generative AI) and upcoming generations of our heterogeneous compute platform.

     * Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure alignment on technical strategy, optimizing the Axelera software stack for scalability and performance.

     * Oversee holistically our compilation pipeline and proactively propose changes to ensure best-in-class functional coverage, performance and accuracy.

     * Ensure best practices in the team, especially regarding testing methodologies for compilers.

     * Mentor and guide junior and senior engineers, modeling a standard of excellence and leadership within the team, thereby being a valuable partner to your manager and peers.

Deze rol richt zich op het verzamelen, verfijnen en optimaliseren van datasets die worden gebruikt voor het trainen van Large Language Models (LLM). Het hoofddoel is om de kwaliteit, relevantie en diversiteit van de data te waarborgen, met een specifieke focus op de entertainmentindustrie, inclusief tekst, afbeeldingen en andere media.

* Datasetcuratie: Verzamelen en beheren van grootschalige, hoogwaardige datasets uit verschillende bronnen binnen de entertainmentindustrie
     * Data Annotatie & Labeling: Ontwikkelen van strategieën voor nauwkeurige labeling, inclusief geautomatiseerde methoden voor het aligneren van tekst en afbeeldingen voor trainingsdoeleinden.
     * Data Cleaning & Voorverwerking: Implementeren van pijplijnen voor het opschonen en voorbewerken van multimodale datasets (bijv. tokenization, beeldvoorverwerking, augmentatie) om consistentie en relevantie te waarborgen.
     * Datakwaliteitsmetingen: Definiëren en bijhouden van metrics om de kwaliteit en relevantie van datasets te beoordelen, zodat continue verfijning en iteratie mogelijk is.
     * Synthetische Datageneratie: Onderzoeken van technieken voor het creëren van synthetische data (bijv. GANs, augmentatie) om leemtes in specifieke entertainmentsubdomeinen of randgevallen op te vullen.

In deze rol ben je verantwoordelijk voor het ontwikkelen en verfijnen van Large Language Models (LLM) specifiek gericht op toepassingen binnen de entertainmentindustrie. De focus ligt op het integreren van tekst- en beeldmodaliteiten op een creatieve en effectieve manier, geschikt voor een ervaren Python ontwikkelaar met kennis van grote taalmodellen en interesse in multimodale systemen.

* LLM Fine-Tuning en Aanpassing: Werken aan het verfijnen van bestaande LLM's (zoals GPT, LLaMA, etc.) om ze te specialiseren voor entertainmenttaken, zoals assistentie bij het schrijven van scripts, beeldgebaseerde verhalen, en het genereren van creatieve content.
     * Modelintegratie en API-ontwikkeling: Ontwikkelen en onderhouden van API's die de LLM integreren met multimodale input (bijv. tekst- en beeldprompts combineren), wat veelzijdige contentgeneratie en interactie mogelijk maakt.
     * Implementatie van Trainingspijplijnen: Samenwerken aan het implementeren van schaalbare trainingspijplijnen met Python en relevante ML-bibliotheken (bijv. PyTorch, TensorFlow), met de nadruk op gebruiksvriendelijkheid en snelle iteraties.
     * Model Evaluatie en Iteratie: Evaluatielussen uitvoeren met aangepaste metrics afgestemd op de entertainmentsector (bijv. creativiteit, verhaallijnconsistentie) en de modelprestaties optimaliseren door iteratieve verbeteringen.
     * Samenwerkingsgericht Ontwikkelen: Nauw samenwerken met data engineers en MLOps engineers om een naadloze datastroom, modelimplementatie en integratie binnen de bredere infrastructuur te garanderen.

Ontwikkeling van web- en mobiele applicaties: Het ontwerp en de bouw van gebruiksvriendelijke applicaties waarin de S2T-dienst wordt getoetst.
   Integratie van de dienst in gebruikersapplicaties: Meehelpen aan de integratie van de S2T-dienst in bestaande gebruikersapplicaties.
   Bijdrage aan de middleware-layer: Bijdragen aan de ontwikkeling van de middleware-layer, waar de API-definitie wordt gerealiseerd en authenticatie plaatsvindt. De LLM's moeten via virtualisatietechnieken gedeployed worden op de Nvidia-stack. De engineer werkt hier aan een schaalbaar, multi-tenant model.

   Contacten

   De programma manager.
   Het ontwikkelteam.
   De technische beheerders.

       Company Description
       Working at Boskalis is about creating new horizons and sustainable solutions. In a world where population growth, an increase of global trade, demand for (new) energy and climate change are driving forces, we challenge you to make your mark in finding innovative and relevant solutions for complex infrastructural and marine projects.
       Job Description
       Make your mark as a .NET software engineer with a focus on AI at Boskalis. In this challenging role you will be instrumental in building and optimizing AI-powered applications and services. You will work closely with other software engineers and AI specialists to integrate AI models and algorithms into our .NET applications, ensuring they are scalable, efficient, and seamlessly integrated within our business applications and Microsoft environment. Next to that you will also be responsible for the maintenance of and keeping older applications up to date.
       At Boskalis we are at the forefront of integrating cutting-edge AI technologies into our (business) solutions. We leverage the power of the Microsoft OpenAI services to develop innovative products that meet our internal customers' evolving needs. Your job can be characterized as follows:
     * Work in a startup like team inside a big company.
     * Implement the newest technologies in (Azure) OpenAI.
     * Work in a dynamic team where you can quickly make an impact by using LLMs to transform how people work.
     * You like keeping up-to-date with the newest advancement in GenAI. (of LLMs).
       Join us if you're passionate about making a significant impact in the tech world of Boskalis with your AI and .NET skills.
       Your responsibilities as .NET software engineer
     * Design, develop, and maintain AI-enhanced .NET applications using Microsoft technologies.
     * Collaborate with AI researchers to integrate AI models into applications.
     * Ensure applications are scalable, secure, and compliant with best practices.
     * Participate in code reviews, unit testing, and integration testing.
     * Stay abreast of developments in AI technologies and .NET frameworks to continually enhance our offerings.
       Your qualities and experience
       You can move ahead as a .NET software engineer if you have:
     * A Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
     * Strong proficiency in .NET Framework, .NET Core, and C# programming.
     * Experience with Microsoft Azure and its AI services (Azure Machine Learning, Cognitive Services, etc.).
     * Solid understanding of software development life cycle (SDLC) and agile methodologies.
     * Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to work in a team environment.
       Qualifications
       What you can expect
     * A dynamic environment: A job that allows you to collaborate with a talented team of experts from different backgrounds and contribute to making a significant impact.
     * Rewarding conditions:A competitive salary and much more, including holiday allowance, holiday entitlement of 26 days (based on a full-time contract) and a number of collective scheduled days off, a non-contributory pension scheme, collective schemes such as company health insurance and travel allowance.
     * Career development: We offer you plenty of opportunities to bring out the best in yourself for example through (online) courses at our Boskalis academy.
     * The Boskalis campus:Experience the unique Boskalis vibe at our Papendrecht site, complete with restaurants, sports field, and a wharf where our vessels dock. We offer a state-of-the-art auditorium, brainstorming rooms, experience center for client meetings, and a barista corner where you can connect with colleagues.
     * Young Boskalis: Are you under 36? Come and join Young Boskalis! Have fun and join in social and sports activities ranging from pub quizzes to yoga, bootcamps and an annual sailing boat race. Networking and knowledge sharing are a vital part of Young Boskalis as well.
       Extra information
     * Your team: You will be part of a development team of in total 15 colleagues with 5 specialised in .Net.
     * Where you will work: For office-based roles, in consultation with your manager and your team, you work partly at home and partly in the office.
     * Full/part-time job: The position of .NET software engineer is a full-time job (40 hours a week). 32 or 36 hours per week is negotiable.
     * Next steps: Apply easily by completing the online application form. Interviews are held online or in the office. Once it's clear we're a good match, we'll make you an offer - and look forward to welcoming you to the company.

To achieve this mission, we are looking for a Senior Backend Developer to join our Generative AI team.
            What you will do
            You'll be working in CM.com's Generative AI team. In our Generative AI team, you'll be working on providing a state-of-the-art centralized platform around generative AI to CM.com customers where they can manage and control their generative AI powered assistants. Our Generative AI team focusses on providing functionality and control around Large Language Models in combination with traditional NLP concepts to fully service our customers' use-cases.
            As a Back-End Engineer, you will play a crucial role in ensuring the scalability and reliability of our existing platform while collaborating closely with the team to design and implement cutting-edge solutions. You will integrate AI capabilities developed by our data scientists and ML engineers with traditional software engineering practices to build innovative products that are either customer-facing or integrated across the broader CM.com platform and product portfolio.
            The core product currently consists of:
            · A custom-built CMS customers can use to easily manage the data in their knowledge base, synchronize their knowledge base with external systems while also preparing the data for our inference engine.
            · A custom-built inference engine that's able to process any question/instruction from the end-user providing fully customizable, autonomous AI agents across multiple domains (customer service, marketing, internal automation…).

To achieve this mission, we are looking for a Senior Data Scientist / Machine Learning Engineer to join our Generative AI team.
            What you will do
            Are you ready to push the boundaries of AI? As a pivotal player in our Generative AI team, you'll design and implement cutting-edge solutions on our centralized AI platform, empowering CM.com's customers to manage and control AI-driven assistants. The software development industry is rapidly evolving, driven by the imperative to enhance development speed, reduce human error, and elevate code quality. These enhancements are crucial as they correlate directly with faster product time-to-market and heightened customer satisfaction. The average time for software deployment has historically lagged due to traditional coding practices, with an estimated 30% of projects exceeding their timeline due to inefficiencies and errors.

   IgniteTech is leading the transformation, integrating advanced GenAI technologies to redefine software architecture and development. Unlike traditional roles that focus on incremental improvements, this position offers the thrilling opportunity to lead pivotal AI-driven initiatives. You will be at the forefront of integrating AI to not just enhance, but revolutionize software development processes and outcomes, significantly boosting efficiency and competitiveness on a strategic level.

   This role is designed for those who are driven to be at the cutting edge of technology and innovation. In the telecommunications industry, operational inefficiency and customer dissatisfaction are persistent issues, exacerbated by the complexity and volume of tasks that must be managed manually. Studies show that companies spend up to 30% of their operational budgets on manual task management, often resulting in service downtime and frustrated customers.

   Totogi is revolutionizing this landscape by leveraging cutting-edge, AI-driven systems to automate these tasks, significantly enhancing operational efficiency and customer satisfaction. By integrating advanced AI technology with deep technical expertise, we are not just solving problems reactively but proactively reshaping the entire support process. This approach is exciting because it sets a new standard in customer service efficiency and technical integration, making us a leader in the industry.

   This role is designed for those who thrive in high-tech, innovative environments. It is not a traditional engineering or support role; instead, it combines hands-on technical work with advanced AI tools to proactively optimize and automate complex support tasks. If you excel at scripting, system configuration, and deep technical troubleshooting, and are excited by the prospect of continuously improving processes through technology, this job is for you.

   In this role, you will be a crucial part of our dynamic team, implementing and managing AI-driven systems to enhance operational efficiency and customer satisfaction. You will configure and maintain network functions to ensure seamless service delivery, analyze data to derive actionable insights, and manage incidents to ensure timely resolution. Your work will directly contribute to our strategic decisions and elevate our customer support to new heights. If you are ready to empower your career with advanced AI technology and make a significant impact, we encourage you to apply and join our forward-thinking team.

   What you will be doing

     * AI System Building: Designing and implementing AI-driven systems and monitoring tools to enhance operational efficiency.

     * Answering the same questions over and over again
     * Providing trivial or basic troubleshooting
     * Writing knowledge base articles, * Enhance operational efficiency and customer satisfaction by optimizing and automating tasks using AI-driven systems and advanced technical skills

Vacaturetitel: Artificial Intelligence Engineer, 2 Hour Learning (Remote) - $100,000/year USD
Functieomschrijving:
This is not a position for those who prefer to specialize in a single aspect of development. We're looking for innovative thinkers who can seamlessly integrate AI across both front-end and back-end systems, taking ownership of the entire product. Your work will directly impact thousands of students, ensuring that our tools meet their needs and set new standards for educational technology., * Develop AI-Powered Web Applications: Architect and code sophisticated web applications that integrate both front-end and back-end components, with a focus on enhancing user experience through AI.
     * Experiment and Innovate with AI: Work with cutting-edge AI technologies, specifically large language models (LLMs) like GPT-4 or Claude, to create autonomous tools and interactive features that redefine how students learn.
     * Drive Technical Projects: Take ownership of the entire development process, from gathering requirements to launching and iterating on products. You'll work closely with stakeholders to ensure that our solutions meet learner needs and push the boundaries of what's possible.
     * Collaborate and Communicate: Partner with a global team of developers, designers, and educational experts. Your ability to communicate complex ideas simply and effectively will be key to your success.
     * Continuous Improvement: Stay ahead of the curve by continually learning and applying the latest advancements in AI and web development to our platform.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Narrow AI Development: You won't be working on isolated AI features that don't integrate with the overall product strategy. Your work will have a direct impact on thousands of students.
     * Surface-Level Coding: This is not a role for those who focus only on either front-end or back-end development. You will be expected to integrate both, creating comprehensive and scalable solutions.
     * Routine Maintenance: This role is not about maintaining legacy systems or making minor updates. You will be driving innovation and building new, cutting-edge applications.
     * Waiting for Detailed Specifications: You won't be handed fully fleshed-out requirements. Instead, you will take high-level ideas and translate them into fully developed products, leveraging your expertise in AI and full-stack development.
     * Working in Isolation: You won't be coding in a vacuum. Collaboration with other developers, product managers, and educational experts is key to ensuring that the solutions you build are impactful and user-centered., Develop and deliver engaging, human-centered AI applications that demonstrably accelerate learning outcomes and efficiency for thousands of K-12 students.

Content marketing platforms are facing unprecedented challenges: scaling content creation, optimizing for ever-changing data, and improving ROI are harder than ever. Despite the promise of AI, many solutions out there only scratch the surface, offering generic models that don't quite address the complex needs of content marketing teams. This means wasted time, underutilized resources, and missed growth opportunities for enterprises.

   At Contently, we're going beyond basic automation, using cutting-edge AI to solve deeply complex problems specific to content marketing, like how to intelligently recommend content, personalize campaigns, and boost engagement using LLMs. In this role, you will explore and implement AI solutions that directly change how global brands create, optimize, and measure their content strategies. It's not just about developing features; it's about transforming an industry.

   This role is tailor-made for someone who craves technical challenge. You'll not only be building end-to-end AI solutions-from writing custom algorithms and integrating machine learning models to deploying scalable cloud-based services-but you'll also have the freedom to experiment with the latest AI technologies. You'll have access to vast datasets, the freedom to iterate fast, and a direct line to see the impact your work has on real users. If you're the kind of engineer who loves to experiment, push boundaries, and innovate in a way that directly impacts product direction, this is the opportunity you've been waiting for.

   Join our team, where every line of code you write contributes to reshaping an industry. You'll work alongside experts in AI, design, and product management, ensuring your innovations translate into features that make a measurable difference for users. If this sounds like your kind of challenge, we want to hear from you.

   What you will be doing

     * Developing and implementing AI-driven features and tools to enhance our content marketing platform
     * Conducting experiments and exploring new AI technologies, including LLMs, to identify potential applications for Contently, * Develop AI-powered applications to reduce operational costs

Are you a forward-thinking developer eager to harness the power of GenAI to redefine business standards and enhance productivity?      * Test and integrate state-of-the-art AI technologies, like GPT-4 Vision and Amazon CodeWhisperer, while providing support and guidance for internal teams on how to best utilize these technologies within their workflows.

Is translating educational theories into actionable assessments your superpower? Do you thrive in environments where excellence is the norm, dissecting and designing with a level of precision that only the keenest eye can achieve?

   We're scouting for an expert in psychometrics with a flair for distilling complex educational measurements into clear, effective tests to sculpt revolutionary educational experiences. Think you have checked all the right boxes so far? Then this is your opportunity to shine.

   At 2 Hour Learning, we're not just tinkering with the idea of AI in education; we're orchestrating a full-blown transformation. Scrap the old playbook of manual test creation. Textbooks? Obsolete. In this role, you will wield the power of generative AI to design prompts that delve deep into the subject matter, commanding it to produce test content that's personalized, engaging, and rigorous.

   Your experience in quantitative measurement and educational content creation will help you synthesize complex frameworks into AI prompts, yielding razor-sharp test questions that align tightly with educational standards. You will then quality control your outputs by crafting AI-first rubrics, ensuring each question and answer hits the mark and stimulates curiosity, enriching the learning journey. It's all about a relentless pursuit of excellence, a continuous cycle of refinement, and a dedication to content that not only meets but exceeds the bar.

   This role goes beyond just creating assessments. You'll be a key player in a collaborative environment, working across teams to improve our entire educational ecosystem. If you identify knowledge gaps during testing, you'll dive into our learning content and student data, partnering with subject matter experts to enhance our overall educational offerings.

   At 2 Hour Learning, we practice knowledge sharing through our "second brain" approach, fostering an environment of continuous learning and collaboration. If you're seeking a role where you can blend creativity with technology, collaborate across disciplines, and where your contributions have a lasting impact, 2 Hour Learning is where you belong. Take the leap and apply now!

   What you will be doing

     * Creating and refining test content to meet rigorous educational standards, using a blend of psychometrics and generative AI tools
     * Developing assessment rubrics with the help of AI that evaluate the depth, alignment, and educational impact of the test content
     * Enhancing the quality of test content through a streamlined, iterative process for consistently superior and challenging assessments
     * Analyzing test results and student data to identify knowledge gaps and areas for improvement in our learning content
     * Collaborating with subject matter experts to address identified gaps and enhance our educational offerings
     * Participating in our "second brain" knowledge-sharing practices to contribute to and learn from our collective expertise

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Creating test content manually - you will be using generative AI tools (such as ChatGPT, Gemini, Claude etc.) for every task
     * Developing code to automate systems - you will focus on test design using AI, while our engineers handle the tech specifics
     * Working in isolation - this role requires active collaboration across multiple teams and disciplines, Applying your psychometric expertise to develop and refine test content with the help of AI, ensuring the assessments are personalized, rigorous, and aligned with educational standards, while contributing to the overall improvement of our learning ecosystem through cross-functional collaboration and data-driven insights.

* Designing and building high-quality AI automations to streamline processes, enhance productivity, and deliver robust, scalable solutions across diverse applications
     * Experimenting with state-of-the-art AI tools like GPT-4 Vision and Amazon CodeWhisperer, integrating them into our developmental process to assess and enhance their utility
     * Evaluating and optimizing the implementation of AI solutions across various infrastructures, including AWS, to ensure seamless performance and integration, Architecting and deploying sophisticated, fully-automated AI systems that require zero human intervention for a truly scalable impact

   At Trilogy's core, we have a strategic product line reshaping industries and how people work and learn. Here's a glimpse of our strategic product line:
     * AdvocateHub: Integrate an AI-powered bot using a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) approach with OpenAI's GPT-4. You'll develop a seamless sidebar widget, implement feature flags, and build a robust logging mechanism to capture KPIs. Sharpen your skills in AI integration, UI/UX design, and data-driven development.
     * Jive Cloud: Build a game-changing AI feature using generative AI and the Jive REST API. You'll leverage AI interactions within existing user activities, abstract the AI provider for flexibility, and optimize search functionality. Grow your expertise in AI architecture, API design, and performance optimization.
     * ACRM: Develop a cutting-edge CRM solution that seamlessly integrates sales, marketing, and support into a sophisticated, user-friendly interface. You'll work on building advanced data analytics modules, implementing machine learning algorithms for predictive insights, and creating intuitive data visualization tools. Expand your skill set in data engineering, AI/ML, and UI/UX design while creating a platform that drives customer success.

   In this role, you can expect to navigate the complexities of integrating AI-driven solutions into these exciting product lines, offering unique opportunities to innovate. Your expertise will guide the development of scalable, serverless applications and innovative features, leveraging the full potential of cloud-native technologies.

   Here's what you can expect from our application process:
     * A quick check: Answer a few yes/no questions to confirm you meet the basic requirements.
     * Prove your potential: Take a 15-minute cognitive assessment (the Criteria CCAT), scientifically proven to be the best predictor of success in roles that require rapidly gaining and applying new knowledge.
     * Showcase your skills: Demonstrate your coding prowess by writing, testing, and refactoring code, developing new features with AI, and collaborating with AI to diagnose and solve problems.
     * Connect with leadership: Engage in a 30-minute Google Meet interview with a member of our Engineering leadership team.

   This comprehensive process takes approximately 5 hours, which you can complete at your own pace. We value your time and effort, so we'll provide the results of each assessment within 24 hours of completion and interview decisions within 3 business days.

     * A team of exceptionally talented engineers from around the world as your peers.
     * The chance to work on products that are making a real difference in people's lives.

   We're not just using AI as a buzzword. We're at the start of a thrilling journey with generative AI, experimenting and learning to fully leverage its potential and free our engineers from mundane tasks, allowing them to focus on what truly matters: design, decision-making, and understanding the far-reaching implications of different implementation strategies.

   Showcase your skills, not just your resume. Take on our challenges: 15-min Cognitive, 90-min Coding, 180-min Technical Decision-Making. Excel and you'll face a decisive interview with our Hiring Manager. More than half walk away with an offer. Ready to unleash your potential? Apply today!

   What you will be doing

     * Building modern web apps using top-notch libraries and tools.
     * Enhancing cloud-native backends using the latest serverless cloud patterns, including AWS.
     * Reviewing code to ensure adherence to best practices, team standards, and customer requirements.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Spending time on minor bug fixes or features in outdated codebases.
     * Dealing with tedious infrastructure to keep poorly written products running.
     * Getting stuck in endless meetings discussing roadmaps and priorities or chasing people around.

Vacaturetitel: Full Stack Engineer, 2 Hour Learning (Remote) - $100,000/year USD
Functieomschrijving:
This is not a position for those who prefer to specialize in a single aspect of development. We're looking for innovative thinkers who can seamlessly integrate AI across both front-end and back-end systems, taking ownership of the entire product. Your work will directly impact thousands of students, ensuring that our tools meet their needs and set new standards for educational technology., * Develop AI-Powered Web Applications: Architect and code sophisticated web applications that integrate both front-end and back-end components, with a focus on enhancing user experience through AI.
     * Experiment and Innovate with AI: Work with cutting-edge AI technologies, specifically large language models (LLMs) like GPT-4 or Claude, to create autonomous tools and interactive features that redefine how students learn.
     * Drive Technical Projects: Take ownership of the entire development process, from gathering requirements to launching and iterating on products. You'll work closely with stakeholders to ensure that our solutions meet learner needs and push the boundaries of what's possible.
     * Collaborate and Communicate: Partner with a global team of developers, designers, and educational experts. Your ability to communicate complex ideas simply and effectively will be key to your success.
     * Continuous Improvement: Stay ahead of the curve by continually learning and applying the latest advancements in AI and web development to our platform.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Narrow AI Development: You won't be working on isolated AI features that don't integrate with the overall product strategy. Your work will have a direct impact on thousands of students.
     * Surface-Level Coding: This is not a role for those who focus only on either front-end or back-end development. You will be expected to integrate both, creating comprehensive and scalable solutions.
     * Routine Maintenance: This role is not about maintaining legacy systems or making minor updates. You will be driving innovation and building new, cutting-edge applications.
     * Waiting for Detailed Specifications: You won't be handed fully fleshed-out requirements. Instead, you will take high-level ideas and translate them into fully developed products, leveraging your expertise in AI and full-stack development.
     * Working in Isolation: You won't be coding in a vacuum. Collaboration with other developers, product managers, and educational experts is key to ensuring that the solutions you build are impactful and user-centered., Develop and deliver engaging, human-centered AI applications that demonstrably accelerate learning outcomes and efficiency for thousands of K-12 students.

Are you a full-stack engineer who thrives on complex challenges and is eager to make a real impact? Join our team to contribute to innovative products that deeply leverage AI, changing the way we work and learn.
