We are looking for a Staff Machine Learning Engineer to help us develop and grow new Generative AI driven products and tools. You will play a key role in enabling safe and healthy machine learning and Generative AI driven experiences in Firefox.
   What is a Staff Engineer at Mozilla?
   A Staff Engineer is the next level from a Senior Engineer. At Mozilla this role can vary but typically a Staff Engineer is a domain expert who leads others within a single team to tackle multi-month projects. Tasks that may be initially ambiguous or require significant planning and require them to influence or direct the work of several engineers. They sequence deliverables and manage risks in their team's projects, provide feedback on our strategy and goals affecting the team, and turn our strategy into action for their team members. Staff Engineers mentor others by stewarding some responsibilities to more junior and senior engineers so they can take on new ones. They collaborate with management on building team consensus and providing direction. Staff Engineers identify gaps and opportunities for improvement to enable a culture of inclusion and allyship, at all levels of the organization.
   What youll do:

   Lead the design, development, and integration of Generative AI solutions in Firefox, collaborating cross functionally with product management, full stack engineering and design.
   Build infrastructure for training and inference of LLMs and small language and vision models for use cases on the web and mobile Firefox product experiences.
   Implement robust validation and testing procedures to ensure the developed models' generalizability and reliability
   Continuously monitor and optimize deployed models for performance and efficiency

Nederlands (Nederland)  Do you like developing innovative solutions that automate repetitive tasks and make organizations more efficient? Make an impact as GenAI Engineer at Möbius!  Praktische informatie

* Het ontwerpen en implementeren van AI-architecturen gebaseerd op large language models (LLMs) zoals GPT en andere geavanceerde AI-modellen
     * Het bouwen van schaalbare AI-oplossingen en het ontwerpen van flexibele, toekomstbestendige architecturen voor cloudomgevingen zoals Azure
     * Het ontwikkelen en beheren van AI-modellen, van proof-of-concept tot productie, waarbij je zorgt voor naadloze integratie en deployment op cloudplatforms
     * Het toepassen van vaardigheden in prompt engineering om LLMs te optimaliseren en aan te passen aan specifieke klantbehoeften en use-cases
     * Het combineren van GenAI-kennis met traditionele machine learning-technieken en frameworks zoals Python , TensorFlow , en PyTorch om hybride AI-oplossingen te realiseren.
     * Het bouwen en beheren van API's voor AI-diensten, inclusief API-management en beveiliging.
     * Samenwerken met klanten en interne teams om hun AI-behoeften te begrijpen en te vertalen naar waardevolle, data-gedreven oplossingen.

Heb jij een duidelijke visie op de rol van Large Language Models (LLMs) in het ondersteunen van een data-gedreven organisatie? Kun jij complexe LLM-oplossingen bouwen die direct waarde toevoegen aan de organisatie en klanten ondersteunen in hun dagelijkse interactie? Dan zijn wij op zoek naar jou!

De IT-organisatie is vanaf 1 januari 2025 ingericht met drie primaire afdelingen op de focusgebieden Kern, Data en Distributie. De CIO Office biedt ondersteuning door richting en houvast te geven aan strategische doelen en kaders.
   Je bent een proactieve en klantgerichte professional die in staat is om zelfstandig mee te denken met stakeholders en oplossingen voor te stellen die aansluiten bij de behoeften van de organisatie. Jouw analytische vaardigheden en vermogen om complexe vraagstukken te doorgronden helpen je om waardevolle oplossingen te realiseren. Je bent communicatief sterk en kunt complexe onderwerpen helder overbrengen.

Vacaturetitel: Senior Data Engineer met passie voor data architectuur
Functieomschrijving:
Als senior Data Engineer lever je een essentiële bijdrage aan de transformatie naar een digitale en data gedreven schadeverzekeraar en intermediair. Als senior Data Engineer werk je nauw samen met de Data Engineers die in onze Data Squads nieuwe en complexe data preparaties ontwerpen en realiseren. Hierdoor kunnen de BI Experts and ML Engineers in deze Data Squads dataproducten leveren die direct waarde toevoegen voor onze klanten en collega's. Meer specifiek ga je doen:
     * Ontwikkelen, uitbreiden en verbeteren van (virtuele) ETL jobs en data modellen. Dit voor complexe data extracten, transformaties en preparatie processen in het AAV Data Analytisch Platform. Dit platform is gebaseerd op de tools Denodo, Azure SQL&ADF en Databricks en is gehost op Azure
     * Coachen van Data Engineers in de Data Squads en in het Data Beheer team
     * Samenwerken met Data Engineers op het gebied van data modellering, data oplossingen bedenken en root-cause analyses uitvoeren

   Aangezien je veel affiniteit hebt met data architectuur, adviseer je in de rol van data architect organisatie breed over hoe we data en AI technologie zo optimaal mogelijk kunnen integreren in ons landschap. Denk hierbij aan:
     * Samen met de AAV Enterprise Architect richting geven aan de verdere implementatie van onze strategie op basis van o.a. de data productvisie, de kaders en principes van data architectuur als ook de brede Enterprise architectuur
     * Afstemmen met stakeholders en zo zeker stellen dat onze data producten ook aansluiten binnen de architectuur van ons moederbedrijf, Nationale Nederlanden

Als AAV stimuleren wij onze medewerkers om iedere dag het beste uit zichzelf te halen. En om het initiatief en de verantwoordelijkheid te nemen in het continu verbeteren van onze dienstverlening. Onze cultuur is professioneel en we werken in een informele sfeer met elkaar samen.

   Bij NN werken we hybride. Deels vanuit huis en deels op kantoor. Teams ontmoeten elkaar digitaal, fysiek of hybride. Je spreekt samen met je team af wat het beste past. We hebben onze kantoren zo ingericht dat er voor elk type werk een passende plek is. De officiële standplaats voor deze functie is Zwolle.

   Als senior Data Engineer werk je in de IJsseltoren, het hoogste punt van Zwolle met uitzicht over de IJssel en de mooie oude binnenstad van Zwolle. Een unieke locatie met een unieke samenstelling van bedrijven: de joint venture tussen ABN AMRO en Nationale-Nederlanden. Je rijdt zo vanaf de A28 naar dit moderne kantorencomplex. Restaurant De Lobby biedt elke dag heerlijke, pure gerechten, dus verruil je werkplek gerust voor een verrassende lunch.

The team you work with on a daily basis consists of a group of data scientists, a small group of software and machine learning professionals, and a program manager who oversees our activities. You will, of course, work closely with the team's data scientist, and together with these colleagues, we work with great enthusiasm and dedication every day to optimize and innovate customer service, processes, and quality.

   In addition, you are a member of the "Engineering" guild, where about 400 engineers meet each other. Here, you exchange knowledge and experiences with peers. We believe that every engineer can learn something from their peers, and vice versa. This way, you accelerate your career and deliver maximum value with our AI solutions.

We're looking for a Lead AI Engineer with a strong background in generative AI models and an interest in Privacy Enhancing Technologies (PET). The ideal candidate will explore the intersection of generative AI and MPC, developing new techniques and methodologies that allow for secure, distributed AI computations. You will be working with the Nillion Product team and report to Nillion's AI Product Lead., * You will design & execute a technical AI roadmap towards bridging the gap between AI and confidential computing, in close collaboration with our AI and cryptography team
     * You will work closely with our cryptography team, getting up to speed with the technical nuances & implementing AI models accordingly
     * You will adapt AI model architectures to work in a performant way under a confidential computing paradigm and technically implement these architectures in our AI toolkit
     * You will have regular touchpoints with AI developers on the Nillion network and integrate their feedback in our AI roadmap
     * You will work closely with our DevRel team and actively contribute to creating easy-to-use AI tools and suitable AI development workflows

The ideal candidate will explore the intersection of generative AI and MPC, developing new techniques and methodologies that allow for secure, distributed AI computations. You will be working with the Nillion Product team and report to Nillion's AI Product Lead., * You will design & execute a technical AI roadmap towards bridging the gap between AI and confidential computing, in close collaboration with our AI and cryptography team

Als Data Engineer bij Pincvision ben jij een belangrijke schakel in ons team. Samen met je collega's ontwikkel en onderhoud je slimme IT-oplossingen die enorme hoeveelheden data verwerken en vertalen naar internationale wet- en regelgeving. Jouw input maakt direct impact, want jij optimaliseert onze dataprocessen én adviseert nieuwe klanten over datakwaliteit.

   Daarnaast werk je nauw samen met onze compliance analisten om rapportages en dashboards te creëren die écht het verschil maken. Geen dag is hetzelfde, en jij krijgt volop ruimte om nieuwe technologieën te ontdekken en te implementeren.

* Onze data-driven oplossingen verbeteren en vernieuwen.
   * Adviseren over innovatieve technologieën zoals generative AI en business rule engines.
   * Vakspecialisten ondersteunen met het oplossen van complexe datavraagstukken.
   * Klanten adviseren over datakwaliteit, datamapping en modellering.
   * Rapportages en dashboards ontwikkelen samen met interne teams.

* Ontwikkeling van web- en mobiele applicaties: Het ontwerp en de bouw van gebruiksvriendelijke applicaties waarin de S2T-dienst wordt getoetst.

   Contacten

Bepaalt prioriteiten en geeft de benodigde acties, tijd en middelen
   aan om ervoor te zorgen dat activiteiten plaats vinden en zaken
   geregeld worden. Evalueert de voortgang en stelt waar nodig de
   planning en opzet bij.

Ontwikkeling van web- en mobiele applicaties: Het ontwerp en de bouw van gebruiksvriendelijke applicaties waarin de S2T-dienst wordt getoetst.
   - Integratie van de dienst in gebruikersapplicaties: Meehelpen aan de integratie van de S2T-dienst in bestaande gebruikersapplicaties.

Vacaturetitel: Internship electrical engineer / Software / AI developer in renewable field
Functieomschrijving:
Your internship will take place mainly remotely and rarely with maximum of one day per week from Rotterdam office. During the terms of internship, you will be working on developing few innovative ideas and performing some project work. Pont Renewables has recently been awarded with MIT feasibility study grant by province of South Holland, which will be the basis if the study of this internship in the field of application of Artificial Intelligence in Renewable Energy projects.

   Your work will be in relation about some of the largest utility scale solar projects internationally, with the focus on the Netherlands, and Northwest Europe. Pont Renewables has been working on renewable projects across Europe and the range of service offerings differ from feasibility studies to applications of different software solutions for project development of renewable assets.
   Tasks/assignment

   At Pont, we see digital technology and digitalization as key enablers of the transition to a low-carbon energy system. Our vision is clear: agile, smaller-scale entities are crucial in shaping a sustainable energy future, realizaztion of climate action goals, and making significant meaningful progress in domains often less traverses by larger organisations.

   We have been developing data driven digital tools to have a role in this rapidly changing energy landscape. These tools help us to contribute to acceleration of energy transition, save additional costs on the operation of solar plants and help our customers to prolong the lifetime of their assets, which directly results in lower Levelized Cost of Electricity (LCOE). With the recent developments in the field of generative AI, we see a great potential to be tapped to further facilitate and accelerate renewable project developments.

   What we're offering

   · A challenging opportunity with international exposure

   · Getting familiar with the international best industry practices in the field of renewable energy, applying advanced AI technologies.

   · A potential chance to learn consultancy skills in practice through renewable energy projects involving several types of stakeholders.

Vacaturetitel: Senior Machine Learning Engineer (Qualcomm AI Research, Amsterdam)

Functieomschrijving:
We are looking for a talented and collaborative Full Stack Software Engineer to join our client's Create Team. In this role, you will work closely with a highly skilled team to drive the development of our document automation solutions. You will play a pivotal role in crafting scalable, high-quality software, contributing to both product discovery and delivery processes. This position allows you to influence the architecture and tools, and you'll have the opportunity to mentor team members. Success in this role requires a strong focus on customer value, excellent communication skills, and a passion for continuous improvement.
   Description
     * Collaborate with cross-functional teams to translate business requirements into technical solutions, ensuring alignment with product goals.
     * Design, develop, and deploy scalable software components with an emphasis on high performance, security, and reliability.
     * Engage in code reviews and best practices to maintain a high standard of code quality.
     * Identify and resolve software defects, conducting debugging and testing as necessary.
     * Contribute to continuous improvement of development tools and processes, encouraging team innovation.
     * Stay updated on emerging technologies and industry trends to enhance personal and team skill sets.
     * Work within an Agile framework, participating in sprint planning, daily stand-ups, and other team ceremonies.

Duik in de wereld van AI bij Refreshworks, waar innovatie en toekomstgerichtheid centraal staan. Als AI Engineer werk je aan cutting-edge AI-oplossingen, van ontwikkeling tot implementatie. Geniet van unieke secundaire arbeidsvoorwaarden zoals een inclusieve werkomgeving, waar diversiteit en Engels als voertaal de norm zijn, een hechte teamcultuur die Ohana (familie) omarmt, sportactiviteiten, en jaarlijkse buitenlandse teamreizen. Benieuwd naar de rest? Lees door!

Als AI Engineer bij Refreshworks.ai speel je een cruciale rol in de ontwikkeling en implementatie van cutting-edge AI-oplossingen:
     * Ontwikkeling van AI-modellen: ontwerp, ontwikkel, en implementeer geavanceerde voorspellende modellen en algoritmes. Je werkt aan diverse uitdagingen zoals computer vision, regressie- en classificatieproblemen, optimalisatie en natural language processing (NLP).
     * Experimenten en Proof-of-Concepts: Ontwikkel experimenten om de technische haalbaarheid van verschillende modellen aan te tonen en om ze onderling te vergelijken.
     * Cross-functionele samenwerking: werk samen met diverse afdelingen om AI-oplossingen naadloos te integreren binnen onze bedrijfsprocessen.
     * Kennisdeling en presentatie: deel je bevindingen en aanbevelingen met zowel technische teams als niet-technische stakeholders. Blijf up-to-date met de laatste trends in data science en AI, en deel deze kennis binnen het bedrijf.

* Oplossingsarchitectuur definiëren en bijdragen aan de ontwikkeling van de enterprise-architectuur voor GenAI-omgevingen.
     * GenAI-oplossingen ontwerpen, bouwen en beheren binnen Azure Cloud, waarbij transparantie wordt gewaarborgd in zowel prestaties als kosten.
     * De ontwikkeling van GenAI-gestuurde applicaties stimuleren met behulp van zowel low-code als high-code benaderingen.
     * Samenwerken met verschillende teams om vereisten te verzamelen en deelnemen aan prototyping en hackathons.
     * Kennis delen en teamleden begeleiden om een cultuur van leren en innovatie te bevorderen.
     * Op de hoogte blijven van de nieuwste trends in GenAI en Microsoft Azure Cloud om onze digitale initiatieven te verbeteren.

Vacaturetitel: Mendix Engineer met oog voor AI
Functieomschrijving:
Bij MxBlue doen we dingen graag net even anders. Wij zijn op zoek naar een Mendix Engineer die net zo enthousiast is over de mogelijkheden van kunstmatige intelligentie als wij. Word jij blij van het idee om low-code en AI te koppelen en samen met een team van slimme koppen de toekomst van applicatie ontwikkeling vorm te geven? Dan zit je bij ons goed!

   Jij weet hoe Mendix werkt. Jij snapt wat onze klanten nodig hebben en AI-tools zijn jou niet vreemd. Samen slaan we die brug. Tussen Mendix en AI - met onze klanten. Duik dieper in deze snelgroeiende wereld en ontwikkel samen met onze klanten slimme oplossingen die écht het verschil maken.

   Dit is wat je gaat doen:
     * Zelfstandig generatieve AI services implementeren binnen Mendix apps.
     * Samen met datascientists sleutelen aan vernieuwende ML modellen.
     * Nieuwe mogelijkheden van AI verkennen en samen met klanten slimme oplossingen ontwikkelen.

   Wat we in jou zoeken:
     * Mendix Advanced+ certificering
     * Een HBO of WO diploma in je zak, liefst richting de techniek,
     * 3 jaar + ervaring met het Mendix-platform, inclusief ervaring met Studio en Studio Pro,
     * Een gezonde dosis nieuwsgierigheid naar AI, met ervaring op platforms als OpenAI, Azure AI, AWS Bedrock, of Google Gemini,
     * Ervaring met het verweven van generatieve AI en ML in Mendix-applicaties,
     * Java is mooi meegenomen en je kent je weg in de wereld van REST en API's,
     * Vloeiend in Nederlands en Engels, zowel mondeling als schriftelijk,
     * Agile werken? Jij draait je hand er niet voor om.

   Wat wij bieden:
     * De kans om voorop te lopen in de integratie van AI met Mendix,
     * Volop ruimte voor jouw persoonlijke en professionele ontwikkeling,
     * Een team dat net zo gedreven en nuchter is als jij,
     * Zonder overbodige meetings. In een baan met een goede werk-privébalans,
     * Een salaris waar je blij van wordt met een maandelijkse winstdelingsregeling,
     * Een leaseauto of mobiliteitsbudget,
     * Telefoonvergoeding,
     * Soft- en hardskills traingen.

   Over ons (in het kort)

   Ons moederbedrijf SUPERP is dit jaar 25 jaar actief in de wereld van SAP en we mogen onszelf inmiddels een autoriteit noemen. In 2017 hebben onze diensten uitgebreid met low-codeplatform Mendix (MxBlue) en in 2019 met crm-platform Salesforce (SxBlue). Door maatwerk Mendix-apps en Salesforce met SAP te combineren, kunnen we onze opdrachtgevers nog beter ondersteunen. Dat doen we met een team van 200 vakidioten en 150 externe experts. www.mxblue.nl / www.superp.nl

* Designing, developing, modifying, and maintaining NX CAM software.
     * Conducting research, design, prototyping, and other exploratory activities.
     * Creating and testing feature components as well as ensuring software quality through unit and system-level testing.
     * Collaborating with and supporting the Product Owner in building and refining user stories and acceptance tests.
     * Utilising paired programming and other practices for frequent code review.
     * Maintaining continuous communication to set shared expectations and fostering a transparent and safe environment.
     * Applying best practices in coding, design, and implementation to build high-quality components and solutions.
     * Leveraging team expertise while sharing knowledge for the team's future benefit.

Sogeti is een organisatie met een goede werksfeer en zo min mogelijk hiërarchische verhoudingen. We bieden innovatieve oplossingen aan een breed scala van klanten in verschillende sectoren. Met een sterke nadruk op technologische expertise en klantgerichtheid, streven we naar het leveren van hoogwaardige diensten die onze klanten helpen te excelleren in de digitale wereld.

   Ga je bij ons als Lead Machine Learning engineer de slag? Dan kun je rekenen op honderden collega's die klaarstaan om klanten te helpen, en ook elkaar graag een helpende hand bieden. Sogetisten gaan niet alleen voor goede resultaten, maar ook voor lol tijdens het werk. Deze snelgroeiende groep collega's krijgt energie van hun vak en dat merk je op de werkvloer. Sogeti is een fijne werkgever en geeft jou de ruimte om de inhoud in te duiken!

   Als getalenteerde Lead Machine Learning engineer ben je verantwoordelijk voor het ontwikkelen van geavanceerde Machine Learning oplossingen bij klanten. Voor het implementeren van een end-to-end machine learning project volgens MLOps principes draai jij je hand niet om.

   Daarnaast speel je een cruciale rol in het adviseren van klanten en het ondersteunen van pre-sales activiteiten. Dit doe je om de behoefte van de klant effectief te begrijpen en hen passende oplossingen te bieden. Zo creeer jij maximale impact.

   Dit ga jij doen!

     * Leiden van AI-projecten en teams om innovatieve oplossingen te ontwikkelen.
     * Adviseren van klanten over de beste Data Science en Machine Learning strategieën voor hun specifieke behoeften.
     * Het implementeren van end-to-end Machine Learning pipelines.
     * Deelnemen aan pre-sales activiteiten, waaronder het identificeren van kansen, het begrijpen van klantvereisten en het presenteren van oplossingen.
     * Opbouwen en onderhouden van sterke klantrelaties door effectieve communicatie, samenwerking en thought leadership.Actief bijdragen aan de groei van het AI-team en kennisdeling binnen de organisatie.

Als Machine Learning Engineer help je onze klanten vertrouwd te maken met het verwerken van complexe data door middel van machine learning, data mining en deep learning technologieën. Je zet statistische modellen en voorspellende algoritmes in om verborgen patronen te onthullen. Daarbij ontwikkel je end-tot-end oplossingen om je werk te operationaliseren. Niet alleen PoC's maar ook robuuste oplossingen die in productie worden gebruikt. Dit doe je samen met het Center of Excellence (CoE) van ons AI-team, of in directe samenwerking met de klant. Je creëert echte impact door middel van het toepassen van machine learning en AI-technieken.

* Hoe kunnen we ervoor zorgen dat onze modellen efficiënt werken blijven doorontwikkelen?
     * Hoe zorgen we ervoor dat onze modellen businesswaarde genereren?
     * Hoe kunnen we generative AI veilig en ethisch inzetten?

Als Machine Learning Engineer help je onze klanten vertrouwd te maken met het verwerken van complexe data door middel van machine learning, data mining en deep learning technologieën. Je zet statistische modellen en voorspellende algoritmes in om verborgen patronen te onthullen. Daarbij ontwikkel je end-tot-end oplossingen om je werk te operationaliseren. Niet alleen PoC's maar ook robuuste oplossingen die in productie worden gebruikt. Dit doe je samen met het Center of Excellence (CoE) van ons AI-team, of in directe samenwerking met de klant. Je creëert echte impact door middel van het toepassen van machine learning en AI-technieken.

Ontwikkel jezelf in Quality Engineering & Testing met ons traineeship bij Sogeti. Leer van experts en maak impact. Solliciteer vandaag!

   Ervaring: Starter (0-2 jaar)

   Expertise: Testen

   Location: Utrecht
    1. Traineeship Quality Engineering & Testing

   Ben jij een verbindende kracht met oog voor detail en de ambitie om als Quality Engineer een sleutelrol te spelen in het softwareonwikkelproces? Ontdek dan ons High Performance Quality Engineering Traineeship , waar we jouw vaardigheden in Quality Engineering, persoonlijk leiderschap, communicatie en teamwork aanscherpen.

   In dit traineeship duik je in automation frameworks zoals Robot Framework en maak je gebruik van Generative AI . Het programma ondersteunt de ontwikkeling van jouw softskills. Als Quality Engineer ben jij de cruciale schakel tussen gebruikers, ontwikkelaars en analisten. Het in kaart brengen van risico's, verstrekken van advies en het verkrijgen van waardevolle feedback uit applicaties behoren tot jouw verantwoordelijkheden. Je draagt tevens de moderne kwaliteitsgedachte uit naar jouw omgeving.

   Sogeti biedt een innovatief programma, met als hoogtepunt een unieke business course in de Verenigde Staten van de Ohio University, bekroond met een ' Program Excellence Award ' door de 'Higher Education Association'. Vanaf 2024 biedt het traineeship een verdieping in Generative AI in Quality Engineering. Generative AI zoals ChatGPT , Prompt Engineering en National Language Processing heeft een gigantische impact op ons vakgebied. Denk aan het inzetten van deze tooling voor testontwerp, testframeworks en het identificeren en rapporteren van bevindingen. We geven daarmee vanaf 2024 een nieuwe richting aan ons traineeship en daarvoor zoeken wij jou!

   Werken bij Sogeti

   Het traineeship Quality Engineering & Testing duurt 1 jaar en bestaat uit 4 onderdelen:

    Een onboarding; maak kennis met onze organisatie en collega's;

    Een Ohio Business Course; ontdek jouw sterke- en verbeterpunten en pas deze toe als professional

    Een specialisatieopleiding; behaal alle essentiele certificaten zoals; TMAP, Tosca Automation Engineer, Professional Scrum Master en Cloud. De praktijkcasussen omvatten frontend, backend en API-testen, evenals het werken met Robot Framework

    Verdiepingsmodules: Maak keuzes tussen Automated Quality Engineering, Package based Quality Engineering en Core Quality Engineering

   Tijdens elk onderdeel word je continu begeleid door jouw persoonlijke Career Manager. Directe ervaring wordt opgedaan in één of meerdere opdrachten, waarbij samen met je Career Manager gezocht wordt naar een opdracht die past bij jouw ambitie en ervaring. Sogeti beschikt over een team van IT-experts die klaar staan om jou inhoudelijk te begeleiden, zodat je er nooit alleen voor staat.

ls Generative AI Engineer speel je een sleutelrol bij het ontwerpen, implementeren en optimaliseren van generatieve AI-oplossingen. Met jouw expertise in Retrieval-Augmented Generation Systems (RAGS), Large Language Models (LLMs), en vector databases zorg je voor AI-systemen die snel, nauwkeurig en impactvol zijn. Je bent de schakel tussen data en output - je zorgt ervoor dat onze modellen precies datgene leveren wat onze klanten nodig hebben.

Met interesse voor data, innovatie en AI product implementatie zal je werken aan de realisatie van producten met Machine Learning, Deep Learning, OCR, Computer Vision, LLM's en meer. Ook Docker, Kubernetes, AI deployment pipelines en Generative AI zullen elementen van het werk zijn.

We are seeking a capability of a senior data & Generative AI Engineer with cloud competency to drive innovation at the intersection of data engineering and artificial intelligence. This role combines expertise in data engineering, generative AI, and machine learning, focussing on building scalable data and AI products on the cloud.

* Lead the sales process with a focus on enterprise sales cycles

     * Enjoy team outings, company catch-ups, and social events.

As a Senior Engineer and Tech Lead at TKH AI, you will play a key role in executing our AI product strategy. Your primary responsibility will be to guide the development of our Conversational AI foundation, integrating it across various tools and platforms (such as communication systems and IDEs). You will also drive the development of AI-driven Proofs of Concept (POCs) tailored to the needs of our group of companies.

   You will collaborate closely with product management, design, and other stakeholders to develop innovative and effective software solutions. Your role will include fostering a culture of technical excellence, continuous improvement, and customer-focused innovation.

   Key Responsibilities:
     * Provide technical direction and leadership to developers and AI engineers.

     * Drive architecture and design of scalable and maintainable AI solutions.

     * Ensure code quality and reduce technical debt.

     * Work closely with product managers to translate business goals into technical requirements.

     * Facilitate communication between development team and stakeholders.

     * Mentor and coach team members, providing regular feedback.

     * Oversee development lifecycle, from planning to deployment and maintenance.

     * Ensure timely delivery of high-quality software solutions.

   Encourage a culture of experimentation and learning.

Vacaturetitel: Full stack software engineer - Ecommerce (Shopify Plus / React)
Functieomschrijving:
Are you our new Fullstack Developer who's not just technically skilled but also practical and business-minded? In this role, you'll lead the technical direction of our Shopify Plus e-commerce platform, combining hands-on development with smart decision-making. Your goal will be to deliver solutions that boost user experience and drive business value. You'll always aim for the fastest, most robust solution that meets our needs, prioritizing what works best for the business. You'll collaborate closely with our small team to ensure our technology supports and advances our business objectives., * E-commerce Development: Lead the development and optimization of our Shopify Plus platform across multiple domains, ensuring a seamless integration with multiple systems and high-performing user experience
     * Lead Development & Team: Write code while managing a small team. Balance hands-on coding with leadership to keep projects on track.
     * Product ownership: Work with team members to prioritize development tasks that align with business goals and deliver real value.
     * Process & Tools: Improve code reliability, CI/CD pipelines, ensure robust QA, and manage code reviews using GitLab/GitHub., * E-commerce: Shopify Plus powers our online store across six domains (JS, HTML, CSS, Liquid), React apps (algolia), GTM server-side + GA4 for analytics
     * ERP: ODOO V16, self-hosted.
     * Data & Cloud: Google Cloud for data lake (bigquery and dataform) and cloud functions
     * Automation & AI: N8N for automation and exploring integrations with Dify for LLM (Large Language Model) capabilities., * Flexible Working: While we prefer candidates in our Eindhoven office, we accept remote candidates, provided you are within a 3-hour time zone of the Netherlands. You'll need to be available during Dutch office hours.
     * High Responsibility & Growth: Enjoy a high level of responsibility and impact, with continuous learning and professional growth opportunities.
     * Team Collaboration: We value collaboration and regularly hold team gatherings, both virtual and in-person, to ensure everyone feels connected and aligned.

   If you're someone who enjoys both the strategic and the practical aspects of development and wants to be part of a small but ambitious team building the future of automated e-commerce, we'd love to hear from you!

Important

   The job requires to be available minimally 32 hours per week, with work scheduled during Dutch office hours. If you apply for a remote position and you're located outside of the Netherlands, you can join us full-time as an independent contractor. To some extent, we ignore geography in order to find the best person for each role. Due to the substantial differences between labor and business laws in each country, the easiest way to hire talent outside of our registered countries is through freelance contracts.

Develop Python and JavaScript apps for data processing and system integration.

IT Landscape

     * ERP: Currently using ODOO V16, self-hosted. Plan to reduce customizations and migrate to Odoo.sh or potentially to ODOO Online.
     * E-commerce: Shopify Plus powers our online store on 6 domains.
     * Data & Cloud: Utilize Google Cloud for data lake and cloud functions, with BigQuery and Dataform for data management.
     * Automation & AI: Employ N8N for automation and explore integrations with Dify for LLM (Large Language Model) capabilities., * Flexible Working: While we prefer candidates in our Eindhoven office, we accept remote candidates, provided you are within a 3-hour time zone of the Netherlands. You'll need to be available during Dutch office hours.
     * High Responsibility & Growth: Enjoy a high level of responsibility and impact, with continuous learning and professional growth opportunities.
     * Team Collaboration: We value collaboration and regularly hold team gatherings, both virtual and in-person, to ensure everyone feels connected and aligned.

   If you're someone who enjoys both the strategic and the practical aspects of development and wants to be part of a small but ambitious team building the future of automated e-commerce, we'd love to hear from you!

Important

   The job requires to be available minimally 32 hours per week, with work scheduled during Dutch office hours. If you apply for a remote position and you're located outside of the Netherlands, you can join us full-time as an independent contractor. To some extent, we ignore geography in order to find the best person for each role. Due to the substantial differences between labor and business laws in each country, the easiest way to hire talent outside of our registered countries is through freelance contracts.

We have an exciting new job opening for a Generative AI Scientist in our Rapid Response Team. We are looking for a creative candidate who thrives on curiosity and learning, who has a passion to innovate, and enjoys a challenge. If you are that kind of scientist consider joining our team of thinkers and doers to drive innovation at the intersection of discovery and action!

   This position is in our Eindhoven-based Rapid Response Team (RRT), part of the Data and AI group at Thermo Fisher Scientific. The RRT is a multidisciplinary team focused on unlocking Generative AI's potential for customer products and R&D processes. The team moves quickly, progressing from ideation to proof of concept within four weeks.

   As a creative force in the RRT, you'll explore and showcase new GenAI technologies for future products and processes. Your role involves iterating on prototypes, validating assumptions, and preparing demos and reports. You'll collaborate with AI specialists, marketing, IT & SW Digital specialists, and partner teams, sharing results and insights across the organization., * Develop and propose compelling proof-of-concepts for application of generative AI in customer products or R&D process improvements.
     * Keep up to date with the latest advancements in the field of Generative AI and disseminate that learning in the team.
     * Collaborate closely with the AI teams across Thermo Fisher Scientific to define and integrate next generation AI methods into our customers products.
     * Drive patent generation in your field of expertise.

We are seeking an experienced AI Engineer to join their team. You will be a part of an AI Engineering team focused on GenAI infrastructure and applications. This team is responsible for delivering on company's GenAI strategy by providing infrastructure for other teams to use and building zero to one point solutions for others to adopt in their applications. You are expected to use software engineering best practices adapted to a non-deterministic technology, Generative AI, which will require flexibility while maintaining high standards of reliability. While the goals are clear, how they get there can be ambiguous with emerging technologies requiring you to be creative in your problem solving.

   This role reports to the AI Engineering Manager within the Data organization. Data is centralized within the company and provides solutions for all of their applications and business to utilize.

   What you will do:
     * Architect and implement innovative GenAI based solutions.
     * Cultivate high standards for communication, ownership, and quality while executing asynchronously.
     * Work with a distributed engineering team across multiple time zones/countries.
     * Ensure tasks are transparent, organized, on schedule and expectations are managed.
     * Partner with other technical leaders to refine and deliver on their GenAI strategy.
     * Be a strong voice of clarity in a world of a growing startup, and help your colleagues function when faced with ambiguity.
     * Conduct and facilitate code reviews to maintain high code quality and adherence to standards.
     * Stay updated on emerging technologies and industry best practices, driving continuous improvement in development processes., * An independent engineer (not associated with an agency) with the ability to work approximately 40 hours per week, Monday-Friday.
     * Committed to being available until noon Pacific Time (not necessarily working but responsive on Slack and attending occasional meetings).
     * A camera and microphone are required for interviews and further team meetings/discussions.
     * Remote position, collaborating with a distributed team of engineers across the Americas and Eurasia.
     * Weekly wages.

We are seeking a talented and experienced Sr Software Engineer to join our Cyber Defense team focusing on the development of the next generation AI-powered security platform. This platform will be instrumental in enhancing our cyber defense capabilities across security operations, incident response, threat intelligence, and more. The security landscape is constantly evolving, and with the adoption of ML/GenAI backed by extensive heterogeneous data, security threats are inevitably broadened. With your deep and comprehensive expertise across major technology stacks, you will architect, implement and scale industry-leading security solutions for cyber defense. You will have the opportunity to work on cutting-edge technologies, collaborate with cross-functional security and engineering teams, and play a key role in shaping our cybersecurity strategy.

   What you will do

     * Design and develop scalable, reliable, and high-performance platform and services for Uber's cyber defense
     * Leverage AI models and algorithms to transform threat defense and response from human-driven to AI-driven
     * Collaborate with cybersecurity experts to understand their requirements and translate them into scalable technical solutions
     * Collaborate with cross-functional engineering teams to build end-to-end cyber defense solutions
     * Deliver high-quality code, conduct code reviews, identify areas for improvement, and mentor junior security engineers

Vacaturetitel: Senior Software Engineer - ML Threat Detection
Functieomschrijving:
You will drive the development and operations of security services and frameworks to support user-facing products and platforms across Uber. You are passionate and pragmatic technologists who are able to design scalable systems while delivering high-quality code. The security landscape is constantly evolving, and with the adoption of ML/GenAI backed by extensive heterogeneous data, security threats are inevitably broadened. With your deep and comprehensive expertise across major technology stacks, you will architect, implement and scale industry-leading security solutions for the entire company. You will collaborate with security leaders and with the broader engineering organization to ensure that the technologies and systems that Uber depends on are built with security-by-design in mind.

   What the Candidate Will Need / Bonus Points
     * Developing Security Solutions: designing, developing, and implementing software solutions to enhance the security posture of the organization.
     * Threat Analysis and Detection: Analyzing security threats and vulnerabilities to develop strategies for detection and mitigation.
     * Code Review and Testing
     * Research: Researching new techniques and tools to enhance the organization's cyber defense capabilities.
     * Collaboration and Communication: Working closely with cross-functional teams such as network operations, incident response, and compliance to ensure a cohesive approach to cybersecurity.

WeAreReasonablePeople blijft in beweging! Als pioniers in digital streven we ernaar om voortdurend nieuwe toepassingen te verkennen, van strategie tot en met implementatie. We bedenken én bouwen oplossingen die niet alleen haalbaar en gewenst zijn, maar ook volledig in lijn liggen met de strategie van een organisatie. Daarvoor hebben we mensen nodig die over de randen van hun eigen vakgebied kijken. Innovators met een diepgewortelde nieuwsgierigheid, die zich graag verdiepen in nieuwe technologie.    Developing on AWS

   9 September, 2024 - Hilversum, The Netherlands

   Over the last few years, Amazon Web Services (AWS) has become one of the leaders in the field of Cloud Technology, as well as a reliable partner for Cloud migrations or Greenfield Application Development. This 3-day workshop will give you practical experience with the most important AWS services. Gain practical experience with key AWS services and unleash your project's potential on the Amazon Web Services (AWS) platform.

   Book this training

   (excl. VAT) 3 days, Hilversum, English

   Looking to upskill your team(s) or organization?

   Max will gladly help you further with custom training solutions.

   Cloud Training Advisor

   What will you learn?

   In this 3-day course, you will discover core AWS services, their uses, and best practices. Develop, deploy, and debug cloud-based applications using AWS. Acquire proficiency utilizing the AWS service APIs, AWS CLI, and SDKs for application development. Gain insights into the shared responsibility model, application lifecycle management, CI/CD pipelines, serverless applications, containerization, and AWS security best practices

    1. Understand core AWS services and architecture best practices.
    2. Develop, deploy, and debug cloud-based applications on AWS.
    3. Utilize AWS service APIs, AWS CLI, and SDKs for application development.
    4. Apply cloud-native principles and write code for serverless applications.
    5. Implement CI/CD pipelines and containerize applications in the development process.
    6. Follow AWS security best practices for code authoring and maintenance.

   Using the AWS SDK

     * Set up the AWS and developer credentials for Java, C#/.NET, Python, and JavaScript.
     * Interact with AWS services and develop solutions by using the AWS SDK.

   Deployment at Scale

     * Use Amazon ElastiCache to improve application scalability.
     * Use containers in the development process.
     * Leverage the CI/CD pipeline to deploy applications on AWS.

Combine the complexity of Data, Containerization, Cloud & Infrastructure!
     * Designing, building, and managing highly secure, scalable, and available architectures
     * Understand specifications in collaboration with the PO and other stakeholders
     * Improve continuous integration and delivery systems
     * Deploy, maintain and uphold DevOps architecture standards and services.
     * Support developers teams in DevOps process
     * Develop tools to deploy environments
     * Monitoring cloud management and data storage services
     * Contributing to technical design documentation
     * Troubleshoot and analyze complex problems in distributed systems
     * Contribute to continuous improvement of our software development WoW

   Are you motivated by tackling complex engineering challenges within a collaborative, multi-disciplinary team? Do you thrive on leveraging Cloud technology within Agile development frameworks to create impactful solutions? Would you like to contribute to the advancement of cutting-edge chip production equipment? If so, we have an exciting opportunity for a Senior Lead Engineer.

   This is a dynamic environment, so being a strong communicator and team player is essential. You'll be expected to take initiative and demonstrate a results-oriented approach. In this role, we look to you to display leadership, influencing stakeholders to implement software architecture improvements and adopt new development methodologies.

   You will be employed by YER and seconded to our client. We offer:
     * Good employee benefits

     * Excellent guidance from your consultant and YER's back office
     * Development opportunities, including the YER Talent Development Programme with a personal coach
     * Intensive support for international candidates (including Dutch lessons, tax-return and accommodation assistance)
     * Cooperative and results and relationship-driven
     * Friendly atmosphere and open culture

     * Events and master classes with interesting speakers and attractive companies

     * Demonstrate a proactive mindset and a strong desire to learn and explore new technologies, including GenAI, LLM and Copilots
     * Lead the implementation and management of Azure cloud services with a focus on Infrastructure as Code (IaC)
     * Develop and maintain continuous integration and continuous delivery (CI/CD) pipelines using tools such as Azure DevOps, GitHub or GitLab
     * Write and maintain high-quality, reusable code and manage configurations through scripting languages such as Python, Bash or PowerShell
     * Configure, monitor and maintain cost-effective, scalable and resilient Microsoft Azure solutions
     * Ensure compliance with client security, quality, scalability, resiliency and regulatory standards
     * Create clear, comprehensive technical support documentation, reusable assets and guidance materials
     * Provide technical direction for DevOps initiatives across different solution groups and third-party vendors
     * Collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams to achieve project goals and resolve issues, Match deze functie met jouw persoonlijkheid en ambities? Solliciteer dan direct.
   Heb je vragen?
   Wesley helpt je graag.

Wesley Jeoffrey

Je hebt veel ervaring met TypeScript. Ook heb je ervaring met Python en diverse AI-tooling voor het optimaliseren van jouw werkprocessen.
   Je bent gepassioneerd over GenAI en volgt de razendsnelle ontwikkelingen in het veld op de voet. Niet alleen voor je eigen werk, maar ook voor slimme toepassingen. Je bent vertrouwd met de implementatie van GenAI-toepassingen zoals LLM's, vector databases en toolcalling en kunt dit aantonen tijdens het sollicitatieproces.

The AI team at ABN AMRO is looking for a Graduate AI Engineer with an innovative mindset, feel for business and entrepreneurial drive. Do you want to work at the forefront of the changes in the financial services industry and develop disruptive Artificial Intelligence (AI) solutions? Then we have a challenging position for you!

   You'll work directly with entrepreneurs and business counterparts to bring AI solutions from idea to production. We are looking for creative and passionate people with a "go get it" mentality. Our AI Engineers are multi-skilled and have strong machine learning, system design and coding skills combined with an understanding of the business context within which AI solutions are embedded.

Your job

   You'll work on a portfolio of use cases that range from improving customer contact (e.g. voicebot) to revolutionizing the way how we interact with documents by leveraging GenAI. As an AI Engineer, your main goal is to develop AI systems and solutions for our initiatives and for our client units. We take care of the full development cycle from exploring and identifying opportunities, experimenting, and creating prototypes, to developing scalable products. Effectively this means that per specific use-case our focus can be on a variety of Engineering solutions ranging from Backend to Frontend to API's to LLM to Machine Learning Models.

   Your activities include:
     * Participate in the ideation and design of AI solutions with intrapreneurs and business experts
     * Support initiatives at S&I (new value propositions, innovations) with data-driven insights
     * Experiment and implement new AI technologies (like chatGPT), algorithms and methods in one of our bank wide projects (e.g. in Financial Crime or Operations)

Working environment

   You'll be working in the Artificial Intelligence team at Strategy and Innovation (S&I) in Amsterdam and we provide ample opportunities for hybrid working. We have a start-up vibe. Your team consists of people (20+) with a passion for AI and we work every day to create (measurable) impact for the bank. There is an open team atmosphere where initiative is encouraged, and we provide daily coaching for juniors in our teams.

   Our goal is twofold: (1) to fuel innovation by developing and delivering AI solutions for the initiatives at S&I, and (2) to drive the adoption of AI across the bank by working with Client Units on some of the hardest AI problems within ABN AMRO.

As an Azure Engineer in Accenture Technology - Cloud First, you will play a pivotal role in driving our customers' cloud initiatives, leveraging Microsoft's Azure platform to design, build, migrate, and optimize scalable cloud solutions. Your expertise will be crucial in advancing our customers' cloud adoption strategies, ensuring security, and optimizing their infrastructure through effective use of Azure's vast toolset and frameworks. Join our team and contribute to shaping the future of our customers' cloud infrastructure, leveraging your expertise in Azure to drive innovation and excellence.
     * People You will collaborate with cross-functional teams, including developers, system administrators, and project managers, to ensure seamless integration and operation of cloud services for our customers. Your ability to communicate effectively and mentor junior team members will be essential in fostering a collaborative and efficient working environment.
     * Process You will lead the implementation of the Cloud Adoption Framework for our customers, ensuring their processes align with best practices for cloud governance, security, and compliance. Your role will involve refining and enhancing our customers' DevOps processes, facilitating continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines, and automating infrastructure management using Infrastructure as Code (IaC) tools like Bicep or Terraform.
     * Technology Your in-depth understanding of cloud architecture and Azure's capabilities will be instrumental in designing, building, migrating, and optimizing workloads for robust landing zones and other cloud infrastructure components for our customers. You will utilize Azure DevOps tools and services to streamline project workflows and ensure the reliability and scalability of our customers' cloud environments.
     * Task Day-to-day tasks will include designing and building Azure projects from the ground up for our customers, managing their cloud resources, and ensuring optimal performance and security. You will also be responsible for migrating and optimizing workloads to Azure, troubleshooting and resolving issues related to cloud infrastructure, continuously improving our customers' cloud operations, and staying updated with the latest Azure developments and best practices.

   With all our roles, there is some in-person time for collaboration, learning and building relationships with clients, peers, leaders, and communities. As an employer, we will be as flexible as possible to support your specific work/life needs.

Vacaturetitel: Software developer / data engineering met affiniteit met onderzoek
Functieomschrijving: Als Software developer / data engineering met affiniteit met onderzoek werk je in een ontwikkelteam met vier collega's mee aan de bouw van software en infrastructuur en plan, monitor en onderhoud je de werking ervan. Naast deze ontwikkelwerkzaamheden werk je samen met collega's aan bijvoorbeeld de verbetering van het (financial) auditproces en kun je meedraaien in een multidisciplinair onderzoeksteam. Contactpersoon: Sandra Johkan, Bram van der Linde
Functieomschrijving:
Als Data Engineer LLM bij Alliander ben jij verantwoordelijk voor het ontwikkelen en optimaliseren van taalmodellen en data-oplossingen die voldoen aan de behoeften van onze analyse- en productteams. Je implementeert efficiënte data pipelines voor grote datasets en werkt nauw samen met Digital Product Teams om innovatieve technische oplossingen te ontwerpen. Met jouw expertise zorg je ervoor dat onze data goed gestructureerd, veilig en toegankelijk is, waarmee je een sleutelrol speelt in het bevorderen van de energietransitie. Het energienet van de toekomst maken we voor iedereen, mét iedereen. En als Data Engineer LLM werk jij hieraan mee. Zo ben jij bezig met het:
     * Ontwikkelen en optimaliseren van implementaties van taalmodellen, zodat deze voldoet aan de behoeften van onze analyse- en productteams.
     * Implementeren van betrouwbare en efficiënte data pipelines voor de verzameling, opslag, verwerking en analyse van grote hoeveelheden data.
     * Samenwerken met Digital Product Teams om technische oplossingen te ontwerpen die gebruikmaken van onze standaard bouwblokken voor de implementatie van nieuwe digitale producten.
     * Bieden van technische ondersteuning en kennisdeling binnen de organisatie om het gebruik van data en technologische tools te bevorderen.
     * Continu verbeteren van de datakwaliteit en verwerkingsefficiëntie door het implementeren van moderne datatechnologieën en best practices.

Werken met de nieuwste technieken en innovaties. Dat doe je vanuit je eigen kracht en talent. En dat doe je bij ons. Draag jij daaraan bij met jouw logische manier van denken? Doen we! Zeker als je dit aanvult met:
     * Ontwikkelen en optimaliseren van implementaties van taalmodellen, zodat deze voldoet aan de behoeften van onze analyse- en productteams.
     * Implementeren van betrouwbare en efficiënte data pipelines voor de verzameling, opslag, verwerking en analyse van grote hoeveelheden data.
     * Samenwerken met Digital Product Teams om technische oplossingen te ontwerpen die gebruikmaken van onze standaard bouwblokken voor de implementatie van nieuwe digitale producten.
     * Bieden van technische ondersteuning en kennisdeling binnen de organisatie om het gebruik van data en technologische tools te bevorderen.
     * Continu verbeteren van de datakwaliteit en verwerkingsefficiëntie door het implementeren van moderne datatechnologieën en best practices.

* Model Development and Integration : Build, implement, and continuously enhance machine learning and statistical models using cutting-edge tools. Focus on integrating these models into our IT infrastructure, ensuring scalability, reliability, and performance. Collaborate with IT and DevOps teams to deploy models in production environments, monitor their performance, and optimize for efficiency. Translate business problems into robust data-driven solutions while maintaining best practices in version control, testing, and documentation.
     * Collaborate with Stakeholders : Partner with business stakeholders to understand their challenges and convert them into actionable data science projects, ensuring that the solutions align with business objectives.
     * Data Management and Analysis : Acquire, clean, and integrate data from various sources to address business issues. Use advanced data analytics techniques to manipulate and interpret complex datasets, providing clear insights and answers to critical business questions.
     * Knowledge and Trend Analysis : Stay informed about the latest industry trends to maintain a competitive edge and apply this knowledge to drive strategic decisions and methodologies within the company.

BASIC QUALIFICATIONS

   - Experience (non-internship) in professional software development
   - Experience designing or architecting (design patterns, reliability and scaling) of new and existing systems
   - Experience programming with at least one software programming language

   DESCRIPTION

   The Amazon Web Services (AWS) IDE team provides developers with different tools and services that make it easy to develop modern cloud applications. We provide the IDE Toolkits for Eclipse, IntelliJ, Visual Studio, and Visual Studio Code. With AWS Cloud9, we also provide our customers with a Web-based IDE. Our goal is enable professional developers to create applications targeting the Cloud, Server-less or containers. We help them author, debug, test, and ultimately deploy code on AWS.

   We are looking for a software development engineer who is passionate about building services and tools for developers. You will be part of a team building a new AWS service to enhance the developer experience in Cloud. The team works in close collaboration with other AWS services such as AWS Cloud9, AWS Fargate, and AWS ECS. If you are exited about the thought of working in cloud computing and building future AWS services, then we'd love to talk to you.

   Utility Computing (UC)
   AWS Utility Computing (UC) provides product innovations - from foundational services such as Amazon's Simple Storage Service (S3) and Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (EC2), to consistently released new product innovations that continue to set AWS's services and features apart in the industry. As a member of the UC organization, you'll support the development and management of Compute, Database, Storage, Internet of Things (Iot), Platform, and Productivity Apps services in AWS. Within AWS UC, Amazon Dedicated Cloud (ADC) roles engage with AWS customers who require specialized security solutions for their cloud services.

   Key job responsibilities
   - Learn and use modern and advanced technologies
   - Collaborate with internal engineering teams, leading technology companies around the world and the open source community
   - Develop cloud-based solutions that will delight software developers and system administrators globally
   - Create innovative products and see them launched in high volume production environments
   - Participate in on-call rotation

   A day in the life
   Work/Life Harmony: Our team gives high value to work-life harmony. Since the Covid19 pandemic we adjusted to remote work and established a hybrid work environment in which engineers spend 3 days working in the office, adjusted to the team needs.

   Mentorship & Career Growth: We're committed to the growth and development of every member of the team, and that includes our development managers. As a senior software development engineer you will play a vital part in growing your peers. You will have the opportunity to contribute to the culture and direction and deliver site-wide initiatives that will improve the life of all of our teams. AWS is a growth environment - we are hiring and scaling rapidly to meet the needs of our customers. You'll have the opportunity to grow your scope of influence naturally as we scale and will have get to hire & develop other leaders along the way.

   On-Call Responsibility: This position involves On-call responsibility. We work as a team to root-cause the issues and ensure our systems are resilient and fault-tolerant.

   About the team
   You would work on the Amazon Web Services (AWS) Next Gen DevX (NGDE) team where we are going to use generative AI and foundation models to reimagine the experience of all builders on AWS. From the IDE to web based tools and services AI will help engineers to work on large and small applications. In this team we have to explore new technologies and find creative solutions. Curiosity and an explorative mindset can find a place to impact the life of engineers around the world.

   About AWS
   Diverse Experiences
   AWS values diverse experiences. Even if you do not meet all of the qualifications and skills listed in the job description, we encourage candidates to apply. If your career is just starting, hasn't followed a traditional path, or includes alternative experiences, don't let it stop you from applying.
   Why AWS?
   Amazon Web Services (AWS) is the world's most comprehensive and broadly adopted cloud platform. We pioneered cloud computing and never stopped innovating - that's why customers from the most successful startups to Global 500 companies trust our robust suite of products and services to power their businesses.
   Inclusive Team Culture
   Here at AWS, it's in our nature to learn and be curious. Our employee-led affinity groups foster a culture of inclusion that empower us to be proud of our differences. Ongoing events and learning experiences, including our Conversations on Race and Ethnicity (CORE) and AmazeCon (gender diversity) conferences, inspire us to never stop embracing our uniqueness.
   Mentorship & Career Growth
   We're continuously raising our performance bar as we strive to become Earth's Best Employer. That's why you'll find endless knowledge-sharing, mentorship and other career-advancing resources here to help you develop into a better-rounded professional.
   Work/Life Balance
   We value work-life harmony. Achieving success at work should never come at the expense of sacrifices at home, which is why flexible work hours and arrangements are part of our culture. When we feel supported in the workplace and at home, there's nothing we can't achieve in the cloud.

   We are open to hiring candidates to work out of one of the following locations:

   Amsterdam, NLD

   PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS

   - Bachelor's degree in computer science or equivalent
   - Experience with full software development life cycle, including coding standards, code reviews, source control management, build processes, testing, and operations

       Backbase created the Backbase Engagement Banking Platform - a unified platform with the customer at the center, helping banks orchestrate seamless journeys across every stage of the customer lifecycle.

Vacaturetitel: Machine Learning Engineer II - Recommendation Applications ML (Marketplace)
Functieomschrijving:
This role is based in Amsterdam. Booking.com's Marketplace Department turns travel goals into travel realities. Our purpose? To create frictionless experiences at each and every stage of the trip. From browsing to booking and beyond, our focus is on building the connected experiences which make journeys smoother, faster and more enjoyable. Think of us as travel matchmakers, ensuring seamless integration across our product verticals to effortlessly and intuitively connect traveler preferences and actions.

   The Recommendation Applications ML team is dedicated to enhancing the overall customer experience and user journey. The team's mission is to be the centralized hub for all machine learning (ML) recommendation initiatives, providing scalable, reusable, state-of-the-art ML models. These models aim to increase relevance and personalization, enabling customers to be context-aware and make quicker, more informed decisions. Our team supports the vision of making travelers feel understood and assisted in every step of the travel booking journey.

   In 2025, we are planning to focus on expanding and optimizing our recommendation systems, for example by improving personalization and leveraging GenAI to build fine-tuned models for more relevant recommendations.

   As a Machine Learning Engineer II, you will be responsible for developing production-grade Machine Learning systems, from models to features and pipelines. You will own the design and delivery of ML systems, from initial idea generation and collecting business requirements from product stakeholders to implementation. You will work closely together with the other Machine Learning Scientists and Machine Learning Engineers in the Intent Discovery track as well as with Data Engineers, Software Engineers and Product Managers., * Develop production-grade ML systems, from models to features and pipelines, accounting for reliability, scalability, real-time requirements, monitoring, and retraining.
     * Build readable and reusable code, applying code quality best practices and using standard libraries. Choose the right technology or coding methodology and refactor and simplify code when necessary.
     * Take full ownership of services end-to-end by actively monitoring system health, performance, and business impact. Ensure the relevant service level objectives (SLOs) are met.
     * Combine innovation with reuse by abstracting ML/AI concepts from one application to a generalized framework, including leveraging published research, open-source technologies, and previously-developed products at Booking.
     * Be responsible for business-related data governance processes, technical implementation, and maintenance of data processing services and storage systems, as well as ML governance processes.
     * Evaluate possible architecture solutions considering business and technology requirements.
     * Contribute to the internal ML/AI community by sharing knowledge and participating in internal ML programs.
     * Continuously evolve your craft by keeping up to date with the latest developments in ML/AI and related technologies and upskilling as needed.

Vacaturetitel: Principal Machine Learning Engineer - Central Machine Learning
Functieomschrijving:
At Booking, data drives our decisions. Technology is at our core. And innovation is everywhere. But our company is more than datasets, lines of code or A/B tests. We're the thrill of the first night in a new place. The excitement of the next morning. The friends you make. The journeys you take. The sights you see. And the food you sample. We're a truly global e-commerce company, with business operations in nearly every country and city on the planet. And we want to make it easy for everyone, anywhere in the world, to pay for their travel or do business with our platform - whenever and however it's convenient for them.

   Machine Learning, and AI in general, are integral to booking's goal. Central Machine Learning (CML) powers many of booking's flagship ML capabilities. As a Principal ML Engineer in CML, you will be responsible for driving some of this brand-new innovation.

   You will own the technical strategy, long term technical vision, and success definition for our platforms and capabilities in Generative AI, Search Ranking and Recommendations, Promotion Optimization and Content Intelligence (Natural Language Processing & Computer Vision).

   You will report directly to the Director of ML/AI in the organization, and work with the most senior leadership of the department.

   Key Job Responsibilities and Duties:
     * Defining the ML/AI architecture for Booking around the aforementioned domains
     * Defining the strategic technical direction over 1-3 years
     * Work closely with our sister ML-Ops department, to build the right architecture and capabilities for the business
     * Providing feedback to people managers and teams around incoming requests and prioritization
     * Generating and preserving stakeholder alignment across multiple areas of business towards the strategy defined in (1).
     * Identifying new areas of investment, evaluating their feasibility, and getting stakeholder buy-in
     * Educating stakeholders around the ML engineering aspect of our products
     * Mentoring and coaching Managers and Individual Contributors in everything related to ML Engineering
     * Analyze, understand and share takeaways to build a strong knowledge-base of the system
       Role Qualifications and Requirements:
     * 8+ years hands-on ML engineering development experience; using Python and/or Java. Python is a must have, and Java is a big advantage. Other languages such as Scala, Perl, C, C#, etc. are an advantage
     * 5+ years of ML engineering experience on high traffic systems;
     * Experience as a technical lead in an organization
     * Experience with distributed systems, such as Hadoop
     * Experience with MySQL or similar relational databases
     * Hands on experience of developing in and contributing to open source data technologies is an advantage
     * Experience working with Machine Learning and Personalisation Paradigms
     * Strong technical understanding and systems thinking;
     * Experience and technical understanding of working with cloud based solutions (preferably AWS)
     * Strong strategic problem solver with the ability to zoom in as well as see a 10,000 ft view.
     * Experience working with data engineering and Big Data in general
     * Advantage - Previous experience with data analysis and generating data insights
     * Customer focused and obsessed with solving user problems;
     * Agile development methodologies
     * Experience with making data-driven decisions;
     * Very strong communication and stakeholder leadership skills and ability to lead priorities in time critical situations.
       Benefits & Perks: Global Impact, Personal Relevance
       Booking's Total Rewards Philosophy is not only about compensation but also about benefits. Our Total Rewards strive to make it easier for you to experience all that life has to offer on your terms so that you can focus on what really matters. We offer competitive compensation as well as thoughtful, valuable, and even fun benefits which include:
     * Headquarters located in one of the most dynamic and cosmopolitan cities in Europe: Amsterdam.
     * Contribute to a high scale, sophisticated, extraordinary product and see the real time impact of your work on millions of travelers worldwide.
     * Be part of a truly international fast paced environment and performance driven culture.
     * Performance-based company that offers career advancement, and lucrative compensation, including bonuses and stock potential.
     * Discount on Booking accommodations with the "Booking Deal" including other perks and benefits.
     * Company-sponsored family and social activities to help our employees become integrated with each other and the company's culture.
     * Diverse and creative colleagues from every corner of the world.
     * Health, life, and disability insurance*
     * Annual paid time off and generous paid leave scheme including: parent, grandparent, bereavement, and care leave.
     * Hybrid working including flexible working arrangements, and up to 20 days per year working from abroad (home country).
     * Industry leading product discounts for yourself, friends, and family, including automatic Genius Level 3 status and quarterly Booking wallet credit.
     * Free access to online learning platforms, development and mentorship programs, and a complimentary Headspace membership
     * On-site meals, coffee, and snacks, including healthy and vegan options, daily*
       #ThinkInclusion: Wellbeing & Inclusion at Booking:
       Inclusion, Diversity, Belonging, Wellbeing and Volunteering (IDBWV) have been a core part of our company culture since day one. This ongoing journey starts with our very own employees, who represent over 140 nationalities and a wide range of ethnic and social backgrounds, genders and sexual orientations.
       Take it from our Chief People Officer, Paulo Pisano: "At Booking, the diversity of our people doesn't just create a unique workplace, it also creates a better and more inclusive travel experience for everyone. Inclusion is at the heart of everything we do. It's a place where you can make your mark and have a real impact in travel and tech."
       We will ensure that individuals with disabilities are provided reasonable adjustment to participate in the job application or interview process, to perform essential job functions, and to receive other benefits and privileges of employment.
       Pre-Employment Screening:
       If your application is successful, your personal data may be used for a pre-employment screening check by a third party as permitted by applicable law. Depending on the vacancy and applicable law, a pre-employment screening may include employment history, education and other information (such as media information) that may be necessary for determining your qualifications and suitability for the position.

* Software Testability is responsible to ensure that all features are designed and implemented in a testable way by guiding product teams during the entire lifecycle is responsible to enable product teams to deliver quality products at pace by advocating for teams to verify and test work in isolated independent units and embed testing early in the lifecycle
     * Non-functional Testing has sufficient knowledge to advocate for the users experience by raising the team's ability to build applications with clear non-functional requirements (eg performance, security, accessibility, usability)Has sufficient knowledge to ensure teams keep within non-functional requirements by performing tests such as load-testing, accessibility testing, or security testing
     * Test Planning & Execution is responsible to plan, execute, and supervise testing of products and features by using techniques such as risk-based testing, exploratory testing, mobbing, pairing, or responsible to identify and investigate issues and ensure they are handled in a sustainable and repeatable way by using continuous improvement techniques
     * Test Advocacy is responsible to ensure that testing is embedded in the lifecycle of the product by being involved in the planning and design stages of applications and services Is responsible to advocate for testing best practices by explaining why testing is required, and enables others to own testing and quality checks of the product
     * Test Automation has sufficient knowledge to drive and coordinate collaborative improvements of the test automation infrastructure and processes in teams by outlining the pros and cons of automation, where it can be effective, and where it cannot be used. Has sufficient knowledge to increase the overall quality of tests for a product by building automated tests that are isolated, deterministic, valuable and provide fast, reliable feedback.
     * Critical Thinking: responsible to systematically identify patterns and underlying issues in complex situations, and to find solutions by applying logical and analytical thinking is responsible to constructively evaluate and develop ideas, plans and solutions by reviewing them, objectively taking into account external knowledge, initiating 'SMART' improvements and articulating their rationale
     * Continuous Quality and Process Improvement: responsible to identify opportunities for process, system and structural improvements (i.e performance gains) by examining and evaluating current process flows, methods and standards
     * Responsible to design and implement relevant improvements by defining adapted/new process flows, standards, and practices that enable business performance
     * Effective Communication is responsible to deliver clear, well-structured, and meaningful information to a target audience by using suitable communication mediums and language tailored to the audience
     * Responsible to achieve mutually agreeable solutions by staying adaptable, communicating ideas in clear coherent language and practising active listening
     * Responsible to ask relevant (follow-up) questions to properly engage with the speaker and really understand what they are saying, by applying listening and reflection techniques
     * This role may require to be on an on-call rotation

       Catalyze is hiring! We're forming a team of innovators who would transform how organizations apply for grants. We're looking for Generative AI Engineers, Data Scientists, Full Stack Developers to build the most advanced AI -powered grant writing assistant in the industry.
       Join us to shape the future of grant writing! Explore our open positions in AI, data science, and software development, and join us in building a solution that will empower organizations to make a difference.
       Grow your career - expand your skills and responsibilities
       Build something new - Its a new team being build, be a part of that, be entrepreneurial, take ownership, be creative.
       Full Stack Developer
       At Catalyze, we are committed to redefining the grant-writing process through cutting-edge AI and intuitive digital solutions. As a Full Stack Developer, you'll play a key role in building the AI-powered grant-writing assistant that empowers organizations to apply for funding with greater ease and effectiveness. This role is ideal for someone who is versatile, solution-oriented, and passionate about creating seamless user experiences. You'll be responsible for developing both the front-end and backend components of our grant-writing tool, ensuring a responsive, user-friendly interface and robust backend infrastructure. This is a unique opportunity to be part of a core team developing an innovative tool in a collaborative and dynamic environment., + Frontend Development: Design and implement responsive, intuitive user interfaces using frameworks such as React or Vue.js, ensuring a smooth, engaging user experience.
          + Backend Development: Develop backend services and APIs using Django or Flask to handle data processing, AI model integration, and other key functionalities.
          + API Integration: Collaborate with the AI and data science teams to integrate machine learning models into the application, ensuring efficient data flow and functionality between the frontend and backend.
          + Database Management: Set up, manage, and optimize databases (SQL/NoSQL) for reliable and secure data storage and retrieval, supporting the AI model and other application features.
          + Performance Optimization: Continuously improve application performance, focusing on scalability, security, and user experience.
          + Testing and Debugging: Conduct thorough testing, troubleshoot issues, and implement fixes to ensure a high-quality, reliable product.
          + Compliance & Security: Ensure that all application components comply with data privacy and security standards, such as GDPR, maintaining high standards of protection for user data.

       At Catalyze, we're forming a team of AI and technology innovators to create the most advanced AI-powered grant-writing assistant in the industry. Our mission is to empower organizations by simplifying the grant-writing process, allowing them to improve efficiency and focus on their impactful work. If you're passionate about AI, NLP, and developing meaningful solutions to create an impact, Catalyze invites you to contribute to transforming how organizations secure funding.
       Our innovation-driven team will leverage cutting-edge AI and NLP technologies to help organizations streamline their grant applications, improve proposal quality, and increase their success rates. We're looking for curious, driven professionals who are ready to tackle meaningful challenges.
       Catalyze is hiring! We're forming a team of innovators who would transform how organizations apply for grants. We're looking for Generative AI Engineers, Data Scientists, Full Stack Developers to build the most advanced AI -powered grant writing assistant in the industry.
       Join us to shape the future of grant writing! Explore our open positions in AI, data science, and software development, and join us in building a solution that will empower organizations to make a difference.
